programme.title: Affordable Gadgets And Cheap Hacks!

programme.title: Handyman’s Secret Tool Hacks And Repair Tips!

programme.title: Fix Anything in Your House with Minimal Cost
programme.desc: Learn how to tackle home repairs efficiently and affordably, with budget-friendly tips that anyone can use.

programme.title: Chiemgau, A Changing Landscape
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Chiemgau, A Changing Landscape: Episode 2
programme.desc: Three times in the past two decades, the Chiemsee area has experienced "once-in-a-century" floods. Climate, wildlife, and landscape have changed, and it seems this transformation is accelerating. Species living in the flood zones are developing sophisticated survival strategies. Knot ants, for instance, place their queen in the middle and form a raft with their bodies, even conquering new habitats. Flooding is less of a disaster for nature and impacts humans more significantly.

programme.title: North Americas National Parks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Americas National Parks - Everglades
programme.desc: North America’s National Parks are world famous and their breathtaking landscapes fascinate millions of visitors. This spectacular series will show you what happens beyond the lookouts. Everglades National Park is an American national park that protects the southern twenty percent of the original Everglades in Florida. The park is the largest tropical wilderness in the United States, and the largest wilderness of any kind east of the Mississippi River. An average of one million people visit the park each year. Everglades is the third-largest national park in the contiguous United States after Death Valley and Yellowstone. UNESCO declared the Everglades and Dry Tortugas Biosphere Reserve in...

programme.title: North Americas National Parks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Americas National Parks - Great Smoky Mountains
programme.desc: Great Smoky Mountains National Park is an American national park in the southeastern United States, with parts in Tennessee and North Carolina. The park straddles the ridgeline of the Great Smoky Mountains, part of the Blue Ridge Mountains, which are a division of the larger Appalachian Mountain chain. The park contains some of the highest mountains in eastern North America, including Clingmans Dome, Mount Guyot, and Mount Le Conte. The border between the two states runs northeast to southwest through the center of the park. The Appalachian Trail passes through the center of the park on its route from Georgia to Maine. With 12.5 million visitors in 2019, the Great Smoky Mountains National...

programme.title: North Americas National Parks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Americas National Parks - Olympic
programme.desc: Olympic National Park is an American national park located in the State of Washington, on the Olympic Peninsula. The park has four regions: the Pacific coastline, alpine areas, the west side temperate rainforest and the forests of the drier east side. Within the park there are three distinct ecosystems which are subalpine forest and wildflower meadow, temperate forest, and the rugged Pacific coast. President Theodore Roosevelt originally designated Mount Olympus National Monument on 2 March 1909. The monument was redesignated as a national park by Congress and President Franklin Roosevelt on June 29, 1938. In 1976, Olympic National Park was designated by UNESCO as an International...

programme.title: North Americas National Parks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Americas National Parks - Yosemite
programme.desc: Yosemite National Park is a place of superlatives: with towering cliffs and giant sequoias, home to coyotes, black bears and the most elusive of all: the bobcat. Watch this documentary with ist spectacular shots, aerial views and time-lapse shots and learn some new facts about the biodiversity in one of North Americas most spectacular National Parks.

programme.title: mareTV: Newfoundland - Canadas Eastern Point
programme.desc: In Newfoundland, at the easternmost tip of North America, the landscape is pristine, dramatic, and very sparsely populated. In summer, icebergs occasionally drift along the steep cliffs. When the "Titanic" collided with an iceberg and sank just 300 miles off the coast of Newfoundland in 1912, the last radio messages were picked up in a small wooden hut on the Avalon Peninsula. Today, most Newfoundlanders live on Avalon. There are particularly many seabirds here. In Witless Bay, the newborn puffins are ready for their first descent into the Atlantic. But some stray onto the coastal road, attracted by the lights of the hotels and restaurants. In doing so, they run the risk of being run...

programme.title: Cuba to Go
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Cuba to Go - Episode 1
programme.desc: Ever since the embargo was lifted in the summer of 2015, Cuba’s popularity has been steadily increasing.

programme.title: Cuba to Go
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Cuba to Go - Episode 2
programme.desc: Ever since the embargo was lifted in the summer of 2015, Cuba’s popularity has been steadily increasing.

programme.title: Wild Faces of the Andes
programme.desc: The Andes are the biggest mountain range in the world. Peaks of up to 7000 metres in height, do not only offer an imposing view, but also influence the climate by being the drainage and meteorological divide.

programme.title: Wild Baltic
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Wild Baltic - Life on the Amber Coast
programme.desc: The first episode of this two-part nature documentary presents the natural beauty of the shifting sand dunes of the Curonian Spit, the romantic beaches of the Latvian Baltic Sea and the island worlds of Estonia. Time and again, this deserted and almost untouched nature fascinates. In the winter, ringed seals give birth to their young on the pack ice. In the spring, Konik wild horse stallions fight fierce battles amongst themselves, while colourful European rollers fly through the dune forests. Lynxes wander through the coastal forests and in the orchid meadows turncoats and hoopoes find more than enough food. On the islands around Saaremaa in Estonia, grey seals hunt for fish. They share...

programme.title: Wild Baltic
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Wild Baltic - Enchanted Forests and Moors
programme.desc: The wide, often untouched wilderness of the Baltic hinterland is home to many animals. More than 35 brown bears live in the primeval forests of Alutaguse. In the spring, the Soomaa National Park transforms into a huge lake. Europes widest waterfall is located in Latvia. In the beginning of May, vimba bream follow the course of the River Venta. The hardly 5-centimetre-long fish have to overcome a 4-metre-long rock barrier in order to reach their spawning grounds.

programme.title: North Americas National Parks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Americas National Parks - Grand Canyon
programme.desc: The Grand Canyon is a steep-sided canyon carved by the Colorado River in Arizona, United States. The Grand Canyon is 277 miles (446 km) long, up to 18 miles (29 km) wide and attains a depth of over a mile (6,093 feet or 1,857 meters). The canyon and adjacent rim are contained within Grand Canyon National Park, the Kaibab National Forest, Grand Canyon–Parashant National Monument, the Hualapai Indian Reservation, the Havasupai Indian Reservation and the Navajo Nation. President Theodore Roosevelt was a major proponent of preservation of the Grand Canyon area and visited it on numerous occasions to hunt and enjoy the scenery.

programme.title: North Americas National Parks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Americas National Parks - Gates of the Arctic
programme.desc: Gates of the Arctic National Park and Preserve is an American national park that protects portions of the Brooks Range in northern Alaska. The park is the northernmost national park in the United States, situated entirely north of the Arctic Circle. The park is the second largest in the US, slightly larger in area than Belgium. Gates of the Arctic was initially designated as a national monument on December 1, 1978, before being redesignated as a national park and preserve upon passage of the Alaska National Interest Lands Conservation Act in 1980. A large part of the park has additional protection as the Gates of the Arctic Wilderness that adjoins the Noatak Wilderness. They form the...

programme.title: North Americas National Parks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Americas National Parks - Saguaro
programme.desc: Saguaro National Park is an American national park in Pima County, southeastern Arizona. The 92,000-acre (37,000 ha) park consists of two separate areas—the Tucson Mountain District (TMD) about 10 miles west of the city of Tucson and the Rincon Mountain District (RMD) about 10 miles east of the city—that preserve Sonoran Desert landscapes, fauna, and flora, including the giant saguaro cactus.An inventory of medium and large mammals in the park confirmed the presence of 30 species in Saguaro National Park between 1999 and 2008. Of these, 21 were found in the Tucson Mountain District and 29 in the Rincon Mountain District. A partial list of the parks mammals includes cougars, coyotes,...

programme.title: North Americas National Parks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Americas National Parks - Yellowstone
programme.desc: Yellowstone National Park is an American national park located in the western United States, largely in the northwest corner of Wyoming and extending into Montana, and Idaho. It was established by the U.S. Congress and signed into law by President Ulysses S. Grant on March 1, 1872. Yellowstone was the first national park in the U.S. and is also widely held to be the first national park in the world. The park is known for its wildlife and its many geothermal features, especially Old Faithful geyser, one of its most popular. While it represents many types of biomes, the subalpine forest is the most abundant. It is part of the South Central Rockies forests ecoregion.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Americas National Parks - Everglades

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Of Flying Foxes and Heat Waves
programme.desc: While the Tolga Bat Hospital is looking after endangered flying foxes, researchers are using thermographic cameras to search for flying foxes and koalas. But they can also detect bush and wildfire more quickly.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Of Sea Turtles and Coral Reefs
programme.desc: The Cairns Turtle Rehabilitation Center (CTRC) raises and cares for sick, or injured turtles, while the Schmidt Ocean Institute goes on a diving mission with a high-tech underwater rover. In this way, we learn firsthand about the state of Australias sensitive marine animals natural habitat and what needs to be done to ensure their survival.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Of Wombats and Vaccines
programme.desc: Tasmanias Bonorong Wildlife Sanctuary used to be a traditional wildlife park - now it is an innovative and active wildlife sanctuary and home to the famous Tasmanian Devil, to wombats, and many other native species. But unfortunately, "Tassie Devils" are particularly endangered by the Devil Facial Tumor Disease (DFTD). We accompany the team of young, ambitious scientists on their fight against the disease.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Of Koalas and Drones
programme.desc: Lone Pine Koala Sanctuary was opened in 1927 at a time when Koalas were still being killed on a large scale for the fur trade. Today, hardly anything threatens the natural habitats of these animals as much as the desertification of the forests. We let the drones fly and are there when a new tree is planted.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 wOf Kangaroos and Conservation
programme.desc: Visiting the fenced nature reserve Arid Recovery in southern Australia, we witness the care of an injured kangaroo and follow researchers at the Hidden Vale Wildlife Centre near Brisbane as they train native animals to detect tracks of threatening predators and then move to safety.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Of Fairy Penguins and GPS Trackers
programme.desc: Australias largest fur seal colony is located on Phillip Island. Night after night, a breathtaking spectacle takes place here: At sunset, countless fairy penguins return from their hunt for fish. In the station near the penguin colony, pioneering scientific research is conducted around the cute animals. We learn how dedicated scientists are trying to secure the future of the fairy penguins with the help of GPS trackers.

programme.title: Symphony of the Seas - Underwater Wonders of Australias Ocean
programme.desc: Our journeys take us all around the world from Patagonia to the USA, from Greenland to South Africa and from Cambodia to Australia and leads us to the most fascinating places where landscapes animals and humans are the main focus of our documentaries. Whether on land or at sea – the last paradises of the world are our destination.

programme.title: Jacques Cousteaus Legacy - Return To The Undersea World
programme.desc: A composition of wildlife footage, archive material and elaborate re-enactments results in a brilliant reconstruction of the life of famed marine biologist and environmental pioneer Jacques Cousteau. On the trail of the most famous oceanographer of the 20th Century, the team spent two years filming original locations on three different continents, in four different oceans. The film charts how Cousteau’s outlook on the environment changed throughout his many decades at sea around the globe. On his personal journey to enlightenment, he changed from a man who killed sharks in hate and thoughtlessly blew up coral reefs, to a radical environmentalist.

programme.title: Red Panda - Worlds Cutest Animal
programme.desc: The Red Panda is undoubtedly one of the most beautiful animals on earth and this is the first ever intimate portrait ever made.

programme.title: New Life
programme.desc: In a land of dangers, plant-eating animals are always at risk, and never more so than at the time of their birth; out on the open they are vulnerable and there are few places to hide. But luckily some are born to run …

programme.title: New Life
programme.desc: Its a water world and life couldnt survive without it. And thanks to it, a mind blowing diversity of creatures thrive beneath the surface. Born to enjoy the riches underwater they must master their bodys adaptations, learn to find food, to escape danger and above all become expert swimmers! Whether its in rivers, on beaches or in the deep ocean, all must overcome the obstacles and fulfil their destiny, all are born to swim! Of all the habitats on earth, the ocean is perhaps the most challenging. Here salt, temperatures, currents and predators can make life difficult; its not an obvious place to want to bring up your babies… But even in these waters generation after generation beats...

programme.title: New Life
programme.desc: Baby animals beguile with their innocent charm. But while some remain harmless, others have a deep-rooted instinct. It may take weeks or months of training to hone their skills. Their landscapes and lifestyles maybe very different, but these babies are born to hunt.

programme.title: Wild Medicine - Animals Superpowers
programme.desc: Nature has many weird creatures to offer and often these animals fascinate us the most. There are ants in Australias outback that use specialised workers as living honey pots. In Africa in the endless Bangweulu wetlands of Zambia the shoebill is on the hunt for fish, a bird that definitely lives up to its name. Finally in the Brazilian rainforests lurk gruesome river monsters in the Amazon abyss that send shivers down the spine of even the most experienced divers. But there are also intense human-animal-relationships like the close bond between a German diver and a dolphin female who explore the Atlantic off the coast of Ireland, or the "easy rider" in California who has taken care of an...

programme.title: Unusual World
programme.desc: The dominance of air has always been in the mind of men, but nature only gave the gift to flight to certain animals. Amongst these, to the insects. Thanks to their wings, the insects have conquered most parts of the planet’s diverse environment. What are the reasons for such an amazing biological success without comparison in the history of the animal world?

programme.desc: Our journeys take us all around the world from Patagonia to the USA, from Greenland to South Africa and from Cambodia to Australia and leads us to the most fascinating places where landscapes animals and humans are the main focus of our documentaries. Whether on land or at sea – the last paradises of the world are our destination.

programme.title: Jacques Cousteaus Legacy - Return To The Undersea World
programme.desc: A composition of wildlife footage, archive material and elaborate re-enactments results in a brilliant reconstruction of the life of famed marine biologist and environmental pioneer Jacques Cousteau. On the trail of the most famous oceanographer of the 20th Century, the team spent two years filming original locations on three different continents, in four different oceans. The film charts how Cousteau’s outlook on the environment changed throughout his many decades at sea around the globe. On his personal journey to enlightenment, he changed from a man who killed sharks in hate and thoughtlessly blew up coral reefs, to a radical environmentalist.

programme.title: Red Panda - Worlds Cutest Animal
programme.desc: The Red Panda is undoubtedly one of the most beautiful animals on earth and this is the first ever intimate portrait ever made.

programme.title: New Life
programme.desc: In a land of dangers, plant-eating animals are always at risk, and never more so than at the time of their birth; out on the open they are vulnerable and there are few places to hide. But luckily some are born to run …

programme.title: New Life
programme.desc: Its a water world and life couldnt survive without it. And thanks to it, a mind blowing diversity of creatures thrive beneath the surface. Born to enjoy the riches underwater they must master their bodys adaptations, learn to find food, to escape danger and above all become expert swimmers! Whether its in rivers, on beaches or in the deep ocean, all must overcome the obstacles and fulfil their destiny, all are born to swim! Of all the habitats on earth, the ocean is perhaps the most challenging. Here salt, temperatures, currents and predators can make life difficult; its not an obvious place to want to bring up your babies… But even in these waters generation after generation beats...

programme.title: New Life
programme.desc: Baby animals beguile with their innocent charm. But while some remain harmless, others have a deep-rooted instinct. It may take weeks or months of training to hone their skills. Their landscapes and lifestyles maybe very different, but these babies are born to hunt.

programme.title: Asia - Secret Lives Hidden Places II
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Asia - Secret Lives Hidden Places II: Kinabatangan River: Borneo – Forgotten Paradise
programme.desc: In Sabah, northern Borneo, flows the 560km-long Kinabatangan River. Nowhere else in Sabah are wild animals as easily spotted as along this river: orangutans, elephants, crocodiles, and proboscis monkeys. However, biodiversity is threatened as more rainforest gives way to palm oil plantations. Wildlife ventures into inhabited areas in search of food, leading to conflicts. Locals are fighting to preserve the rainforest and its unique wildlife, demonstrating that conservation and prosperity can coexist even in a modern society.

programme.title: Asia - Secret Lives Hidden Places II
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Asia - Secret Lives Hidden Places II: Pu Mat National Park: Vietnam – Of Bears and Men
programme.desc: The jungle in northern Vietnam is nearly impenetrable, with some areas never touched by humans. The remote rainforests of Pu Mat National Park serve as a refuge for endangered wildlife such as black bears, monkeys, and pangolins. Tuan, a biologist and bear specialist, embarks on an expedition to these untouched regions of the park in search of bears. The most hunted animal here is the pangolin, sought after for its scales believed to have medicinal properties and its meat considered a delicacy. A small Vietnamese conservation organization fights for the survival of this species.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E36 Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: Julie Jensen suspected her husband and the father of her children Mark Jensen wanted her dead, so she put pen to paper telling the world just that.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: In 1986, an American becomes one of Canadas most prolific bank and jewellery bandits after he pulls off one of the biggest heists in Canadian history.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: In 1994, a troubled single mother is found raped and murdered in her apartment.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: Police are able to capture kidnappers when the assailants use their victims cell phone.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: Two murders of mothers in their own homes send shock-waves through a normally quiet and friendly town where everybody leaves their doors unlocked.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: 1995 - Houston, Texas. A lonely man calls a dating service and gets more than he bargained for when he is met at gunpoint and robbed by his "dates".

programme.desc: Tommy Carlton owed his ex-wife Elizabeth $85,000 in back child support. It would be a lot cheaper to pay a hit man $2,000 to make her go away permanently.

programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Someone They Knew... With Tamron Hall
programme.desc: Ed Dossett and David Leath were friends with a lot in common. Both were well-known around Knoxville. Both married the same woman. And both turned up dead under suspicious circumstances.

programme.desc: When a fire breaks out in Krystina Sutherlands apartment building, the first suspect is her ex-boyfriend, Charles Loayza. After all, he had threatened to burn it down earlier that day.

programme.title: Vacation, Part 2
programme.desc: The lifeguards encounter high seas hijackers who leave Mitch and Stephanie stranded in the Pacific.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: An escaped psychopath takes Summer and Stephanie hostage in a lifeguard tower.

programme.title: Stakeout at Surfrider Beach
programme.desc: Mitch finds himself falling for an Italian actress who is being stalked by ruthless robbers.

programme.title: Shattered, Part 1
programme.desc: Mitch is paralyzed when he saves three teenagers. Can the team rally to repair his shattered life?

programme.title: Shattered, Part 2

programme.title: Kicks
programme.desc: Mitch coaches Matt in an amateur kickboxing tournament, but the competition turns deadly.

programme.title: Fatal Exchange
programme.desc: Mitch contends with an Australian lifeguard and rekindles his love affair with Kaye Morgan.

programme.title: Race Against Time, Part 1
programme.desc: Mitchs ex-wife flies in for a weekend visit and informs Mitch she is taking Hobie to Ohio.

programme.title: Race Against Time, Part 2
programme.desc: A dramatic plane crash finds Hobie and his mother trapped in a rapidly flooding fuselage.

programme.title: Lovers Cove
programme.desc: Romance is in the air at Baywatch as Mitch and Jackies friendship grows more intense.

programme.title: Blindside
programme.desc: John Cort returns to Baywatch where his life undergoes a devastating change.

programme.title: Skyrider
programme.desc: Summer has love problems when Slade returns to discover Matt and Summer are dating.

programme.title: Tentacles, Part 1
programme.desc: A prison break gone awry finds Mitch held hostage and forced to perform surgery.

programme.title: Tentacles, Part 2
programme.desc: Mitch removes a bullet from an escaped convict, only to realize that he plans on killing him.

programme.title: Submersion
programme.desc: Mitch saves two boys from drowning. But when one ends up in a coma, Mitch suffers from PTSD.

programme.title: Ironman Buchannon
programme.desc: Mitchs birthday prompts him to train for an ironman competition, which causes problems at Baywatch.

programme.title: Tower of Power
programme.desc: A new lifeguard helps Mitch and the Baywatch lifeguards confront an upsurge in gang activity.

programme.title: The Child Inside
programme.desc: The Baywatch lifeguards stage a beach-oriented Special Olympics.

programme.title: Second Time Around
programme.desc: Jesse, a beautiful motorcycle racer, returns and puts strain on Matt and Summer’s relationship.

programme.title: The Red Knights
programme.desc: An ad hoc reunion of elite 1950s lifeguards, the "Red Knights," triggers a bar room brawl.

programme.title: Coronado Del Soul, Part 1
programme.desc: The Baywatch lifeguards travel to San Diego for a week where Summer is haunted by a ghost.

programme.title: Coronado Del Soul, Part 2
programme.desc: Adrift in the ocean with his semi-conscious brother, Mitch struggles to keep them both alive.

programme.title: Mirror, Mirror
programme.desc: A beautiful woman and her plain sister compete for Mitchs affection with perilous results.

programme.title: The Falcon Manifesto
programme.desc: A reporter puts her life at risk to publish a story. Can the Baywatch team help her stay alive?

programme.title: Western Exposure
programme.desc: Country singer Jessie Lee Harris pays a visit to Baywatch in search of his estranged wife and son.

programme.title: The Life You Save
programme.desc: Matt and Summer volunteer their time when cutbacks put the Baywatch lifeguards’ jobs in jeopardy.

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Stephanie spends a week with the Coast Guard to help them crack a dangerous arms smuggling ring.

programme.title: Guys and Dolls
programme.desc: Matt doesnt know whose story to believe when he tries to reunite a runaway teen and her father.

programme.title: Rescue Bay
programme.desc: A Hollywood producer desperate for a new TV series idea observes a Baywatch rescue.

programme.title: Livin on the Fault, Part 1
programme.desc: After a minor earthquake, a geological survey team arrives at Baywatch, but trouble strikes again.

programme.title: Livin on the Fault, Part 2
programme.desc: Stephanie and the geological team are trapped underwater by a massive earthquake!

programme.title: Aftershock
programme.desc: After the earthquake which almost took his life, Hobie leaves California to live with his mother.

programme.title: Baja Run
programme.desc: John Cort shows up at headquarters and convinces Mitch to compete in a dune buggy race.

programme.title: Air Buchannon
programme.desc: Mitch has to work a 24-hour shift with Stephanie and Hobie is pressured into throwing a house party.

programme.title: Shortsighted
programme.desc: Hobie befriends a boy who has moved to California to live with his father after his mothers death.

programme.title: Someone to Baywatch Over You
programme.desc: Mitch helps a woman he calls “The Mermaid” who turns out to be the wife of a crime boss.

programme.title: K-Gas The Grooveyard of Solid Gold
programme.desc: The Baywatch team is put on high alert when thousands of reckless treasure hunters storm the beach.

programme.title: Red Wind
programme.desc: When the hot Santa Ana winds move in from the desert, things start heating up on the Baywatch beach.

programme.title: I Spike
programme.desc: A lifeguard-turned-hovercraft expert introduces new technology to the Baywatch team.

programme.title: Silent Night Baywatch Night, Part 1
programme.desc: Matt and Hobie rescue a young boy who is being harassed by a thug and take care of him.

programme.title: Silent Night Baywatch Night, Part 2

programme.title: Rubber Ducky
programme.desc: Logans visa is soon to expire. Can he get his green card before he gets sent back to Australia?

programme.title: Homecoming
programme.desc: Stephanie is kidnapped by an eco-terrorist. The Baywatch team must rescue her and save the day.

programme.title: Seize the Day
programme.desc: Mitch proposes to Tracy, but the happy moment is short-lived as she reveals she is terminal ill.

programme.title: A Little Help From My Friends
programme.desc: Mitch is still mourning Tracy’s death, so Hobie seeks help from a radio show to help Mitch recover.

programme.title: Fathers Day
programme.desc: Mitch receives a mysterious package his father had put together before he died.

programme.title: Fire With Fire
programme.desc: Andy, an old friend of Mitch, visits Baywatch to complete four days of lifeguard service.

programme.title: Deep Trouble
programme.desc: Matt and CJ stumble upon a homeless man who shockingly turns out to be someone they know very well.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: When testing out a new flying machine, Mitch spots a makeshift raft with a stranded woman in it.

programme.title: The Runaways
programme.desc: Prominent British businessman Richard Branson visits Baywatch to perform several risky stunts.

programme.title: Wet and Wild
programme.desc: Hobie’s idol comes to the beach, but Mitch is furious he turns out to have some questionable morals.

programme.title: Trapped Beneath the Sea, Part 1
programme.desc: Mitch considers a new career working with Garner as a private eye. Logan cheats on Caroline again.

programme.title: Trapped Beneath the Sea, Part 2
programme.desc: When a crippled oil rig sinks and floods with water, the team begins a desperate rescue effort.

programme.title: Hot Stuff
programme.desc: Kaye asks Hobie to volunteer at a school for young blind children.

programme.title: Surfs Up
programme.desc: Cody and Neely rescue two surfers that fall ill due to a highly polluted beach.

programme.title: To Everything There is a Season
programme.desc: Mitchs mother arrives in town and, after some strange occurrences, he insists she see a doctor.

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: Stephanie, CJ, and Caroline go on a girls-only junior lifeguard trip to Catalina.

programme.title: Face of Fear
programme.desc: Hobies new friend Isaac’s risky behavior causes problems for the lifeguards.

programme.title: Hit and Run
programme.desc: Logan borrows Codys car without permission and has an accident, then lies to the police.

programme.title: Goodbye, Butterfly
programme.desc: After his five-year-old daughter is murdered, a loving family man becomes convinced that the oddball down the street is guilty.

programme.title: House on Rockingham
programme.desc: A young woman takes up a job as a live in housekeeper and slowly learns the owner may be connected to her sisters disappearance.

programme.title: Sam
programme.desc: An alpha New York City male is magically transformed into a beautiful girl, falls in love, and learns what it means to be a woman.

programme.title: Shirin In Love
programme.desc: Love has no borders and therein lies the premise of the charming, Iranian-American romantic comedy "Shirin in Love."

programme.title: Hell and Mr. Fudge
programme.desc: In 1970s Alabama, a young preacher struggles with his faith, and attacks from his church, after being hired to prove whether or not Hell exists.

programme.title: Executor
programme.desc: A ruthless assassin, trained to kill in the name of God by a corrupt priest, re-evaluates his life purpose after saving a little boy from one of his own assassination attempts.

programme.title: The Menkoff Method
programme.desc: In this satirical office comedy introverted bank worker, David Cork, joins forces with corporate gun Ruby Jackson to defeat the evil HR guru – Max Menkoff.

programme.title: Beauty in the Broken
programme.desc: The worlds of a depressed psychologist and an emotionally disturbed homeless woman collide. While trying to rescue her they fall in love, and each gets a second chance at a new life.

programme.title: The Phoenix Project
programme.desc: Four scientists craft a machine to reanimate deceased organisms.

programme.title: The God Question
programme.desc: A scientist asks an experimental super-intelligent computer the ultimate question: Is there evidence for God, for a spiritual framework to life?

programme.title: Treasure Lies
programme.desc: Hardworking teenager Sean feels let down by life, but faces a crisis of character through a series of his own bad decisions.

programme.title: God and Salsa
programme.desc: A grief-stricken therapist determined to help a suicidal teen regains her faith in the process with the help of her Pastor and Salsa instructor.

programme.title: Finding Hope
programme.desc: About Hope, a young wife plagued with amnesia and Andrew, her duty obsessed husband who must help her fall in love with him all over as he comes to terms with his own destiny.

programme.title: Twice
programme.desc: A mystery girl arrives in a small town in Brattleboro Vermont and creates a new life for herself while her past remains unknown.

programme.title: The Shattering
programme.desc: In the dead of night, Donovan drives with his girlfriend, Lucy and several friends to a secret rendezvous in the woods.

programme.title: 3rd Night
programme.desc: A couple move to an Australian orchard surrounded by natural bushland to escape the madness of modern life but are terrorised by the mysterious Watcher.

programme.title: Eenie Meenie Miney Moe
programme.desc: Raul, a tow truck driver in Miami Beach, learns that every choice has its rewards and consequences.

programme.title: All for Amy
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Amy forces her ex-boyfriend to meet her at the LBJ library in Austin by threatening to commit suicide. As he tries to talk her down, we learn more about her.

programme.title: Fray
programme.desc: A young Marine veteran is facing a new battle back home while struggling through a shattered economy and burdened by the physical and emotional scars of war.

programme.title: Miles To Go
programme.desc: A writer from Los Angeles, who doesnt believe that relationships can last for him, struggles to mend his most recent failed relationship.

programme.title: Heart of Wilderness
programme.desc: On the run in the wilderness, Travis and Aimee navigate icy waters and the secrets they keep.

programme.title: The Boatman
programme.desc: A dedicated border coyote is haunted by the memories of those he failed to help.

programme.title: When We Last Spoke
programme.desc: Two abandoned sisters live with their grandparents in Texas in 1967.

programme.title: The Ribbon
programme.desc: Molly and Tim are happy newlyweds, but an unexpected miscarriage threatens to tear them apart until they meet Kristin, a pregnant homeless girl in need of a family.

programme.title: Bright Sky
programme.desc: A single mother escapes a dark past to a small town. As she begins to build a new life, she comes across an outlaw looking for redemption.

programme.title: The Surrogate
programme.desc: The Surrogate is a contemporary dramedy about a group of Bay Area friends in their early 40s navigating lifes messy moments together.

programme.title: Gold Fools

programme.title: TangerineLAnd

programme.title: Someone I Used to Know

programme.title: Bittersweet Monday
programme.desc: An emotional goodbye between longtime best friends begins an unexpected love affair, putting two marriages and many friendships at stake.

programme.title: American Rescue Squad

programme.title: All in Time

programme.title: Eight

programme.title: Cassidy Red

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation.

programme.desc: CGTNs brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Night of Horror at Devils Plateau (Marie-Jeanne Meyer Case) - On June 18, 2011, Marie-Jeanne Meyer, 17-years old, waved goodbye to her little sister before leaving for her daily jog on the heights of Tournon in Ardèche. She never came back. Three days later, her mutilated body was found in a freshly dug pit, near an area known to be cursed, "The Devils Plateau." Whats more, the crime scene looked like a mystical ritual ... Was it a ritual murder? Revenge? An unfortunate encounter? ...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Mysterious Murder at the Farm (Valerie Bary Case)- On Friday, March 26, 2004, in the region of Dijon, Laurent Bary came home from his work to discover the lifeless body of his wife, Valerie, bathing in a pool of blood. According to the investigators initial findings, the 38-year-old nurses aid had been stabbed several times, seeming to validate the theory of a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 13, 2011, two boaters retrieved a suitcase that was floating in the bay of Lorient. Inside, they discovered the tied up corpse of a man.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Bloody Christmas next to the Leman lake (CASE OF RUTH LÉGERET) - On January 4, 2006, Ruth Legeret was found dead in the middle of a pool of blood at her luxurious property in Vevey, Switzerland. Next to her was the lifeless body of her friend, Marina Studer. Who could have killed these two simple and wealthy widows? Clue after clue, the Swiss polices investigation would revolve around an environment of family jealousy and financial greed.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: September 16 2005. The lifeless body of Audrey Jouannet, 24, is found hidden under the bed in her small apartment in Soisy-sur-Seine. It soon becomes apparent that the young woman has been tortured at length before being strangled. But surprisingly, though the highly meticulous murderer has taken care to leave no sign of his passage, the autopsy reveals traces of sperm on the victim. It will take all of the investigators intuition to pierce the mystery of this heinous crime...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Sylvain Dromard finds the body of his wife Laurence lying in a pool of blood in the kitchen. The crime was particularly violent and the theory of a burglary that went wrong is soon excluded. But investigators dont understand who could want the adorable hairdresser of Saint-Martin-dAblois dead. During the investigation, the work of profilers will enable them to draw a very precise portrait of the murderer...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: After an ordinary dinner, Pierre and Gabrielle Labrell suffer severe abdominal pains.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Nelly Cremel, 39, leaves her home to go jogging... never to return. Eight days later, after a vast search campaign, her body is found. Theres no doubt that its murder. The case soon ignites public opinion, even inflaming passions at the highest level of the state. The clues lead investigators on a number of trails, from the shadows of the French secret service to a manhunt for a possible sex maniac, in a case of murder most foul.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Willy Pomonti, a retired architect, is found savagely murdered in his opulent villa in La Celle-Saint-Cloud, near Paris. It soon becomes clear that the man has been tortured prior to death. At several points during this extraordinary enquiry, police will feel theyre holding the culprit... It will take them ten years to finally shed light on this particularly violent crime.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The lifeless body of Christophe Lejard is found by his son just metres from their home. The man was shot in the head as he was getting into his car to go to work. A veritable execution, which at first glance doesnt square with the profile of the quiet family man. Yet behind the appearances, the investigation gradually reveals all the hate and resentment that revolved around the victim.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A man walks into a gendarmerie near Saint-Malo to report that his wife has been missing since the previous day. The couple are going through a divorce, but this mother would never have left her seven children alone! An extensive search is undertaken but the woman cannot be found. What has happened to Adeline Piet? The investigation spans several years and experiences many twists.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The corpse of Priscillia Ciatti, 14, is discovered by the side of a field, a few hundred metres from her family home. The teenager has been stabbed sixty times with a knife and -an extra sordid detail - a devil mask is found next to her body. Was Priscillia the victim of a prowler? A serial killer? A maniac inspired by a horror movie? Investigators soon find that the young girl felt she was being watched, and even threatened...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: In the early hours of the morning, Mathilde Croguennec, 18, attending "Teknival" in Brittany, is found at the foot of a tree with her throat cut. Investigators face the task of finding the killer from among the 43,000 participants of this huge open-air festival of electronic music, where drink and drugs are consumed in abundance. An unusual investigation that leads the police down a number of false avenues.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Arriving at her work, the secretary of a small firm in the suburbs of Geneva finds the body of Jean-Raymond Blatti, the companys new accountant. The man is lying in a pool of blood and, on his belly, the murderer has written "DIRTY RAPIST". Yet Jean-Raymond Blatti was never charged with sexual assault. Over the course of the investigation, this inscription will appear as one of the many mysteries of this case which is particularly rich in twists and turns.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 19th 2004, the naked and tied up body of a woman is recovered in the Ourcq canal in Fresnes-sur-Marne. The victim is impossible to identify.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On April 3th 2003, Chantal Ternik, a 48 year old housewife, is discovered hanged in her house of Sanary-sur-Mer, in Var.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On March 28th 2013, the burnt body of Anne Barbot, 38 years old, is discovered in a forest of Maine-et-Loire.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On May 17th 2005, a body is discovered in a forest of Sucy-en-Brie; Christophe Belle, 40 years old, a renowned pastry cook.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The disturbing missing case in Paris of a four year old.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On October 13th 1996, the body of young Angelique Dumetz, 18 years old, is recovered down a ditch in Oise forest. An important clue is found on the crime scene.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On February 23th 2017, policemen are alerted of the disapearrance of Brigitte Troadec, her husband Pascal, and their children Sebastien and Charlotte.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Night of Horror at Devils Plateau (Marie-Jeanne Meyer Case) - On June 18, 2011, Marie-Jeanne Meyer, 17-years old, waved goodbye to her little sister before leaving for her daily jog on the heights of Tournon in Ardèche. She never came back. Three days later, her mutilated body was found in a freshly dug pit, near an area known to be cursed, "The Devils Plateau." Whats more, the crime scene looked like a mystical ritual ... Was it a ritual murder? Revenge? An unfortunate encounter? ...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Mysterious Murder at the Farm (Valerie Bary Case)- On Friday, March 26, 2004, in the region of Dijon, Laurent Bary came home from his work to discover the lifeless body of his wife, Valerie, bathing in a pool of blood. According to the investigators initial findings, the 38-year-old nurses aid had been stabbed several times, seeming to validate the theory of a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 13, 2011, two boaters retrieved a suitcase that was floating in the bay of Lorient. Inside, they discovered the tied up corpse of a man.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Bloody Christmas next to the Leman lake (CASE OF RUTH LÉGERET) - On January 4, 2006, Ruth Legeret was found dead in the middle of a pool of blood at her luxurious property in Vevey, Switzerland. programme.title: Parks
programme.desc: New York City might be known as the concrete jungle, but its nearly 30,000 acres of park space have been an ever-present part of this bustling metropolis.

programme.title: Airports
programme.desc: New York has one of the busiest airspaces in the world. Here is how New Yorks airports have evolved to handle 140 million passengers each year.

programme.title: Electricity
programme.desc: Keeping the lights on in New York City is no easy task and as New York moves towards a greener future how we generate electricity will have to evolve.

programme.title: Water
programme.desc: Getting water from upstate reservoirs to the taps of over 8.5 million people in New York City is no easy feat.

programme.title: Rats
programme.desc: New York is known as one of the rattiest cities in America with an estimated population of close to 2 million rodents. Here is how New York City rats out its rodents.

programme.title: Taxis
programme.desc: The yellow taxi cab is the quintessential New York City ride. But today the threat of ride-share apps and city scandal has left cab drivers to face devastating debt.

programme.title: Trash
programme.desc: Many things come to mind when thinking about New York, but how the city deals with its garbage is usually not one of them. Here is how the city hauls away its trash.

programme.title: Sewage
programme.desc: New Yorkers create, on average, 1.3 billion gallons of wastewater per day that makes its way through 7,500 miles of pipes that make up the citys sewer system.

programme.title: Steam
programme.desc: Many dont know it, but New York is a city that runs on steam. Its one of the few cities that relies on this old technology to heat some of its most famous buildings.

programme.title: Bridges
programme.desc: New York has some of the most iconic bridges. These engineering marvels have helped set the tone for how bridges around the world are designed.

programme.title: Parks
programme.desc: New York City might be known as the concrete jungle, but its nearly 30,000 acres of park space have been an ever-present part of this bustling metropolis.

programme.title: Airports
programme.desc: New York has one of the busiest airspaces in the world. Here is how New Yorks airports have evolved to handle 140 million passengers each year.

programme.title: Episode 1: The Rise Of Civilization
programme.desc: About 8,000 BC, in a few select places some people begin to experiment with a new way of harvesting energy. They’re growing their own crops.

programme.title: Episode 2: The Age Of Discovery
programme.desc: Columbus has no idea that because of Earth’s geology and geography he wont get to his destination…or how that failure made his voyage one of the most influential.

programme.title: Episode 3: The Industrial Revolution And Modern Warfare
programme.desc: How do prehistoric forests link to the development of steam engines, and the rise of modern industry?

programme.title: The Vikings: Origin of the Vikings
programme.desc: From the ice fields of the North to the Russian steppe, these fearsome Scandinavian warriors sailed the globe for three centuries spreading their net of trade and pillage

programme.title: The Vikings: Early Viking Society and Religion
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn how early Viking society developed, what the sacred rituals really were, and what role women played in Viking religion.

programme.title: The Vikings: The Ships of the Vikings
programme.desc: Ships carried Nordic warriors all the way from their Scandinavian homes to lands of conquest. How were these ergonomic ships built and what made them so special?

programme.title: The Vikings: Weapons of the Vikings
programme.desc: The Vikings were fighting machines, plundering lands from central Asia to North America and defeated the armies of the greatest empires. What was their secret?

programme.title: Catherine the Great
programme.desc: Can we copy Catherine The Great’s diet? In our new series with @My Name Is Andong, we’re exploring how to eat like different legendary figures from history.

programme.title: A Wolf
programme.desc: In this episode of EAT Like, @MyNameIsAndong explores what wolves eat, and how their eating habits are different than the modern domestic dogs.

programme.title: A Viking
programme.desc: In this episode of EAT LIKE, @My Name Is Andong explores what Vikings eat and common misconceptions about them.

programme.title: The Invention of Cooking
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The History of Food
programme.desc: Humans have depended on fire for millennia, but do we fully understand the impact it has had on our diet?

programme.title: The Agricultural Revolution
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The History of Food
programme.desc: From the first row of planted crops, the practice of agriculture rendered mans hunter-gatherer lifestyles obsolete in favor of settled life and stable food supplies.

programme.title: Fermentation, Preservation and Exploration
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The History of Food
programme.desc: Just as humans have always sought food to survive, we have also sought the means to preserve that food. With preservation, we can plan for times of scarcity.

programme.title: The Industry of Food
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The History of Food
programme.desc: Over the brief span of the 20th century, agriculture underwent greater change than it had since it was first practiced some 12,000 years ago.

programme.title: The Future of Food
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The History of Food
programme.desc: Industrialized and processed food has dominated the last century. Now, the question is, whats next?

programme.title: Against All Odds; Defending the Legacy
programme.desc: The 2020 Alcoa Tornadoes football season is about to kick off with many obstacles, nearly halting a sixth straight championship. A star senior defends his family legacy.

programme.title: Defending the Legacy
programme.desc: The 2020 season gets off to a rocky start for Alcoa and a star senior defends his family legacy.

programme.title: The Battle of Pistol Creek
programme.desc: The Tornadoes face off against their arch-rivals, the Maryville Rebels, and then suffer a series of devastating losses and look to heal deep wounds.

programme.title: Part 2: 4th and Forever: Alcoa
programme.desc: The Tornadoes suffer a series of devastating losses and look to heal deep wounds.

programme.title: Cleaning the Wounds; The Push Begins
programme.desc: Tensions rise between a star player and the head coach and a Tornado player is the first to be infected with the COVID-19 virus, putting the team to the test.

programme.desc: A Tornado player is the first to be infected with the COVID-19 virus and a David vs. Goliath matchup puts the team to the test.

programme.title: Home Stretch; Never a Doubt
programme.desc: The playoffs have begun for the Tornadoes. They then face their final opponent in their quest to win the state championship, ending their longstanding journey together.

programme.desc: Humans seem to be on the cusp of reaching Mars, but how did we get to this point?

programme.desc: Science may soon make the dream of traveling to Mars a reality, but how will we live once we get there?

programme.title: First Martians
programme.desc: Sometime in the future humans will leave Earth to colonize Mars, and in doing so will begin to adapt to life on another planet in surprising ways.

programme.title: Stephen Hawkings Favorite Places
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Stephen Hawkings Favorite Places
programme.desc: Commander Stephen Hawking pilots his space ship the SS Hawking on the journey of a lifetime, zooming from black holes to the Big Bang, Saturn to Santa Barbara.

programme.title: Stephen Hawkings Favorite Places 3
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Stephen Hawkings Favorite Places
programme.desc: Commander Stephen Hawking and his space ship the SS Hawking encounter an alien A.I., then race to the edge of the universe, and plunge into an alternate Earth.

programme.title: Stephen Hawkings Favorite Places 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Stephen Hawkings Favorite Places
programme.desc: Commander Stephen Hawking takes another journey in his space ship, the SS Hawking, this time to Venus, the Sun and out to the Eagle Nebula.

programme.title: Destination: Pluto Beyond The Flyby
programme.desc: Join the New Horizons team to examine the latest findings and imagery from Pluto and the fringes of our solar system. They reveal a world unlike any other weve seen yet!

programme.title: Miniverse
programme.desc: Join astronaut Chris Hadfield, along with hitchhikers Michio Kaku (and others) on a joyride across our Solar System, scaled down to the size of the continental US.

programme.title: Return to the Moon
programme.desc: The Apollo equipment has sat abandoned on the lunar surface for over 40 years. Now there is a renewed excitement and drive to return to the moon.

programme.title: Black Coal, Thin Ice
programme.desc: Pohjois-Kiinassa vuonna 1999 eraassa pikkukaupungissa loydetaan useita ruumiita. Kaksi poliisivirkailijaa kuolee ja yksi loukkaantuu vakavasti verisessa yhteenotossa, kun epailtya murhaajaa yritetaan ottaa kiinni. Eloon jaanyt poliisi Zhang Zili joutuu luopumaan virastaan ja loytaa tyopaikan tehtaan vartijana. Viisi vuotta myohemmin tapahtuu jalleen useita mysteerisia murhia. Entinen kollega apunaan Zhang alkaa itse tutkia tapausta. Palkitun ohjaajan Diao Yinanin kolmas elokuva on film noir -trilleri, jonka paaosissa esiintyvat Fan Liao, Lun Mei Gwei ja Xuebing Wang. Elokuva voitti vuoden 2014 Berliinin elokuvajuhlien Kultaisen karhun ja Hopeisen karhun.

programme.title: Undergods
programme.desc: Mustalla huumorilla viimeistelty scifidystopia maailmasta, jossa vain harva on selvinnyt ja selviytyjistakin jokainen on omalla tavallaan vahan rikki. Kafkamainen miljoo yhdistettyna 2020-luvun romahtaneisiin unelmiin saa jo itsessaan katsojan ihon kananlihalle. Elokuva alkaa, kun kaksi ruumiinkeraajaa kiertelee pitkin autioituneita katuja ja kertoilee tyonsa lomassa romuttuneista haaveistaan, jotka ajoivat heidat tahan kolkkoon nykyhetkeen.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Rules Dont Apply
programme.desc: Hollywoodissa vuonna 1958 nayttelijattaren (Lily Collins) ja hanen autonkuljettajansa (Alden Ehrenreich) valinen vetovoima koettelee heidan uskonnollista vakaumustaan ja uhmaa heidan pomonsa Howard Hughesin (Warren Beatty) saantoa, joka kieltaa heita tapailemasta. Beattyn ohjaaman (ja Beattyn ja Bo Goldmanin kasikirjoittaman) draamakomedian tahtia ovat myos Annette Bening ja Matthew Broderick.

programme.title: Boys on the Side
programme.desc: Vauhdikkaassa komediassa kolme naista tekee vahingossa rikoksen ja joutuu lahtemaan karkuteille. Naiset lahtevat taipaleelle koko maan halki, ja matkan aikana he kokevat jotain heille ennalta tuntematonta: yhteenkuuluvuuden tunnetta ja ystavyytta.

programme.title: Hakutulokset (Birdman)
programme.desc: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) on musta komedia paluuta tekevasta nayttelijasta (Michael Keaton), joka on jaanyt kuuluisan supersankarihahmonsa vangiksi. Kiinnityksen saaminen uskottavaksi Broadway-nayttelijaksi ei ole helppoa, ja nayttelija paatyy ryhtymaan ohjaajaksi.

programme.title: Dont Come Knocking
programme.desc: Hollywood-tahti Howard Spence (Sam Shepard) on nahnyt parempiakin paivia, mutta nyt han ratsastaa vain menneella maineellaan. Jalleen yhden irstailuillan jalkeen han pakenee uuden lankkarin kuvauksista ja ratsastaa preerialle kuin yksi sankareista, joita han on niin usein naytellyt. Han etsii suojaa aitinsa (Eva Marie Saint) luota, jota han ei ole nahnyt vuosiin. Tosin siellakaan han ei viivy kauan saatuaan tietaa, etta hanella saattaa olla poika, josta han ei ole tiennyt. Howardille tama tuo toivoa siita, ettei hanen elamansa ole ollutkaan taysin turhaa. Ehka jossain on paikka, jonne han kuuluu.

programme.title: Finding Altamira
programme.desc: Maria on pikkuvanha tytto, joka ei muuta halua kuin tulla arkeologiksi kuten isansa Marcelino. He tutkivat yhdessa paikallista Altamiran luolaa ja loytavat muinaisia luolamaalauksia, jotka kuvaavat harkia ja ihmiselaman eri muotoja.

programme.title: Dinner Rush
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu Manhattanille, Louis Cropan omistamaan ravintola Gigino Trattoriaan. Louis Cropan poika Udo toimii ravintolan paakokkina, ja on onnistunut saavuttamaan ravintolalle mainetta kokkaustaidoillaan. Louis Cropa ei kuitenkaan ole iloinen aikaisemmin perinteista kotiruokaa tarjoilleen trattoriansa muuttumisesta yhdeksi New Yorkin trendikkaimmista ravintoloista. Omistajan elamantilannetta ei helpota sekaan, etta hanen liikekumppaninsa on vasta vahan aikaan sitten murhattu, ja hanen suojatikseen ottamansa ravintolan apukokki Duncan karsii pahasta peliriippuvuudesta.

programme.title: The Greatest
programme.desc: Allen ja Grace Brewerin vanhin poika on kuollut auto-onnettomuudessa. Yhtakkiaovikello soi, ja oven takana on Rose. Han vaittaa tunteneensa pojan ja kantavansahanen lastaan. Tieto saa perheen etaantymaan toisistaan. Voiko kauheista onnettomuuksista seurata kuitenkin jotain hyvaa?

programme.title: Varastetut lapset
programme.desc: Kolme puoliksi valkoihoista ja puoliksi aboriginaalia tyttoa koulutetaan tyoskentelemaan kotiapulaisina valkoisissa perheissa ja heita valmistellaan menemaan naimisiin valkoihoisten miesten kanssa. Mutta tytot paattavat paeta, ja he lahtevat seuraamaan yli 1 500 mailin pituista osavaltion raja-aitaa mullistavassa seikkailussa Australian eramaassa.

programme.title: On Aika Tappaa
programme.desc: Elokuvan ohjaaja on Joel Schumacher (Batman Forever, Paamies). Sandra Bullock, Samuel L. Jackson, Matchew McConaughey ja Kevin Spacey esittavat paaosia murhaoikeudenkaynnissa, joka nostaa pienen mississippilaiskaupungin rotujannitteet valokeilaan. Aktivistimarssien, Ku Kluz Klanin hirmuvallan, mediarummutuksen ja vakivaltaisten mellakoiden keskella kokematon, mutta idealistinen nuori asianajaja jarjestaa aj atuksia herattavan oikeussalitaistelun oikeuden puolesta. Loisteliaasseen nayttelijakaartiin kuuluvat myos Breda Fricker, Oliver Platt, CharlesS. Dutton, Ashley Judd, Patrick McGoohan, Chris Cooper ja seka Donald etta Kiefer Sutherland.

programme.title: Koston liekki
programme.desc: Rankasti ryyppaava, loppuunpalanut CIA:n agentti John Creasy (Denzel Washington) on luopunut toivosta elamansa suhteen – kunnes hanet palkataan yhdeksanvuotiaan Pita Ramosin (Dakota Fanning) henkivartijaksi. Pala palalta Creasyn sisin alkaa eheytya, mutta kun Pita kidnapataan, paasee Creasyn tukahdutettu raivo valloilleen eika han pysahdy ennen kuin teko on kostettu. Loppuun asti.

programme.title: Candy
programme.desc: Candy (Abbie Cornish) ja Dan (Heath Ledger) rakastavat toisiaan ja heroiinia, joka tuntuu vain lisaavan heidan keskinaista onneaan. Mikaan ei voi menna pieleen, kunhan heilla on toisensa. Avioliitto ja lapsi vain lujittavat sidetta. Mutta vahitellen harmiton tapa saa yliotteen ja uhkaa tuhota pienen paratiisin. Candyn vanhemmat ja Danin ystava Casper (Geoffrey Rush) alkavat menettaa toivonsa pariskunnan vajotessa yha syvemmalle omaan rakkauden ja heroiinin savyttamaan maailmaansa...

programme.title: Teen Spirit
programme.desc: Rikkinaisessa perheessa kasvanut 17-vuotias Violet (Fanning) unelmoi pop-tahteydesta ja paosta pienesta englantilaisesta kotikylastaan. Toivoa hanelle tuo kansallinen laulukilpailu Teen Spirit ja epatavallinen mentori, joka opettaa hanta laulamaan sydamestaan. Tie menestykseen on kuitenkin taynna vaaroja ja houkutuksia. Violetin on voitettava epavarmuutensa uskaltaakseen olla oma itsensa ja paastakseen lopulta loistamaan.

programme.title: Griffin and Phoenix
programme.desc: Kun Griffin saa kuulla, etta hanella on kuolemaan johtava sairaus, han paattaa ottaa kohtalonsa omiin kasiinsa ja elaa taysilla loppuun asti. Han tapaa Phoenixin ja aikaa myoten rakastuu tahan, mutta myos Phoenixilla on salaisuus...

programme.title: Frozen River
programme.desc: Hieman ennen jouluaattoa Yhdysvaltojen ja Kanadan rajalla Ray Eddy joutuu ottamaan asiat omiin kasiinsa, kun hanen miehensa katoaa perheen rahojen kanssa. Ray lyottaytyy yhteen alkuperaisasukas Lila Littlewolfin kanssa, joka elattaa itsensa salakuljettamalla laittomia siirtolaisia rajan yli. Frozen River on karu rikosdraama, joka sai ensi-iltansa Sundancen elokuvajuhlilla vuonna 2008 ja voitti siella Grand Jury Prizen. Elokuva on ollut myos Oscar-ehdokkaana parhaan naispaaosan ja parhaan alkuperaisen kasikirjoituksen kategorioissa.

programme.title: The Greatest
programme.desc: Allen ja Grace Brewerin vanhin poika on kuollut auto-onnettomuudessa. Yhtakkiaovikello soi, ja oven takana on Rose. Han vaittaa tunteneensa pojan ja kantavansahanen lastaan. Tieto saa perheen etaantymaan toisistaan. Voiko kauheista onnettomuuksista seurata kuitenkin jotain hyvaa?

programme.title: The Truth Commissioner
programme.desc: Totuuskomissaari paljastaa synkkia salaisuuksia Pohjois-Irlannissa, missa valta ja menneisyys tormaavat oikeuden ja sovinnon puolesta.

programme.title: Boys on the Side
programme.desc: Vauhdikkaassa komediassa kolme naista tekee vahingossa rikoksen ja joutuu lahtemaan karkuteille. Naiset lahtevat taipaleelle koko maan halki, ja matkan aikana he kokevat jotain heille ennalta tuntematonta: yhteenkuuluvuuden tunnetta ja ystavyytta.

programme.title: Beatrix Potter
programme.desc: Han on ihastuttanut monia sukupolvia, mutta hanen elamansa on ollut salaisuus. Tahan saakka. Beatrix Potter on 30-vuotias sinkkunainen aikana, jolloin naisen kunnioitettavin tehtava on menna hyviin naimisiin. Kukaan, ei edes Beatrixin oma perhe, ymmarra sita, etta Beatrix haluaa mieluummin piirtaa ja kertoa tarinoita elaimista. Kaikki menee pieleen, kun Beatrix tapaa kokemattoman kustantajan Norman Waynen, joka rakastuu korviaan myoten niin Beatrixin ainutlaatuisiin tarinoihin kuin itse Beatrixiinkin. Beatrix joutuu mahdottomaan tilanteeseen, jossa hanen pitaa irrottautua perheen tukahduttavasta otteesta.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Vuonna 1961 Neuvostoliiton ensimmainen ydinsukellusvene lahtee ensimmaiselle matkalleen Pohjois-Atlantille. Mutta sukellusvene ei toimi optimaalisesti, ja koska ydinreaktorissa ilmenee ongelmia, silla on katastrofaaliset seuraukset miehistoon. Miehiston on taisteltava yhdessa ydinkatastrofin valttamiseksi, joka on seka hengenvaarallinen etta voi aloittaa uuden maailmansodan suurvaltojen valilla.

programme.title: Dinner Rush
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu Manhattanille, Louis Cropan omistamaan ravintola Gigino Trattoriaan. Louis Cropan poika Udo toimii ravintolan paakokkina, ja on onnistunut saavuttamaan ravintolalle mainetta kokkaustaidoillaan. Louis Cropa ei kuitenkaan ole iloinen aikaisemmin perinteista kotiruokaa tarjoilleen trattoriansa muuttumisesta yhdeksi New Yorkin trendikkaimmista ravintoloista. Omistajan elamantilannetta ei helpota sekaan, etta hanen liikekumppaninsa on vasta vahan aikaan sitten murhattu, ja hanen suojatikseen ottamansa ravintolan apukokki Duncan karsii pahasta peliriippuvuudesta.

programme.title: This is England
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu 1980-luvun Englantiin, jossa Falklandin sotaan lahetetaan jatkuvasti lisaa sotilaita ja kansallismieliset saavat jalansijaa tyovaenluokkaisten tyottomien keskuudessa. Skan ja Oi-punkin kannattajat jakautuvat musiikin ystaviin ja skineihin. Taman kaiken keskella 12-vuotias Shaun loytaa skinijengin kanssa yhteisen savelen.

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: Camp X-Ray kertoo nuoresta naisesta, joka liittyy Yhdysvaltain armeijaan ollakseen osa jotain itseaan ja pikkukaupunkinsa juuria suurempaa. Han paatyy kuitenkin vartijaksi Guantanamo Bayhin, missa han solmii ystavyyssuhteen yhden vangin kanssa. Eettisia kysymyksia pohtiessaan naiden kahden eri lahtokohdista tulleen ihmisen ystavyys muuttaa heidan molempien elaman.

programme.title: Winged Creatures
programme.desc: Tavallinen paiva tavallisessa ravintolassa Los Angelesissa. Rauha rikkoutuu silmanrapayksessa, kun psykopaatti astelee sisaan ravintolaan, ottaa aseen esiin ja alkaa ampua eparoimatta ympariinsa. Osa ihmisista kuolee. Henkiinjaaneet yrittavat ymmartaa mita on tapahtunut, ja miten elamalle saa taas uuden merkityksen ja turvallisuuden tunteen.

programme.title: Finding Altamira
programme.desc: Maria on pikkuvanha tytto, joka ei muuta halua kuin tulla arkeologiksi kuten isansa Marcelino. He tutkivat yhdessa paikallista Altamiran luolaa ja loytavat muinaisia luolamaalauksia, jotka kuvaavat harkia ja ihmiselaman eri muotoja.

programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: The suburbs of Glasgow have been home to Malcolm for 30 years. Now he wants to escape to Sir Walter Scott country–the Scottish Borders. Melissa Porter turns up a few surprises in her search for a traditional cottage for Malcolm and his partner Cath.

programme.title: North London to Peak Distrct
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Two years in London has been plenty for Tim, Donna, and their young son James. Now a new job sends them to the Peak District. Tim wants a DIY project but Donna’s not so sure. Melissa Porter finds out how adventurous they are with their £600k budget.

programme.title: Dartford to North Devon
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Michael and Diana want a complete change of lifestyle with a move to Devon. Driving instructor Michael wants to turn his back on Dartford’s congestion. He and Diana have £375k to find a home that will attract friends and family for the weekend.

programme.title: Bristol to the Wye Valley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Escape to the Country
programme.desc: The Simmonds family loves the great outdoors. Now Mark and his wife Lynda have put their Bristol home up for sale so they can move there permanently. Mom wants peace and quiet, dad wants outbuildings, and young Adam and Sophie want space to play.

programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Escape to the Country

programme.desc: Melissa Porter has a modest £250, 000 to spend to bring together a couple who met on the internet. Wendi and her partner Ben want to live under the one roof in West Yorkshire – they say they are happy to renovate but just how brave are they?

programme.desc: The 1966 murders of three police officers in Shepherds Bush lead to a huge manhunt and calls for the reinstatement of the death penalty.

programme.title: Murder Maps

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Kun Pyrianin pyroformerit hyokkaavat Kansainyhteison planeetalle, Dylan joutuu taistelemaan uuden planeetan suojelemiseksi.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan kuulee aania, jotka kutsuvat hanta tulen ja jaan planeetalle.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Miehisto joutuu kahden Nietzschean ylpeyden valiseen taisteluun vangitessaan vihamielisen, joka vaittaa, etta hanen ylpeydellaan on liukuvirran kartta.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Miehisto etsii kadonnutta nietzschelaisten siirtokuntaa ja loytaa toisen miehiston, joka on salaa auttanut heita.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Miehisto asentaa uuden tekoalyn uuteen kansainyhteison taistelulaivaan, ja luonnollisesti asiat eivat suju niin kuin pitaisi.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Tyr vakuuttaa nietzschelaiset siita, etta han on Drago Musevenin reinkarnaatio.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Viesti kerailijalta lahettaa Dylanin pelastamaan panttivangin ja loytamaan Kansainyhteison laivaston jaannokset.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Citizen Eight yrittaa poistaa Dylanin Andromedan komennosta.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Nietzschelaiset kidnappaavat Dylanin ja pakottavat hanet pelaamaan ajatusleikkeja vangitsijoidensa huviksi.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Kaksi Nietzschean sisarusta ovat vastakkainasettelussa Aseesta, joka voi poistaa korkeammat aivotoiminnot.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Tyr palaa liittyneena Keraajiin ja vaatii entisilta miehistotovereiltaan aikojen reittia.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Seurauksena on panttivankitilanne, kun miehisto kohtaa Tyrin.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromedan miehisto ryhtyy selvittamaan, kuka tappoi tutkijaryhman.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Miehisto palkattiin pelastamaan prinsessa pahamaineisesta lainsuojattomat, mutta pian paljastuu, etta han yritti paeta murhaa isansa kadesta.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Keraajat hallitsevat nyt Kansainyhteisoa ja panevat Andromedan miehiston oikeudenkaynti.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromeda loytaa biopanssarilahetyksen.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromeda joutuu kahden aluksen valiseen sotaan, johon liittyy kuolemaan johtava tauti.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Rev huijaa Dylania ja kidnappaa hanet. Miehisto loytaa odottamattoman liittolaisen kerailijasta.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Abyss on tartuttanut Beka. Miehiston on loydettava keino pelastaa hanet.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Kun osa miehistosta vangitaan, Harper joutuu tyoskentelemaan Patriarkan aikasillalla.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Tri Gemman vakooja ilmestyy Andromedalle yrittaessaan varastaa tahtikartan.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Abyss tappaa Bekan ystavan, ja miehiston on selvitettava, mita tietoja varten he tappoivat.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromeda pelastaa aluksen, joka palaa rauhanneuvotteluista Magogin kanssa.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Magogin hyokkayksella on vakavat seuraukset. Andromeda tuhoutuu, Trancen ja Dylanin oletetaan olevan ainoat eloonjaaneet, ja Dylan pakenee ikiaikojen reittia.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan paatyy Seefraan, jossa taikauskoisella vaestolla ei ole teknologiaa.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Kavi ilmi, etta Doyle on Harperin rakentama androidi, joka sisaltaa Rommien ydinohjelmoinnin.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka voittaa palkinnon radio-DJ:lta, saa tietaa totuuden Seefrasta ja loytaa Meethus-kaavion.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Alkuperaisen Kansainyhteison tiedemies ilmestyy, kiinni ajan silmukassa.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Flavin palaa, mika sytyttaa jengisodan, ja auttaa Dylania kehittymaan Paradinina.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Seefrasta loydetaan tunneleita, joiden kautta voi paasta kahdeksalle muulle Seefra-planeetalle.

programme.desc: Kun vanha mies tapetaan, Beka, Rhade ja Harper ovat paa epailtyja ja joutuvat oikeuteen.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Rhade johtaa kapinallisia taistelussa Seefra-5:n sotapaallikkoa vastaan.

programme.title: Andromeda

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 GLORY Last Man Standing
programme.desc: "Last Man Standing" features a lineup of the worlds top Middleweight talent: EIGHT men will fight to the finish in a ONE night tournament, with the tournament winner being crowned the GLORY Middleweight Champion of the World. Last Man Standing will also feature TWO World Title fights, including Daniel Ghita versus Rico Verhoeven for the vacant Heavyweight Title, and Marc de Bonte versus Joseph Valtellini as de Bonte defends his newly won Welterweight Title.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 4 Tokyo featured a one-night, single-elimination 16-man Glory Heavyweight Grand Slam Tournament. The winner brought home a $400,000 first-place prize and the runner-up a $100,000 second-place prize.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E03 GLORY 100 Last Heavyweight Standing
programme.desc: GLORY 100 features four GLORY world title bouts, four separate four-man one-night tournaments to determine who qualifies for the Last Heavyweight Standing finals, and several key matchups involving some of GLORY’s most popular fighters.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 4 Tokyo featured a one-night, single-elimination 16-man Glory Heavyweight Grand Slam Tournament. The winner brought home a $400,000 first-place prize and the runner-up a $100,000 second-place prize.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E03 GLORY 100 Last Heavyweight Standing
programme.desc: GLORY 100 features four GLORY world title bouts, four separate four-man one-night tournaments to determine who qualifies for the Last Heavyweight Standing finals, and several key matchups involving some of GLORY’s most popular fighters.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E06 GLORY 10 Los Angeles SFS
programme.desc: GLORY 10: Los Angeles on September 28, 2013 at the Citizens Business Bank Arena in Ontario, California. The highlight of the event featured a Glory Middleweight World Championship Tournament.[15] Two tournament matches were held, with a third match as reserve. The winners of the two semi-final bouts, proceeded to the finals for the championship main-event. The event also featured eight other non-tournament bouts.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY returns to the US with a four-man Middleweight Tournament to decide the GLORY Middleweight title. Plus two lightweight match ups with Robin van Roosmalen taking on Shemsi Beqiri and Davit Kiria meeting Murthel Groenhart.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Glory 09: New York was a kickboxing event held on June 22, 2013 at the Hammerstein Ballroom in New York City, New York. This event featured a Glory 95kg Slam Tournament.

programme.desc: Glory 08: Tokyo was a kickboxing event held on May 3, 2013 at the Ariake Coliseum in Tokyo, Japan. This event featured a Glory 65kg Slam Tournament.

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its judgement day as the chefs not only learn the top three desserts but the judges announce the winning menu. Fast show writer and performer Charlie Higson helps judge the puddings.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the climax of the competition as the winning chefs cook at the Comic Relief Banquet at the Royal Albert Hall. But its not plain sailing - the chefs have to contend with getting into the kitchen late.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today three of Scotlands top chefs, Jak ODonnell, Jimmy Lee, and Graham Campbell attempt to impress this weeks veteran judge. Returning finalist Jak is determined to make it to the banquet, but newcomers Jimmy and Graham are out to steal her crown.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today Scottish chefs, Jak ODonnell, Jimmy Lee and Graham Campbell fight it out for the fish course. Graham is in a confident mood but returning finalist Jak and Jimmy are pushing him hard. Will the pressure prove too much for ambitious Graham?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today Scottish chefs Jak ODonnell, Jimmy Lee and Graham Campbell are battling to plate up a perfect main course for this weeks veteran chef. Self-taught Jimmy is honouring his Mum with his rendition of her Chinese Beef Stew.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today its the Scottish chefs last chance to impress, with the dessert course. Only two can cook for the judges tomorrow, and with one chef in the lead after a triumphant main, the pressures on for the other two to plate up perfection.

programme.desc: Today the two remaining Scottish chefs cook their entire menus again for the judges Prue Leith, Oliver Peyton and Matthew Fort. Theyre joined by WI Calendar Girl Angela Baker, who will help decide which chef will go forward to the National Finals.

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.desc: Its a battle for the main course with the Welsh chefs - Stephen Gomes, Adam Bannister and Phil Carmichael are going head to head. With all 3 chefs paying homage to Welsh lamb; the pressure is on to deliver a main worthy of their veterans approval.

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.desc: Today is the head to head. The two highest scoring chefs from Wales are cooking for judges Oliver Peyton, Prue Leith and Matthew Fort who are joined by guest judge, blogger and food writer Rosie Birkett.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Three newcomers are competing to become regional Central champion - Daniel Smith, Andrew Scott and Danny Gill. Danny Gill is a former head chef at Daniel Cliffords two star restaurant Midsummer House.

programme.desc: It is the fish course and the chefs are using some of the UKs best seafood: lobster, salmon and Cornish crab. Daniel Smith may be classically trained but hes decided to take a risk adding a cheese custard to his lobster dish.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Two chefs are cooking venison. Danny Gill is making a venison wellington, inspired by his Dad, a former RAF chef who has served up Wellington for royalty. While Andrew Scott has sourced his venison from the Queens Scottish estate, Balmoral.

programme.title: Great British Menu
