programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Mini Patel is back for a second attempt at the North East Regional title but hes competing against two young newcomers Tommy Banks and Chris Archer.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: It is the fish course and two chefs from the North East, Tommy and Mini, have very similar ingredients - both are cooking mackerel.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the main course of the North East Region and overnight there has been a dramatic development. Its a tough and emotional day for the chefs.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: It is a highly emotional day for one of the chefs as he prepares a dish which is inspired by and a tribute to his own Great Briton, his late Grandfather.

programme.title: Death on High Mountain
programme.desc: A major robbery spirals out of control when two young men cross paths with ruthless Mexican bandits and a corrupt businessman—both desperate to reclaim the stolen loot. Caught in a deadly chase, the youths face danger, betrayal, and the fight for survival.

programme.title: The Return of Jack Slade
programme.desc: Jack Slade, son of a legendary lawman, infiltrates a ruthless gang of outlaws to bring them down from within. After his friend is killed, Slade sets a deadly trap with the help of a Pinkerton agent. Deception, betrayal, and revenge ride hard in this classic Western showdown.

programme.title: In a Colts Shadow
programme.desc: A story about two gunfighters, Duke and Steve. Steve is in love with Dukes daughter but Duke disapproves of the match, envisioning a life of hardship and danger for the girl if she marries Steve.

programme.title: Reverends Colt
programme.desc: Reverend Miller arrives in Tucson where he wants to build a church, but on the very day of his arrival a gang raids the bank and the people of Tucson, suspicious of the new reverend because he is carrying a gun, immediately blame him for the robbery.

programme.title: Troublemakers
programme.desc: Two brothers who hate each other are going to spend Christmas with their mother. She tries to get them together.

programme.title: Return of Sabata
programme.desc: Hobsonvilles citizens hire a gunslinger to rid them of the McIntock clan that is forcibly and unlawfully taxing the townsfolk under the pretext of town development.

programme.title: Colt in the Hand of the Devil
programme.desc: Scotty is hired to eliminate a gang of Mexican bandits led by El Condor. He cleverly earns their trust to trap them—but as he bonds with El Condor, a true friendship and mutual respect begin to challenge his mission.

programme.title: Hate your Neighbour
programme.desc: Ken wants justice for his brother Bill, who was killed by a notorious gunman named Stevens for a goldmine map. The gunman is arguing with gangster Malone (Horst Frank) about the map. A deadly cat and mouse game between the three men ensues.

programme.title: Mackenzies Raiders EP36-38
programme.desc: Colonel Mackenzie, commander of the 4th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Clark near Brackettville in Kinney County in southwest Texas during the 1870s, receives secret orders from President Ulysses S. Grant and Secretary of War William W. Belknap to stop bandits from crossing the Rio Grande into the United States, or from returning to Mexico.

programme.title: Deadly Trackers
programme.desc: Jeff sets out to murder each one of the five outlaws who robbed, raped and killed his poor sister.

programme.title: The Over-the-Hill Gang Rides Again
programme.desc: Retired Texas Ranger Nash Crawford re-assembles his former Ranger outfit from the old days to fight crime in his hometown.

programme.title: Beauty and the Bandit
programme.desc: In Old California, a Frenchman carrying silver is ambushed by Cisco, a bandit claiming the money belongs to the poor. When the "Frenchman" is revealed to be Jeanne DuBois, she follows Cisco to his lair. As romance blooms, Cisco offers to return the silver to her. Jeanne must now choose between her deal and aiding Ciscos quest to help the needy.

programme.title: Running Target
programme.desc: In the Colorado Rockies, Sheriff Scott, heads a posse that is after four escaped convicts, and thought it is his sworn duty to return the men dead or alive, he is, as always, reluctant to kill his fellow man.

programme.title: China 9, Liberty 37
programme.desc: The railroad hires a condemned killer to murder an uncooperative rancher but the assassin fails to deliver, prompting the railroad men to go after him instead.

programme.title: Bandidos
programme.desc: Renowned gunman Richard Martin is traveling on a train, held up by Billy Kane, a former student of Martins. Kane spares Martin, but only after shooting his hands. Years later, Martin meets an escaped convict, wrongly convicted for the train robbery. Martin trains his new student and both men seek out Billy Kane.

programme.title: Three Graves for a Winchester
programme.desc: Ringo Carson has a tough life. First, he has a falling out with his best friend, Frank Sanders, after saving Jane, the girl he loves, from Mexican kidnappers in order to extort a ransom from her gunrunner father.

programme.title: Gentleman Killer
programme.desc: A quiet border town erupts into chaos as tensions rise between the US and Mexico. The cause? A ruthless Mexican bandit determined to kill as many US soldiers as possible. As political turmoil intensifies, the town becomes the center of a deadly conflict, where vengeance, power, and survival collide.

programme.title: Apache Rose
programme.desc: Old Western Movie from 1947 starring Roy Rogers directed by William Witney: Apache Rose - Roy is an oil prospector. His efforts to get drilling rights on an old Spanish land grant are countered by gamblers from an off-shore gambling boat determined to control the land (and oil) themselves.

programme.title: Yellow Hair and the Fortress of Gold
programme.desc: Fiery blonde half-breed Yellow Hair and her easygoing sidekick the Pecos Kid are after a fortune in Mayan gold.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid Returns
programme.desc: Cisco Kid stops Rosita’s marriage to Harris, claiming she’s his wife and presenting a borrowed child, Nancy, as proof. After Nancy’s father is killed, Cisco protects her from schemers Harris and Conway, who want her inheritance. With clever plotting, Cisco and Pancho outwit the villains to ensure Nancy’s safety.

programme.title: The Girl from San Lorenzo
programme.desc: Two outlaws posing as Cisco and Pancho are wreaking havoc. When the real Cisco and Pancho are captured, the criminals plan a final heist, using the duo as alibis. After breaking them out of jail, the real heroes have a chance to escape and clear their names by capturing the imposters. Will they succeed or be caught again?

programme.title: Wyatt Earp S01E05-08
programme.desc: In one of televisions first adult Westerns, the famous marshal puts his life on the line to maintain order, first in Dodge City, Kan., then in Tombstone, Ariz.

programme.title: The Son of Zorro
programme.desc: In imperial Mexico, nobleman Don Ricardo secretly fights as the Son of Zorro against corrupt Governor Leblanche. When rebels ambush a weapons transport, killing Don Herrera, Ricardo rescues his daughter Conchita and hides her, fueling a revolution for justice and freedom.

programme.title: Billy the Kid Versus Dracula
programme.desc: Dracula arrives in the Old West, setting his sights on a young ranch owner. Her fiance, Billy the Kid, is warned of the vampire’s true nature but struggles to convince others. As Dracula tightens his grip, Billy must act fast to save his bride-to-be before it’s too late.

programme.title: The Lone Ranger and the Lost City of Gold
programme.desc: Three Indians are murdered. Each was wearing a medallion when he died.

programme.title: And the Crows Will Dig Your Grave
programme.desc: After the Civil War, Wells Fargo hires pistoleros to protect against increasing banditry. Jeff Sullivan, driven by revenge for the brutal murder of his wife by Glenn Kovacks and his gang, joins the effort. Sullivan partners with Pancho Corrales and pursues Kovacks, using Kovacks stepbrother, Dan, as leverage. Their final confrontation leads to a deadly showdown.

programme.title: The Tall Texan
programme.desc: Five travelers - a tinhorn and his lover, a sheriff with a prisoner, and a sea captain with a murky past—cross Comanche country. When a renegade Indian reveals a hidden gold field to repay their kindness, greed takes over, sparking tension and dangerous decisions as the group’s true motives are laid bare.

programme.title: To Hell and Gone
programme.desc: A crafty drifter crosses paths with a gang of murderous thieves in the middle of nowhere, AZ.

programme.title: Ill Die for Vengeance
programme.desc: A Mexican gang headed by vicious Pedro terrorizes the land between New Mexico and Arizona.

programme.title: Satans Cradle
programme.desc: Crooked lawyer Steve Gentry plans to take over Silver City, killing Jim Mason and framing it as an accident. He then uses a fake marriage certificate to seize Masons property. Preacher Henry Lane tries to rally the townspeople, but is attacked. The Cisco Kid and Pancho arrive to expose Gentrys plot and restore peace to Silver City.

programme.title: Man Who Cried for Revenge
programme.desc: Davy Flanagan, a former Union officer who was part of an attempt to break out of a Confederate prison camp during the Civil War and suffered a blow to the head that left him with amnesia. Then a bounty hunter shows up to collect a bounty on his head as a deserter.

programme.title: Four Rode Out
programme.desc: A U.S. marshal sets out to bring in a Mexican bandit accused of killing his girlfriends father, but it turns out that theres more to the story than there first appears to be.

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: Brother is pitted against brother in this tale of feuding ranchers in the Old West.

programme.title: ASMR U Hungry
programme.desc: Dive into a sensory feast with ASMR U HUNGRY: Bacon, a show where sizzling bacon takes center stage in an auditory experience like no other. Whether youre seeking relaxation, focus, or just a moment of pure indulgence, this show delivers a crispy, comforting auditory experience that will leave you craving more.

programme.title: Gustos QR Countdown
programme.desc: Unlock Gusto TVs top recipes on QR Countdown! Thousands of viewers scan our QR codes to access our delicious dishes. Now, were serving up 8 of our most popular recipes featuring honey, from hosts like Shahir Massoud and Jessica McGovern.

programme.desc: Unlock Gusto TVs top recipes on QR Countdown! Thousands of viewers scan our QR codes to access our delicious dishes. Now, were serving up this month’s 8 most popular recipes!

programme.title: Gustos QR Countdown
programme.desc: Unlock Gusto TVs top recipes on QR Countdown! Thousands of viewers scan our QR codes to access our delicious dishes. Now, were serving up 8 of our most popular cornbread recipes, from hosts like Natalia Machado and Spencer Watts.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Cantonese cuisine often incorporates pork and host Mary Tang shows us three diverse ways to elevate this juicy protein. First, she chops up a sweet winter melon - saving the hollowed out shell to use as a bowl - with spicy shredded scallops and lean pork tenderloin. Then, she whips up a quick and easy pork stir-fry with crispy snow peas and delicious red peppers. Finally, Mary showcases a Cantonese take on barbeque pork. The secret? A mind-blowing marinade. With sugar and honey crusted pork butt, fermented bean curd and a mixture of deli- cious Asian sauces, this tangy dish is worthy of an extra batch. Dont forget, delicately steamed sweet buns take this dish up a notch - Mary offers a...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Theres nothing more authentic than street food - Vietnamese style! Host Lisa Nguyen shares her tips and tricks on tasty Lemongrass-infused Beef Wraps. A vast array of ingredients including peppery betel leaves, gorgeous greens and crunchy peanuts complement the tenderness of flavoursome, marinated ground beef. Lisas next dish is an iconic Vietnamese street food - crispy Sizzling Crepes with juicy pork belly and earthy vegetables will definitely activate your taste buds. For dessert, Lisa whips up a batch of sweet coconut pudding using beautiful bananas and velvety coconut milk sprinkled with roasted sesame seeds for some crunch.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: The Lebanese love their stuffed foods, and host Jasmin Ibrahim shows us just how to do it! To start, she eloquently crafts golden Spinach and Feta Turnovers. Then, she stuffs a delicious zucchini with tender beef, crunchy nuts, and soft basmati rice, and smothers it in a flavourful tomato sauce. Next up, Stuffed Lamb and Bulgur Balls - small torpedo shaped balls of juicy minced meat, light and nutty bulgur, and a medley of aromatic spices. Her final dish? A date-stuffed cookie called Maamoul. Normally made for special occasions, these sweet cookies burst with flavour.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E23 Olives: The Most Useful Ingredient
programme.desc: Is there anything more Greek than olives? Host Joanna Chery shows us how versatile the olive really is by cooking up four diverse Greek dishes. To start, a rich, baked-to-perfection Olive Bread loaded with strong, slightly fruity black Kalamata olives. She then prepares a refreshing Greek Village Salad full of seasonal vegetables, creamy feta, and plump juicy olives tossed in extra virgin olive oil. And guess what? It pairs great with fried Olive Bread! Then, Joanna switches it up with wonderful green olives - the star in her delicious stuffing for Apricot and Feta-Stuffed Chicken Thighs. Finally, were graced with a unique dessert - Saint Fanourios Cake. Joanna adds metaxa (Greek...

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Scotland, France, USA, Myanmar
programme.desc: Chef Pino Di Cerbo creates veggie dishes inspired by Scotland, France, the USA, and Myanmar!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Ever crave a delicious Indian feast? Host Vijaya Selvaraju cooks up Indian classics for a delightful family meal.

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Papaya Salad, Carrot Hog Dogs, Squid, and Tofu
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, green papaya salad with crispy pork! Next, BBQ carrot hot dogs! Followed by grilled squid steak! Finishing with Korean BBQ tofu!

programme.title: VegHeadz
programme.desc: Say hello to yellow with chef Pino Di Cerbo as he brightens each dish with glowing, golden-hued produce! Corn on the cob gets a fun presentation as ribs, chopped into spears, spiked with harissa spices, and grilled until smoky. Next is a sweet and sour detour with mangoes and lemons in a no-bake cheesecake with a unique popped amaranth crust. Next, aromatic and hearty Kerala-style curry includes all things gold and beautiful: creamy yellow potatoes, sweet yellow peppers, even snappy yellow beans! Finally, stick around for a Thai-inspired noodle salad, where even the noodles are veggies! Strands of mildly sweet spaghetti squash paired with nutty cashews, tender sprouts and a punchy...

programme.title: Pressures On
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Hearty Weeknight Multi-Cooker Dishes
programme.desc: Do you know the secret to an uncracked cheesecake? Host Vanessa Gianfrancesco shares her trick to making a perfectly silky-smooth Salted Caramel Cheesecake.

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: Host Poppy Sandler kicks off Up the Dish with her version of moms spaghetti - a scrumptious Spaghetti Pomodoro that takes it to the top! Next up to the plate is Missy Hui, who hits it out of the park with her heavenly Bun Viet, a sweet and sour vermicelli noodle bowl and citrusy lemongrass grilled pork combo. Then, Tiera Singh takes up the challenge with her vegetarian Miso Ramen - an umami flavour bomb of miso, mirin, and even more noodle goodness. But theres nowhere to go but up with Micahs Lobster Cantonese Chow Mein, an elegantly upscaled rendition of Chinese noodles with bright ginger, tender gai lan, and crisp chow mein, all coated in an exquisite black bean sauce.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Fish on the Grill
programme.desc: Fish. Flaky, flavoursome, and perfect for barbeque. High energy host Spencer Watts tests out his grill with delightfully tender fish dishes.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Shellfish is delicate, tantalizing, and full of flavour, especially when its grilled to perfection

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: What better way to feel good than delightful Cantonese comfort food? Talented home cook Mary Tang give us the lowdown on how to make crunchy, flavoursome Shrimp Toast. To spice it up, she boils a simmering hot pot of a traditional Cantonese soup - Congee. Normally eaten at breakfast, this delicious silky rice soup is loaded with succulent ground pork, earthy shiitake mushrooms, and aromatic ginger and scallions. Next, Mary swears that White Cut Chicken is the ultimate Cantonese comfort food. Slow-poached in juicy chicken stock paired with fresh broccoli and topped with fiery gingERS-scallion oil, this dish adds a little extra warmth to your life. For dessert, Mary whips up a batch of...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Say goodbye to dirty cutlery in this One World Kitchen 3 episode featuring Vietnamese finger foods! Talented cook Lisa Nguyen starts off by making delicious Pork Skewer Rolls - perfect for any party! Featuring tender pork, crispy lettuce, fresh mint, crunchy cucumber, and Chinese chives wrapped in soft rice paper, this dish pairs well with a nuoc cham dipping sauce. Sticky Lemongrass Spare Ribs are next up to the plate; steamed and marinated in a garlicy, caramel glaze (yum!). Next, Lisa fries up some tasty Shrimp and Sweet Potato Fritters using a foolproof technique, adding nuoc cham dipping sauce and lovely Bibb lettuce on the side. programme.desc: Say hello to yellow with chef Pino Di Cerbo as he brightens each dish with glowing, golden-hued produce! programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: Take a trip around the world in this episode of Up the Dish! Host Missy Hui hits the Great Wall running - her Chinese Fried Rice recipe is a classic complete with crispy bacon, crunchy onions and savoury scallions. Then, Poppy Sandler sets off for the Land of the Rising Sun with Crispy Sushi Rice and Spicy Tuna; sriracha mayo seasons the sushi-grade tuna and sticky short-grain rice cakes are fried (fried rice anyone?) to a beautiful golden-brown. Micah Trainors Gorgonzola-Chive Arancini puts a Sicilian spin on frying rice - panko-crusted arborio is creamy and flavourful with blue cheese and chives for this ultra-indulgent Italian redux. Rice Papad with Turkey Tikka Masala is Tiera...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Noodles are the star ingredients when chef Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen cooks up somen noodles with dipping sauce, ramen salad, a fried noodle dish, and a one-pot delight.

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: Get ready for a not-so-raw deal in this episode of Up the Dish! Host Poppy Sandler sets things in motion and slices up a simple, elegant Sashimi with tangy Ponzu and tart Wasabi Mayo on the side. Missy Hui gets carnivorous with Lamb Carpaccio and Dukkah - delicate raw lamb and a Middle Eastern-style dip served with some delicious pita! But wait, whats a vegetarian to do with all this meat? Tiera Singhs got the answer - island-style Poke Bowls, with fruit instead of fish. Refreshing watermelon is marinated in a savoury, soy-based sauce and served with rice. For the finale, Micah Trainor Up(s) the Dish with her Scallop Tartare and Beet Chips, combining raw scallops with ultra-decadent...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Host Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen showcases how easy it is to incorporate Japanese flavours into everyday meals.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Chicken, Tempura, Frittata, and Ragu
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, Indian-inspired Goan chicken! Next, classic tempura! Followed by Tunisian-style frittata! Finishing with veal ragu!

programme.title: Zach Kinda Cooks
programme.desc: Lazy and curmudgeonly chef and ex-Gusto writer Zach cooks one of his all-time favorite dishes – Spaghetti and Meatballs! While cooking, he tells aimless stories, cracks bad jokes, and berates Sydney, the beleaguered camera person.

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E20 Stonefruit Episode with Chef Derek Dammann
programme.desc: Chef Derek Dammann loves and loves cooking with all sorts of fruit, but especially stone fruit; including peaches, mangoes, plums, cherries and"... almonds?

programme.title: Bring On The Karbs
programme.desc: Chefs Erica and Josh Karbelnik go head-to-head to see who can come up with the most tantalizing game day menu! Josh makes PBandJ caramel corn, chicken tenders, and an Arnold Palmer, while Erica prepares crab fries, burger-themed egg rolls, and a classic Pittsburgh sandwich!

programme.title: Generation Cooks
programme.desc: Aspiring kid Chefs test kitchen hacks with vegetables, Liam whips up his favorite breakfast - homemade egg bites, while Jae-Anthony and his father Wendell make airy plantain beignets!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E25 From the Island of Crete
programme.desc: Greek expert Joanna Chery showcases unique recipes from the island of Crete. To start, she whips up a creamy Cretan Meat Pie. Sweet ricotta, tender lamb, and an aromatic bundle of spices covered in a flaky Greek yoghurt pie dough might be the best Greek comfort food. Next, Joanna makes Grouper with Okra - a light and healthy dish featuring flaky sea bass, fresh okra, and delicious potatoes. Then, she prepares a dish thats traditionally served at weddings - Gamopilafo. Its a fluffy, citrusy, rice pilaf topped with crispy, juicy chicken that will have you going back for seconds! For dessert, a popular Cretan treat called Baklava. Joanna expertly layers crispy, golden-brown phyllo pastry...

programme.title: Spice Secrets
programme.desc: Co-hosts Shahir Massoud and Jasmin Ibrahim explore the relationship between spices and fats in three rich recipes. Juicy watermelon gets treated two ways: as a sauce and as a spicy pickle, both to top a caraway-infused Panna Cotta! Next, a lesson in infusing spice into compound butters: a zingy Zaatar and Lemon Butter for bread and a smoky Paprika and Bay Butter for Grilled Steak! Finally, flaky cod gets basted in juniper and rosemary butter before being sat on a bed of du puy lentils!

programme.title: Lets Brunch
programme.desc: Inspired by flaky, buttery, and chocolatey dishes, host Vanessa cooks up four classic French recipes thatll have you saying oh la la!

programme.desc: Lizzo is a three-time Grammy Award-winning singer-songwriter, and its likely shell be adding a few more of those trophies to the mantle with her latest album, "Special."

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Actor and filmmaker Seth Rogen discusses his comedy presence in Hollywood while taking on the wings of death.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Daniel Radcliffe is known the world over for his role as Harry Potter. But how is he with spicy food? Find out as the multifaceted actor takes on the wings of death and accidentally double-dabs Da Bomb.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Rock legend Dave Grohl takes on the wings of death and discusses the best drummers of all time, the art of the cover song and why doing "Hot Ones" has been on his bucket list.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: As he suffers through the likes of Zombie Apocalypse and Da Bomb, the "Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives" star weighs in on everything from his relationship with Drake to his status as The Meme God. Winner, winner, hot wing dinner!

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Ed Sheeran takes on the wings of death and chats about everything from salvaging Eric Claptons guitar from a fire to collaborating with Eminem and 50 Cent.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Sitcom queen Tracee Ellis Ross takes on the wings of death and discusses nights out with Naomi Campbell, the joys of mini bagels and much more.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The trench coat-wearing Deadman answers questions about his early days performing as Commando, locker room beef, Mike Tyson his impact on pro wrestling and how he wants his fans to remember him.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: John Boyega is an actor-producer from films like "Attack the Block," "Pacific Rim: Uprising" and "Star Wars."

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Academy Award-nominated actor Josh Brolin takes on the wings of death and discusses working with the Coen Brothers, growing up on punk rock and his favorite TV shows of all time.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Sean Evans asks one of his broadcasting idols, Jimmy Kimmel, about everything from the enduring influence of David Letterman and Howard Stern to favorite all-time pranks.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: In between painful fits of laughter, Danny Brown manages to share some top-shelf anecdotes about the Gathering of the Juggalos, 50 Cents fashion tips and his beloved cats.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Michael B. Jordan has the Midas touch with roles like Erik Killmonger, but can he handle the wings of death?

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Musician, hashtag expert and Canadian icon Mac DeMarco may be the most laid-back Hot Ones guest of all time.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Chelsea Handler battles the wings of death with Sean Evans and discusses dogs, thirst traps, 50 Cent and so much more.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Actress Millie Bobby Brown is known best for her role in Stranger Things, but how is she with spicy food?

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Comedy duo Rhett and Link are among the most requested "Hot Ones" guests of all time!

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Jon Bernthal is an actor starring in TV shows like "The Walking Dead," but how is he with spicy food?

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Find out as the 19-year-old pop phenom reps his Canadian roots while taking on the wings of death. Along the scorched road, Mendes addresses everything from Justin Biebers hockey skills to guitar store etiquette.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Sebastian Stan is an actor you know from the Marvel Cinematic Universe, but can he battle the wings of death?

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Nick Offerman is an actor and comedian best known for his role as Ron Swanson on "Parks and Recreation."

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: You can always count on Joji for sick memes and an avant-garde sensibility about the glories and pitfalls of this strange place we call the Internet. So where better place to unpack all that?

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The Berlin Station star, singer, style maven and Snapchat queen Keke Palmer braves the wings of death.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: While attempting to jump kick the wings of death, Johansson learns about memes, talks about the best movie-set food and tries to avoid spoiling "Avengers: Endgame."

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Jessica Alba is an actress whose career checks every box, from big budget blockbusters to TV cult classics.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: For his second showdown with the wings of death, Eddie Huang brings a different strategy to the table and talks about everything from Anthony Bourdains mentorship to outrageous chef fashions. Welcome back to the hot seat, Eddie!

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: While struggling through the wings of death, Hannibal Buress pulls back the curtain on The Eric Andre Show.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Queen Latifah takes on the wings of death, shares Tupac memories and discusses her love for Rock N Jock and "Set It Off."

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Accurately dubbing "Hot Ones" a "cross between Charlie Rose and f*%king Jackass," the comedian Ricky Gervais gets pummeled by the Zombie Apocalypse and Da Bomb Beyond Insanity.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Actress Courteney Cox takes on the wings of death and discusses dinner with Michael Jordan, the pros and cons of having Ed Sheeran as a houseguest and the enduring appeal of "Friends."

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Watch as Eric Andre melts down in his own home, chugging milk and screaming non-sequiturs while discussing everything from the genius of Sacha Baron Cohen to his thoughts on comedy skits on classic rap albums.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Mark Rober is a NASA engineer-turned-YouTube juggernaut whose videos range from building the worlds largest Super Soaker to the annual porch pirate glitter bomb holiday extravaganza.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Eventually, Segura ends up with tears streaming from his eyes but is it the hot sauce or the tender words from BFF Bert Kreischer? Find out in this scorching new episode of "Hot Ones."

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Australian superstar Jacob Elordi takes on the wings of death and discusses the influence of Marlon Brando, sitting courtside at MSG with Simu Liu and rock-bottom auditions.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Brie Larson is the box office-shattering star you know from films like Room, Captain Marvel and more.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Taraji pulls one of the most unorthodox moves in "Hot Ones" history, calling in some extra muscle and a little whiskey to tame the rising flames.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Matt Damon is an Academy Award-winning actor from "Saving Private Ryan," the Bourne film series and more.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: New Zealand pop powerhouse Lorde takes on the wings of death and discusses the sound of cicadas, the art of songwriting and the keys to a perfect onion ring.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The pop star of the moment, Olivia Rodrigo, takes on the wings of death and discusses everything from lyricism to ghost stories to the appeal of Trader Joes.

programme.title: This is England
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu 1980-luvun Englantiin, jossa Falklandin sotaan lahetetaan jatkuvasti lisaa sotilaita ja kansallismieliset saavat jalansijaa tyovaenluokkaisten tyottomien keskuudessa. Skan ja Oi-punkin kannattajat jakautuvat musiikin ystaviin ja skineihin. Taman kaiken keskella 12-vuotias Shaun loytaa skinijengin kanssa yhteisen savelen.

programme.title: Cypher
programme.desc: Yritysvakoilun hamarassa valtakunnassa kyllastynyt jokamies kompastuu petoksen verkkoon ja hanesta tulee tietamaton vakooja. Kun han navigoi petoksessa ja petoksessa, han tekee yhteistyota viettelevan arvoituksen kanssa paljastaakseen jarkyttavia totuuksia ja saadakseen takaisin identiteettinsa.

programme.title: My Week With Marilyn
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva brittidraama kertoo Marilyn Monroen viikosta Englannissa, jossa han oli kuvaamassa elokuvaa "Prinssi ja revyytytto" hurmaten kaikki niin kameran edessa kuin takanakin. Colin Clarkin kahteen kirjaan perustuva brittidraama kertoo Marilyn Monroen ja Laurence Olivierin tahdittaman elokuvan Prinssi ja revyytytto (1957) synnysta. Tarina keskittyy viikkoon, jolloin Clark toimi Marilyn Monroen isantana Englannissa taman miehen Arthur Millerin poistuttua maasta.

programme.title: Conviction
programme.desc: Bettyn veli tuomitaan murhasta, jolloin alkaa 18 vuoden taistelu jarjestelmaa vastaan. Betty uskoo veljensa syyttomyyteen, joten han alkaa opiskella oikeustiedetta voidakseen puolustaa veljeaan oikeudessa!

programme.title: Irma Vep
programme.desc: Rene Vidal, ylistettu ja rakastettu elokuvaohjaaja, on joutunut rappiolle floppielokuvien seurauksena. Uusi projekti on Les vampires -klassikon uudelleenfilmatisointi, jonka paarooliin han on valinnut hongkongilaistahti Maggie Cheungin, mutta kuvauksissa mikaan ei suju Vidalin eika Cheungin suunnitelmien mukaan. Irma Vep on palkitun ohjaaja Olivier Assayasin (Personal Shopper, Clouds of Sils Maria) lapimurtoelokuva, jossa Jean-Pierre Leaud (Les quatre cents coups, Le Havre) esittaa ohjaaja Rene Vidalia ja Maggie Cheung (In the Mood for Love, Hero) kuvitteellista versiota itsestaan.

programme.title: Cha Cha Cha
programme.desc: Siltojen alla asusteleva alkoholisti Matti (Matti Pellonpaa) on saamassa Amerikan tadiltaan huomattavan perinnon, mutta miehen tulisi olla edustuskelpoinen tadin vierailun ajan. Matti kertoo tilanteesta autokauppiaana tyoskentelevalle ystavalleen, joka ehdottaa korvausta vastaan roolien vaihtoa.

programme.title: I Heart Huckabees
programme.desc: Albert Markovski, Open Spaces -yhdistyksen puheenjohtaja, on kokenut hammentavan sarjan sattumia, joiden tarkoitus askarruttaa hanta. Kahden eksistentiaalisen yksityisetsivan Bernard ja Vivian Jaffen avulla Albert tarkastelee elamaansa, ihmissuhteitaan ja konfliktiaan Brad Standiin, urallaan etenevan suositun tavarataloketjun Huckabeesin toimitusjohtajaan.

programme.title: Vain Frendeja
programme.desc: Tapaus: Chris Bander. High school -vuodet eivat sujuneet mallikkaasti: kaveri oli ujo, ylipainoinen ja toivottomasti rakastunut koulun suosituimpaan typyyn nimelta Jamie. Mutta kun Chris viimein saa kerattya tarpeeksi rohkeutta kertoakseen Jamielle tunteistaan, tytto sanoo haluavansa olla vain ystavia. Tanaan Chris on losangelesilainen musiikkimoguli, jolla riittaa misuja vaikka joka sormelle. Mutta kun Chris kohtalon oikusta sattuu kavaisemaan vanhoilla kotinurkillaan, sulavaliikkeiselle pelimiehelle avautuu uusi mahdollisuus yrittaa hurmata Jamie. Mutta frendivyohyke on paha, ja harvassa ovat sielta ulosmurtautuneet uskalikot.

programme.title: Youre Not You
programme.desc: Kaksinkertainen Oscar-voittaja Hillary Swank on menestynyt konserttipianisti Kate, jossa todetaan parantumaton sairaus ALS. Hanen perheensa jarjestaa hanelle parasta mahdollista hoitoa, mutta Kate itse antautuu taysin epapatevan Becin hoiviin. Hoitoon sisaltyy yhta lailla naurua kuin kyyneleitakin, ja nama kaksi taysin erilaista naista loytavat toistensa suurimmat vahvuudet.

programme.title: W.
programme.desc: Ryyppyjuhlista ja putkareissuista uudestisyntyneeksi kristityksi. Texasin oljykenttien mustasta kullasta Washingtonin Valkoiseen taloon. Isan varjosta sotaan vihollisen lin-jojen takana Irakissa. Tama on Yhdysvaltain 43. presidentin uskomaton tarina. Vihasitpa tai rakastitpa hanta - tai rakastitpa vihata hanta - George W. Bush on kiis-tatta historian kiistellyin ja puhutuin yhdysvaltalainen presidentti. Oscar®-voittaja Oliver Stone tarkastelee elokuvassaan W:ta lempeasti ja piirtaa yllattavan sympaatti-sen kuvan maalaispojasta, josta - lahinna onnettoman sattuman kautta - tuli maail-man mahtavin mies.

programme.title: Mark Of A Murderer
programme.desc: "Mark of a Murderer" on tositarina NYPD-etsiva Vincent Lamarasta, joka on brutaalin murhaajan kintereilla. Epaillyn tavoittaessaan etsivakonkari rukoilee kerrankin erehtyneensa: poliisin haaviin on jaanyt Joey Lamara, Vincentin oma poika!

programme.title: Tristan and Isolde
programme.desc: Sodan erottamat Tristan ja Isolde joutuvat pitamaan tunteensa kurissa rauhan ja Englannin tulevaisuuden takia. Mutta mita enemman he kieltavat tunteensa, sita vahvempina ne vellovat....

programme.title: Palo Alto
programme.desc: April on lukioikainen tytto, jonka arkea rytmittaa koulun lisaksi jalkapallotreenit ja kavereiden jarjestamat bileet. Varautuneen ja hiljaisen ulkokuoren alle katkeytyy haaveilijasielu, jonka aani ei aina kantaudu hottoisan aidin tai eksentrisen isapuolen korviin. Romanssin ontuessa lukiokaveri Teddyyn kipina tuntuu kuitenkin loytyvan Aprilin ja taman jalkapallovalmentajan yhteisista hetkista.

programme.title: Instrument of War
programme.desc: Kun Yhdysvaltain ilmavoimien B-24 pommikoneen pilotti Clair Cline ammutaan alas ja vangitaan Saksassa, hanen osaltaan yksi sota loppuu ja toinen - toivon yllapitaminen - alkaa. Natsien piikkilanka-aitojen saartama Cline ja muut sotavangit etsivat selviamisen lisaksi keinoja peitota vankeus. Perustuu tositapahtumiin.

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: Rakkaus voittaa kaiken. Jopa vastustamattoman pakon syoda kumppaninsa aivokudosta! Lahitulevaisuudessa maapallolla asuu yhta paljon ihmisia syovia zombeja kuin myos zombeja vastaan taistelevia ihmisia. Hetken mielijohteesta nuori zombi R pelastaa toisten zombien hyokkaykselta Julien, jonka suonissa veri virtaa kovaa. Heidan ystavyytensa uhkaa sen hetkista maailmanjarjestysta! Julien pitaa vain pysya hengissa ja R:n pitaa pysya kuolleena tarpeeksi kauan.

programme.title: Vain Frendeja
programme.desc: Tapaus: Chris Bander. High school -vuodet eivat sujuneet mallikkaasti: kaveri oli ujo, ylipainoinen ja toivottomasti rakastunut koulun suosituimpaan typyyn nimelta Jamie. Mutta kun Chris viimein saa kerattya tarpeeksi rohkeutta kertoakseen Jamielle tunteistaan, tytto sanoo haluavansa olla vain ystavia. Tanaan Chris on losangelesilainen musiikkimoguli, jolla riittaa misuja vaikka joka sormelle. Mutta kun Chris kohtalon oikusta sattuu kavaisemaan vanhoilla kotinurkillaan, sulavaliikkeiselle pelimiehelle avautuu uusi mahdollisuus yrittaa hurmata Jamie. Mutta frendivyohyke on paha, ja harvassa ovat sielta ulosmurtautuneet uskalikot.

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: Tulevaisuudessa, jossa aika on kirjaimellisesti rahaa ja ikaantyminen pysahtyy 25 vuoteen, ainoa tapa pysya hengissa on ansaita, varastaa tai peria enemman aikaa. Will Salas elaa minuutti kerrallaan, kunnes yllatysvoitto aikaa antaa hanelle paasyn varakkaiden maailmaan, jossa han ryhtyy yhteistyohon kauniin nuoren perijattaren kanssa tuhotakseen korruptoituneen jarjestelman.

programme.title: 10 Years
programme.desc: Kenesta tuli lihava? Kenesta tuli rikas? Kenesta tuli kaunis ja kuka pysyi entisenlaisena? Channing Tatum, Rosario Dawson ja Chris Pratt ovat karkinimia railakkaassa luokkakokouksessa, jossa omaksutaan vanhat roolit, rakkaussuhteet saavat uutta tulta alleen ja vanhat luurangot kaivetaan kaapeista. Kymmenen vuotta onkulunut, mutta jotkin asiat eivat koskaan muutu!

programme.title: Paluu Yorkshireen
programme.desc: Arthur Morrison (Jim Broadbent) saa tietaa, etta hanella on syopa ja vain muutama viikko aikaa elaa. Hanen vanhin poikansa Blake (Oscar-voittaja* Colin Firth) muuttaa Yorkshireen aitinsa luokse, kylaan jossa han syntyi. Kun Arthurin tila heikkenee, Blake puntaroi suhdettaan isaansa. Han muistaa yhteiset hetket, heidan laheisyytensa ja heidan erimielisyytensa. Kun isa kuolee, Blake alkaa muistella heidan valista sidetta – ristiriitoja, turhautumisia, rakkautta ja menetyksia, jotka kaikki kuuluvat monimutkaiseen suhteeseen isan ja pojan valilla.

programme.title: JFK - Avoin tapaus
programme.desc: New Orleansin piirisyyttaja Jim Garrison ottaa tehtavakseen tutkia presidentti John F. Kennedyn murhaa Dallasissa, Texasissa vuonna 1963. Se, mita han saa selville, saa hanet epailemaan, etta tarinassa on muutakin kuin julkisuuden versio.

programme.title: A Little Bit Of Heaven
programme.desc: Kate Hudson on taydellinen roolissaan sateilevan kauniina Marleyna, nuorena uranaisena, joka sairastuu yllattaen syopaan. Marley on oikea flirttailija, joka ei ole koskaan ollut rakastunut, mutta kun laakarin roolissa on vastustamaton Gael García Bernal, olisiko rakkaus kuitenkin laakkeista paras?

programme.title: 10 Items or Less
programme.desc: Oscar ja Golden Globe palkittu Morgan Freeman esittaa elokuvatahtea, joka suunnittelee valkokankaalle paluuta neljan vuoden poissaolon jalkeen. Harkitessaan roolia supermarketin paallikkona, han kay pienessa latino-marketissa Los Angelesin laitamilla. Siella han tapaa kipakan kassaneidin, Scarletin (Paz Vega, Spanglish – kaannoskukkasia, Puhu hanelle). Huomatessaan olevansa kaukana kotoaan, ilman puhelinta taikka ajoneuvoa, elokuvatahti hyvaksyy Scarletin tarjouksen kyydista takaisin ”sivilisaatioon”. Matkan varrella tama ulkoisesti niin erilainen pari loytaa yhteisen savelen, joka pysyvasti muuttaa heidan suhtautumistaan elamaan.

programme.title: Happy Together
programme.desc: Ho ja Lai matkustavat Argentiinaan palauttaakseen kipinan suhteeseensa, mutta pieni liekki sammuu. Kummallakaan ei ole varaa lentaa kotiin, ja kumpikin vastaa haasteeseen omalla tavallaan. Happy Together oli Wong Kar-wain lapimurto ennen In the Mood For Love -elokuvaa, ja sita pidetaan yhtena tarkeimmista New Queer Cinema -liikkeen piirissa tehdyista HLBT-elokuvista. Wong Kar-wai voitti elokuvalla Cannesin elokuvajuhlien parhaan ohjaajan palkinnon.

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: Matrix 4, Spartacus ja NCIS: New Orleansistakin tuttu Ellen Hollman elamansa roolissa henkihieveriin piestyna naisena, jonka kosto on armoton ja perinpohjainen. Nuori pariskunta lahtee telttailemaan Alabaman metsiin, mutta romanttinen irtiotto arjesta menee kammottavalla tavalla pieleen, kun he tormaavat vakivaltaiseen huumekartelliin. Kartellin miehet tappavat Brennerin aviomiehen Dillonin (Matt Passmore) ja jattavat Brennerin kuolemaan - tai ainakin luulivat jattavansa. Kaikkensa menettanyt Brenner lahtee kostoretkelle, jota kukaan ei osannut odottaa ja jolta yksikaan ei voi valttya. Rajahtavaa toimintaa, joka intensiteetillaan naulitsee katsojan penkkiin jo alkumetreilta!

programme.title: Blair Witch
programme.desc: Ryhma college-opiskelijoita uskaltautuu Marylandin Black Hills-metsaan selvittaakseen mysteerit, jotka yhdistetaan Jamesin siskon katoamiseen. Monet uskovat sen liittyvan Blair Witchin legendaan. Aluksi ryhma on toiveikas, erityisesti kun kaksi paikallista tarjoutuu opastamaan heidat lapi synkan ja petollisen metsan. Loputtoman yon kuluessa kasvava uhka on kuitenkin lasna. Hitaasti he alkavat ymmartaa legendan olevan aivan liian todellinen ja pahaenteisempi kuin he olisivat voineet kuvitella.

programme.title: Barbarian
programme.desc: Detroitiin tyohaastatteluun saapuva nuori nainen vuokraa asunnon kayttoonsa. Kun han saapuu keskella yota, han huomaa, etta talon on varannut joku muukin, outo mies, joka on jo paikalla. Han paattaa kuitenkin jaada, ja saa pian huomata, etta paikassa on jotain paljon pelottavampaakin kuin vain odottamaton vieras.

programme.title: Irma Vep
programme.desc: Rene Vidal, ylistettu ja rakastettu elokuvaohjaaja, on joutunut rappiolle floppielokuvien seurauksena. Uusi projekti on Les vampires -klassikon uudelleenfilmatisointi, jonka paarooliin han on valinnut hongkongilaistahti Maggie Cheungin, mutta kuvauksissa mikaan ei suju Vidalin eika Cheungin suunnitelmien mukaan. Irma Vep on palkitun ohjaaja Olivier Assayasin (Personal Shopper, Clouds of Sils Maria) lapimurtoelokuva, jossa Jean-Pierre Leaud (Les quatre cents coups, Le Havre) esittaa ohjaaja Rene Vidalia ja Maggie Cheung (In the Mood for Love, Hero) kuvitteellista versiota itsestaan.

programme.title: I Survived . . .
programme.desc: Four young Americans, kidnapped in Kyrgyzstan, face a desperate situation.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Chief pilot Arnie lands the DC-3 on a homemade sand strip at a remote lodge; Electra expert Chuck faces off with a stubborn power unit; Rods wife Sasha goes into labor.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: While training waterbomber captains for the upcoming fire-fighting season, Chief Pilot Arnie makes a surprising decision.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe hires Duane Hicks to help Buffalo navigate the future and coach Mikey; a DC-3 delivery mission goes awry when blizzard conditions and a broken oil cooler force an emergency landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalo gets into the stunt flying business when veteran pilot Arnie flies the DC-4 for the re- enactment scene of a famous WWII bombing raid.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Critical of the many stops and starts in the Electra program, and frustrated with the constant drama at Buffalo, Chuck quits.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a ferry breakdown causes a gasoline shortage in Yellowknife, new manager Duane begs Chuck to return and prepare the Electra for a fuel haul.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duane lands a huge contract for the Electra and puts enormous pressure on mechanic Adam to prep the plane without the help of his mentor Chuck.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra flies to Alert, the northernmost settlement on Earth, forcing Adam and new senior manager Duane to work things out.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Sparks fly when Joe discovers Gord has taken a job with a rival airline after completing expensive training on one of the Buffalo planes.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Trying to make his mark at Buffalo, Duane lands two more Electra contracts.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie waterbomber pilot Scott gets his first taste of action when Buffalo responds to an emergency callout to fight fires in Alberta.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When Yellowknife and the northern aviation community are rocked by three crashes in the space of a month, Joe places an extra emphasis on safety.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Weighed down by the responsibility of training a new rampie, and struggling to get out of Joes doghouse, DC-3 co-pilot Tyler gets a once in a lifetime opportunity to stunt fly in his Cessna 150 for a visiting film crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After taking command of an intense airlift, and dealing with the ugliest Electra load hes ever seen, Scott takes a scary fall on the icy tarmac.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A week before Christmas, Buffalo agrees to lend a hand to an RCMP initiative to fly toys to isolated communities in the north.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Just months from retiring, Electra captain Ray Weber leads his crew on a multi-trip mission that requires landing on a rough ice strip on a remote lake.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Justin and Cory attempt to place a Canadair CL-215 aircraft onto a cargo ship for delivery to a Korean company.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: In South Korea, Cory and Justin meet the ship delivering Buffalos water bomber plane to new buyers there.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: As spring arrives and Rays retirement day approaches, Sean surprises everyone by leaving Buffalo for a job with the competition.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Greenlands Narsarsuaq airport - known as one the worlds most dangerous approaches - looms on the horizon as Cory and Justin begin a trans-global journey to deliver two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey hire a helicopter for a salvage mission to retrieve the rare tailpiece from a Lockheed 10-A that crashed in the Yellowknife woods forty years ago.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey links up with Chris Hadfield aboard the International Space Station. Problems mount while trying to get a frozen DC-4 airborne.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot David faces a remote Arctic airstrip with sketchy landing gear. Mikey drafts a Buffalo hockey team to face off against an NHL squad in a charity shootout. Chuck gets a chance to shine on the ice.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe races a quirky antique snowmobile - with an airplane engine and no brakes. The water bomber crew struggles to get two planes out of Turkey. Cocky rampie Chris Staples tries to prove himself in the C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A cold snap triggers massive challenges. Devan runs into gear problems while he ferries a mothballed DC-3 across the country. And Justin has to make a snap decision with his newborn son aboard his plane.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Facing Joes wrath, Rod and Cory head to the UK to make urgent water bomber repairs. David tries to prove himself to Devan in the C-46 but ends up infuriating Devan. Will makes an ultimatum in Hay River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey trains for High Arctic survival with the Canadian Rangers. The Air Force invades Chucks hangar. Joe faces tough competition at a California plane auction.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: AJ and James battle a DC-4 engine fire. Its Joes 69th birthday - and hes never flown a helicopter before, so Mikey plans a special gift of chopper flight lessons.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Cory, Chuck and Brian watch as a 5,000-pound power unit smash to the ground, denting the Electra and putting it out of commission. Mikey scrambles to manage the crisis while Joe races to England to try and purchase a backup Electra.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey head to England to bring home a new plane. Devan does target-practice in the DC-4.James builds a Buffalo-style soapbox racer.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe flies with the Snowbirds during the Hamilton air show and later teaches Mikey to fly. A surprise departure shakes up Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Ice Pilots NWT celebrates a milestone with a look back at the last five years, a peek behind the camera and reflections from the Buffalo crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: An engine fire and series of mechanical gremlins has Buffalo scrambling to make its Christmas deliveries. Newest rampie Prefkar Mony struggles with life in the North.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine trouble plagues Buffalos newest Electra, ZFE, and a standoff between Joe and Transport Canada threatens to close the airline. At the same time, Joe faces a tough decision about his old dog Sophie.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe leaves to undergo medical tests at the Mayo Clinic in Phoenix, Arizona. Jeff and Sam stress over their DC-3 checkflights and Joe celebrates turning 70-his way.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie pilot Jeff nearly runs off the runway. Prefkar learns to play hockey but drops the ball at Buffalo and Joe goes on a date with a real dog.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey decides to get Buffalo involved in a D-Day paratrooper jump to commemorate the 70th anniversary of D-Day.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikeys much-planned D-Day tribute parachute jump with 20 paratroopers hits a wall when Joe refuses to fly his DC-3 to the drop zone.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot Scott faces his worst nightmare when a faltering Curtiss C-46 Commando engine and low fog force a scary landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Christmas is just around the corner, but Buffalos crucial food and mail runs come to a halt.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A string of bad luck turns chief pilot Arnies 66th birthday run into the flight from hell - and threatens to spoil his naughty birthday surprise.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mechanic Cory races against the clock to turn two short-haul waterbombers into transatlantic aircraft for the epic journey to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A charter flight falls through the cracks after the McBryans attend a wild family wedding, and an irate Joe pulls captain Justin from the Turkey test flights to do the job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A furious Joe fights against a federal suspension that will prevent him from carrying passengers for the first time in 20 years.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: AJ and Candace get married in the Ice Castle. A frustrated Chuck tries to get the Electra to pay her way. A flummoxed Mikey tries to bake a cake for Joes birthday.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: C-46 and DC-4 crews race against the spring melt to fly mining equipment to an airstrip on a frozen lake.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After thousands of hours of painstaking preparation and dangerous flying, a terrible accident devastates the waterbomber crew in Turkey - and everyone at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When her husband quits after a blowout with Joe, Kelly is put in a terrible position. Will she stay at Buffalo - or will she go?

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey head off to Coventry, England to navigate the potential purchase of an Electra turboprop to add to Buffalos fleet of fire-fighting tanker planes.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: As Joe fights a Transport Canada claim against the airline, star pilot Justin is tasked with shipping an 8,000lb generator to a remote town.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a deadly fire destroys a northern outpost a week before Christmas, Buffalo puts everything aside to come to the rescue.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The curse of -40 hits Buffalo pilots Devan and Scott on a food mail flight up the Mackenzie Valley when a mysterious rise in oil pressure threatens to destroy one of the C-46s engines.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey goes on a treasure hunt to Venezuela for a rare CL-215 waterbomber.

programme.title: Hot Mess
programme.desc: Wardens gear up for the last week of the season. The pressure is on, putting the Wardens right in the middle of a Hot Mess.

programme.title: The Philippines
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Travel Bug S1 - "The Philippines"
programme.desc: The Philippines is a beautiful nation. The archipelago contains countless islands, sandy beaches and smiling faces. Best of all it is a destination where one day you can relax in a luxury resort, then the next you can get dirty in a street market.

programme.title: New South Wales, Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Travel Bug S1 - "New South Wales, Australia"
programme.desc: Starting in Sydney, we travel over the Harbour Bridge and dine with koalas, before heading into the Blue Mountains and out to the far west to the ancient landscape of Mungo National Park. This desert landscape has a fascinating story.

programme.title: Divide and Conquer
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Divide and Conquer"
programme.desc: Chris needs to make this happen. With willows to high to attempt a shot from the current location, Chris frantically pushes and closes the distance to 300 yards.

programme.title: Weathered and Worn
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Weathered and Worn"
programme.desc: The brothers devise a plan and advance toward the bull. Mid-stalk, the bull rises and approaches them, turning away just before Casey can line up the scope behind its shoulder.

programme.title: Return Home
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 The Trail S1 - "Return Home"
programme.desc: Laramy and 7 say goodbye to their final camp and head home.

programme.title: Seperation Anxiety
programme.desc: Alaskan weather clears for Chris and Kaid to hunt food, while Casey and R.L. set up camp before moose season. Its their first time being Dropped separately, requiring adjustment.

programme.title: Predators Prowl
programme.desc: Chris and Kaid ready their rafts while Casey and R.L. begin searching for black bears and moose. Chris and Kaid spot a predator heading toward camp.

programme.title: Volcanic Kingfish
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Volcanic Kingfish"
programme.desc: Mario hooks up with old friend and current world record holder for kingfish Rick Pollock. They fish the coast of New Zealand just off a live Volcano, then tragedy strikes. After the Volcano erupts Mario prepares an amazing ceviche dish.

programme.title: FMX Nomads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 FMX Nomads S1 - "FMX Nomads"
programme.desc: Join Dan Whitby, Samson Eaton and Arran Powley for a day in the life of globetrotting freestyle motocross team, Bolddog.

programme.title: Meet Island Air
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Meet Island Air"
programme.desc: Veteran bush pilot Bob Stanford risks everything to save hunters struggling to stay alive in a remote area of Kodiak.

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Fight or Flight"
programme.desc: While on a routine sightseeing flight, a massive storm has the pilots fighting to keep control of the craft and keep their passengers safe.

programme.title: Deadmans Survival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Deadmans Survival"
programme.desc: Island Air battles time and elements, to rescue a group trapped in Deadmans Bay.

programme.title: The Broads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Hunting Fish S1 - "The Broads"
programme.desc: Thom hunt is challenged to hunt the mighty Pike in the Uk’s Norfolk Broads.

programme.title: Extremadura
programme.desc: Thom hunt is challenged to hunt a record-breaking Barbel in the Spain’s striking Extremadura.

programme.title: UK
programme.desc: Thom hunt challenges himself to locate and catch four UK species in one week.

programme.title: Tippets and Leaders
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "Tippets and Leaders"
programme.desc: The teams goal of landing and tagging a mature tarpon is fulfilled, as one of the anglers lands a 60lbs silver king. Michael Keaton and Yvon Choulnard spend time wading throught the flats together and we look back on the week spend in Belize.

programme.title: Day Two Pt. 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day Two Pt. 1"
programme.desc: Day two of the Madfin Shark Series begins, as its becoming clearer which of our four 2-man teams will have to do whatever it takes to not be in last place and being eliminated. Hurricane Hole Marina in Key West sees the sharks finding captains idle.

programme.title: Day Two Pt.2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day Two Pt.2"
programme.desc: Day two and the battle continues on the Madfin Shark Series. Four of our 2-man teams are catching and releasing the biggest and most dangerous sharks they can for the most points they can accrue. After today, one team will be sent home and eliminated.

programme.title: Day Three Pt. 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day Three Pt. 1"
programme.desc: Its the third and final day of competition for the remaining 3 teams in this intense shark tournament. See how the first half of the day turns out.

programme.title: Far North Bluewater Mission
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Far North Bluewater Mission"
programme.desc: 60 nautical miles + 200kg of Burley divided by 3 keen spearos = mayhem. The team go wide this week, overnighting aboard The Orca in 1000m of water in the Far North, in an attempt to create a 24-hour trail capable of attracting in who knows what!

programme.title: Hardcore Hapuka
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Hardcore Hapuka"
programme.desc: We return to Fiordland in the hope of going one step better in slotting a hapuka on a spear, but the presence of Bluefin Tuna off the coast, and Wapiti Bulls on the slip faces proves a tempting distraction from the task at hand!

programme.title: Pitt Island Expedition
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Pitt Island Expedition"
programme.desc: Following a ridiculous sequence of events in Fiordland, the team saddle up and head for the hapuka haven of the Chatham Islands, where they spend a few days diving the spectacular and remote Pitt Island.

programme.title: ATV Accidents
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Survival Science S1 - "ATV Accidents"
programme.desc: ATVs have allowed us to penetrate the wilderness like never before. But they’ve also made the backcountry a bit more dangerous. Laura and Nick rig up some dramatic, high-speed tests to see how accidents happen and what you can do to protect yourself.

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: The team battles high winds in the heli to save a snowmobiler with a busted femur.

programme.title: Episode 5
programme.desc: Unprecedented three rescues in under twelve hours.

programme.title: Episode 6
programme.desc: Jamie puts his trust in new explosives technology.

programme.title: The Journal
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Fight to Survive S2 - "The Journal"
programme.desc: Pastor Mike Turner is on a solo hike across the continental divide in the unforgiving Wind Rivers Range of Wyoming, when he becomes hopelessly trapped under a boulder. He chronicles his grueling 11 day fight to survive in his own journal.

programme.title: Tree Stand Fall
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Fight to Survive S2 - "Tree Stand Fall"
programme.desc: Deer hunter Nathan Holcomb plummets from his tree stand. Every hunters’ worst nightmare becomes Nathan’s reality. With a broken back paralyzing him, Nathan must crawl out on his own to find help.

programme.title: Adrift Pt. 1
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Fight to Survive S2 - "Adrift Pt. 1"
programme.desc: In what is regarded as one of greatest survival stories of the 20th Century, sailor Steven Callahan finds himself alone and adrift in a life raft after his boat, the Napoleon Solo, sinks in the mid Atlantic.

programme.title: Nicosia
programme.desc: Josh is in Cyprus for a local exploring adventure across the island on a roadtrip from Nicosia to an abandoned amusement park, an asbestos mine and a shipwreck.

programme.title: New Orleans
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Epic Exploring S2 - "New Orleans"
programme.desc: Cody is with Lexi Limitless in the ‘Big Easy’ to explore New Orleans, visiting an abandoned Charity Hospital before meeting Brutus, the giant alligator.

programme.title: Yerevan
programme.desc: Josh goes local exploring in Armenia and its capital Yerevan, visiting some amazing abandoned Soviet buildings, a knitting factory and a luxurious hotel.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: A Canadian MTB adventurer explores Madagascar and shows the behind the scenes processes of making a film.

programme.title: Norway
programme.desc: An Irish MTB pro rider discovers and rides the most amazing trails that Norway has to offer from the mountains to the ocean.

programme.title: Alaska
programme.desc: We follow one of the best MTB riders and trail-builders on the planet during a trip in Alaska, one of the most remote and wild places in the world.

programme.title: Meet the Smiths
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S4 - "Meet the Smiths"
programme.desc: Terry finally gets to compare himself to Brad Pitt!! Terry and Larry test 3 scenes from action film Mr. and Mrs. Smith. Can a refrigerator or elevator door protect our heroes? Also, can you ignite a gas line with just a bullet? Larry may not look as stunning as Angelina Jolie, but he will help Terry find out the answers.

programme.title: Nightmare on Hollywood Weapons
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S4 - "Nightmare on Hollywood Weapons"
programme.desc: Terry and Larry get to test several scenes from Horror films! Terry wants to find out what is the best way to kill a Zombie, just in case he ever ends up in a Zombie Apocalypse, and they will test a scene from the horror classic, Freddie vs. Jason!

programme.title: All for One!
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S4 - "All for One!"
programme.desc: Terry travels back in time to see if he can make it as a Three Musketeer! Can he throw his sword and kill the enemy? Can the cross that he wears around his neck stop a bullet? Can a lead ball ignite from a black powder ignite a carriage full of black powder and brandy? Terry enlists the help of his companions to find out!

programme.title: Croatia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Running the World S1 - "Croatia"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to Croatia to meet up with local parkour experts and undertake an epic run in an abandoned aluminium factory.

programme.title: Santorini
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Running the World S1 - "Santorini"
programme.desc: A challenge to race each other and a labyrinth of narrow streets and hidden passages to navigate will make this one of the trickiest challenges.

programme.title: Best of ep. 1 to 5
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Running the World S1 - "Best of ep. 1 to 5"
programme.desc: Parkour athletes Max and Benj Cave look back over their travels so far and discuss the best places for practising parkour.

programme.title: Los Angeles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "Los Angeles"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie goes to Hollywood arriving in a million dollar V12 Ferrari. In the ‘City of Angels’ Alex is brought into contact with the Brotherhood of Racing, a community of drivers looking to create safe racing conditions for amateurs.

programme.title: Houston
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "Houston"
programme.desc: Given special access to a 2 million dollar exclusive McClaren Senna, Supercar Blondie digs under the surface to uncover gang feuds in the SLAB (Slow, Low and Bangin’) community and meets up with legendary hip hop artists Slim Thug and Paul Wall.

programme.title: Papua New Guinea
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Epic Trails S2 - "Papua New Guinea"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson visits wild and remote villages in Papua New Guinea, as he challenges himself on one of the world’s most difficult trails—the Kokoda Track.

programme.title: Canada’s Sunshine Coast, BC
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Epic Trails S2 - "Canada’s Sunshine Coast, BC"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson heads to British Columbia’s beautiful Sunshine Coast, to explore the 112-mile long Sunshine Coast Trail and to test his nerves at the Coast Gravity Downhill Mountain Bike Park.

programme.title: The Gift of Gratitude
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Kindness Diaries S1 - "The Gift of Gratitude"
programme.desc: On the last leg of their 25K mile global adventure, Leon and Kindness One® travel down the Pacific Coast on their way to Hollywood. Reflections of his favorite moments inspire Leon to meet up again with the first person to show him kindness.

programme.title: The Gift of Faith
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Kindness Diaries S2 - "The Gift of Faith"
programme.desc: Leon and Kindness 2 leave sunny Los Angeles and head to freezing Alaska. With no money or food a Canadian bushman comes to the rescue.

programme.title: Vanuatu
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 The Travel Bug S2 - "Vanuatu"
programme.desc: Vanuatu has countless pretty and unspoiled beaches, with palm trees overhanging the water and islands where rainforests cover the landscape. But the strongest asset of this Pacific paradise is

programme.title: Korea
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 The Travel Bug S2 - "Korea"
programme.desc: Korea is a fascinating and complex nation. It’s a place where ancient Confucianism is juxtaposed with an insatiable appetite for technology. We start at the heart of this thriving nation, Seoul.

programme.title: The Record
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 The Flying Kestrel S2 - "The Record"
programme.desc: Driver Jon Webster is strapped in and ready to push the Flying Kestrel to its limits.The Kestrel team must overcome multiple problems on the day to stand any chance of topping the time sheets and can Jon keep the kestrel on track and break the record

programme.title: North Pole
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Travel Quest S1 - "North Pole"
programme.desc: The crew takes an icebreaker to the North Pole just in time to make a satellite phone call to wish Bills mother a happy birthday (she is so shocked she doesnt recognize him). We also track and film the biggest predators on earth…polar bears.

programme.title: Rwanda…Gorillas
programme.desc: Bill tracks through never ending mud, heavy vegetation and steep mountains, to come face-to-face with our mighty cousins. He also traces the life, and finds the remnants, of the camp of one of his idols - Diane Fossey.

programme.title: Botswana
programme.desc: Botswana is a wildlife lover’s dream with massive herds of elephants, immense pods of hippos and some of the largest prides of lions anywhere. It’s also the home of Victoria Falls…the largest falls in the world.

programme.title: Donsol, Philippines
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Donsol, Philippines"
programme.desc: Disaster and triumph set this show apart. The brothers start out with a near death boat disaster in the southern Philippine Sea but bounce back and end up attaining their goal of reaching Donsol village, the whale shark capitol of the world.

programme.title: The Journey Begins
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Extreme Iceland S1 - "The Journey Begins"
programme.desc: Mike kickstarts his trip by leaving Bermuda and heading to Iceland via Boston in the USA, where delivery issues threaten to stop his adventure before it even begins.

programme.title: Two Dish Battle
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Cooks on Fire S2 - "Two Dish Battle"
programme.desc: Six teams meet host Ganesh Raj and BBQ experts Jared Macdonald and Jess Pryles in Waiamuku to begin the ultimate barbecue battle. They are challenged to make two dishes that showcase their barbecue skills: one low ‘n slow and one hot ‘n fast.

programme.title: Polar Bears
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Travel Quest S2 - "Polar Bears"
programme.desc: There is one place in the world where the mighty polar bear—largest carnivore on earth—can be found in large numbers during a very specific time of the year…Churchill Manitoba, Canada.

programme.title: Namibia
programme.desc: Bill has a dual quest—the first to visit one of the greatest deserts in the world and find out how the creatures and plants survive. The other is a bit unorthodox and maybe unbelievable – he’s going to seek, and hopefully find, the mythical unicorn.

programme.title: Long Day
programme.desc: When elk start to migrate the days get long. Wardens keep an eye on the herd and find that at night it really gets weird.

programme.title: Bad Decisions
programme.desc: Ethical hunters make the right decisions every day. This week Wardens find themselves confronted with Bad Decisions.

programme.title: Fly By
programme.desc: Wardens set up a check station in Region 5. When the hunters decide to run it the chase is on.

programme.title: Desperate Times
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Desperate Times"
programme.desc: Island Air drops off a group of desperate hunters in the heart of the bush as a deep freeze hits Kodiak.

programme.title: Risky Business
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Risky Business"
programme.desc: Pilot Peter Rosendahl combats gale force wind and choppy seas while taxing a group of hunters to a floating lodge.

programme.title: Training Day
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Training Day"
programme.desc: New pilots are put to the test to see if they have what it takes to fly for Island Air.

programme.title: Into The High Lonesome
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Trail S1 - "Into The High Lonesome"
programme.desc: Modern day Mountain Man Laramy Miller sets out on the trail to experience life in the high lonesome.

programme.title: Camp Otis
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Trail S1 - "Camp Otis"
programme.desc: Life at Camp Otis. Laramy finds success fishing and foraging, and spends his time taking care of 7 and doing camp chores.

programme.title: Relocation
programme.desc: Laramy realizes that game is scarce because of the wolves and he decides to put some distance between himself and the pack. Time to break down camp and move to a new location.

programme.title: Edge of the Earth
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Edge of the Earth"
programme.desc: The first episode sets the stage for Chris and Caseys journey, detailing the terrain, weather, and hunting style theyll encounter. It also delves into the projects backstory and its initiation.

programme.title: On Top of the World
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "On Top of the World"
programme.desc: Chris and Casey traverse waterways, muskeg, and mountains hunting a huge caribou bull. Chris hurts his knee, questioning his endurance.

programme.title: The River Migration
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "The River Migration"
programme.desc: The duo journeys downriver hunting Yukon Bull Moose, covering nearly 20 miles in two days. They establish moose camp despite an unsettling encounter with a nearby grizzly.

programme.title: San Juan to Laguna Brava
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Roads End S1 - "San Juan to Laguna Brava"
programme.desc: In this episode Rob and Dave put the drama of Rob’s broken clutch behind them and go full steam ahead from San Juan to Laguna Brava.

programme.title: Salt Flats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Roads End S1 - "Salt Flats"
programme.desc: Rob and Dave are continuing on through the stunning scenery of Laguna Brava towards Corona del Inca. That’s not all they’ve got in store though.

programme.title: Two Dish Battle
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Cooks on Fire S2 - "Two Dish Battle"
programme.desc: Six teams meet host Ganesh Raj and BBQ experts Jared Macdonald and Jess Pryles in Waiamuku to begin the ultimate barbecue battle. They are challenged to make two dishes that showcase their barbecue skills: one low ‘n slow and one hot ‘n fast.

programme.title: Polar Bears

programme.desc: There is one place in the world where the mighty polar bear—largest carnivore on earth—can be found in large numbers during a very specific time of the year…Churchill Manitoba, Canada.

programme.title: Namibia
programme.desc: Bill has a dual quest—the first to visit one of the greatest deserts in the world and find out how the creatures and plants survive. The other is a bit unorthodox and maybe unbelievable – he’s going to seek, and hopefully find, the mythical unicorn.

programme.title: From Ohrigstad to Pilgrims Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "From Ohrigstad to Pilgrims Rest"
programme.desc: From the Echo Caves of South Africa to the historical Pilgrims Rest, Xander begins to feel at home again in the location where he grew up.

programme.title: Winelands of the Cape
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Winelands of the Cape"
programme.desc: While Xander and his team enjoy good food and wine at the family owned Spier Wine Farm, Adam spends his day making cider and looking through his family’s belongings.

programme.title: From Grabouw to Botriver
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "From Grabouw to Botriver"
programme.desc: A wine farm surrounded by mountains, a day of hiking and picnics, and delectable food paired with premium wine is on the itinerary for Xander and his team as they make their way from Grabouw to Botrivier.

programme.title: Cloudy Days
programme.desc: On day two of the hunting season, Chris and Kaid explore downstream for a better location and fish. Meanwhile, Casey and R.L. savor salmon for protein. Alaska is pounded by massive storm clouds.

programme.title: Soaked Spirits
programme.desc: R.L. opens up to Casey about the trials that led him to realize the importance of Be Alive. Chris and Kaid are holed up in the tent at the mercy of the Alaskan weather. Casey and R.L. find some food.

programme.title: Bearing Down
programme.desc: While enjoying some supper, Casey spots a bear browsing the hillside. He and R.L. make a mad dash in the rain to attempt to get within range. Chris is growing tired of being stuck in the tent.

programme.title: Adrift Pt. 2
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Fight to Survive S2 - "Adrift Pt. 2"
programme.desc: Facing starvation, dehydration and predators from the deep, sailor Steven Callahan fights to survive not only the physical hardships, but also the mental and emotional strain of being adrift and alone in a disintegrating life raft.

programme.title: Nightmare Canyon - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Fight to Survive S3 - "Nightmare Canyon - Part 1"
programme.desc: Justin and Jeremy Harris’ weekend decent into a remote Utah canyon becomes a survival nightmare when Justin severely breaks his leg. As night fast approaches and temperatures drop below freezing, how will these two brothers survive?

programme.title: Nightmare Canyon - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Fight to Survive S3 - "Nightmare Canyon - Part 2"
programme.desc: After Justin Harris severely breaks his leg deep in a remote, Utah canyon, it ‘s up to his brother Jeremy to climb out for help. Clawing his way through icy pools of water and up rock faces, pushes Jeremy to his limit.

programme.title: Day 6
programme.desc: After exploring Peru, Jalou has to get over her fear when she goes white water kayaking. In Thailand, Kevin is feeling the pressure.

programme.title: Day 7
programme.desc: After a week, Kevin and Jalou find themselves in the same country again: Canada. They travel from Vancouver to Whistler for the final challenge.

programme.title: The Pagoda
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Geared Up S1 - "The Pagoda"
programme.desc: The team does a restoration modification of a 1964 Mercedes Benz 230 SL, adding custom made wheels and a modern engine.

programme.title: Jaisalmer: India’s Hidden Gem
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Journeys in India S2 - "Jaisalmer: India’s Hidden Gem"
programme.desc: Every major country has a destination that is incredible but not well known to outsiders—Jaisalmer is such a place. Once a major stop along the silk road, this living museum and surrounding countryside has something for everyone.

programme.title: Gujarat: Land of Extremes
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Journeys in India S2 - "Gujarat: Land of Extremes"
programme.desc: The people and wildlife of the western state of Gujarat have found ways to survive in an inhospitable environment. Unique big game exists side-by-side with some of the most talented and unique craftsman in the world.

programme.title: Ibiza
