programme.title: Europe
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx looks back at her journey to the music dance capitals of Europe to inspire her final track.

programme.title: Cape Town
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 A Simple Path S1 - "Cape Town"
programme.desc: Cape Town South Africa is about vintage cameras, fish and chips with seals, botany inspired apparel, The Dollfins, a hand poke tattoo, forest foraged mushrooms and drag queens skating a barrier on Table mountain.

programme.title: Johannesburg
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 A Simple Path S1 - "Johannesburg"
programme.desc: Empowered in Jozi the city of gold South Africa with the kids from Skateistan, leftfield artists and photographers, streetside Kotas, volcano sessions, Slappy screen printing, a backyard ramp and skating through an art gallery.

programme.title: Day 5
programme.desc: In the Chinese desert, Kevin finds out that desert racing is difficult. While in Bolivia, Jalou wants to prove to her brother that women can be better drivers.

programme.title: Quebec
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Travels with Darley S1 - "Quebec"
programme.desc: Explore Quebec City, the Eastern Townships and Montreal with host Darley Newman. Dive into the New France Festival and First Nations culture in Quebec City, nature and adventure cycling through the treetops in the Eastern Townships.

programme.title: Luderitz
programme.desc: Epic Exploring is going local again as Cody adventures in Luderitz, Namibia going off the beaten path, through the desert and on to the ghost town of Pamona.

programme.title: Latvia - Riga
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Wonders Of... S1 - "Latvia - Riga"
programme.desc: Ashley falls in love with the charm of Latvia’s capital city, Riga. The Soviet times left an abandoned history in Karosta and Ashley experiences the times as a prisoner, and escapes to the

programme.title: Switzerland - Jungfrau
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Wonders Of... S1 - "Switzerland - Jungfrau"
programme.desc: From early morning cheese making to yodeling through the Alps, Ashley goes back to her Swiss roots in the mountains. The sweetness and secret recipe to their most prestigious chocolate is revealed.

programme.title: Bangkok and Barbados
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Travel in Style S3 - "Bangkok and Barbados"
programme.desc: This episode is all about food, from tasting some of the best and most expensive street food in Bangkok to one of the world’s best placed restaurants in Barbados, it’s a food lover’s dream.

programme.title: Barcelona and St Lucia
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Travel in Style S3 - "Barcelona and St Lucia"
programme.desc: We meet a seven-stared Michelin chef in the city of arts - Barcelona and relax onboard a private catamaran, sailing around the beautiful Caribbean island of St Lucia.

programme.title: Istanbul and Loire
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Travel in Style S3 - "Istanbul and Loire"
programme.desc: This time we really are traveling in style in a Roll Royce Ghost on a luxury shopping trip around Istanbul. Then it’s time to awaken your taste buds with some of the best wine in the world in the Loire Valley, France.

programme.title: Amorgos to Ios
programme.sub-title: S05 : E11 My Greek Odyssey S5 - "Amorgos to Ios"
programme.desc: He’s going to be visiting some of the best local eateries, spending plenty of time checking out the beaches, as well as digging a little deeper into the island’s history.

programme.title: Ios to Sikinos
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 My Greek Odyssey S5 - "Ios to Sikinos"
programme.desc: Last time Peter started exploring the island of Ios, and with so much to see and do, it’s only natural that he’s spending another few days here.

programme.title: Sikinos to Folegandros
programme.sub-title: S05 : E13 My Greek Odyssey S5 - "Sikinos to Folegandros"
programme.desc: In the final episode, Peter will be finishing his time on Sikinos, an island few tourists have heard of. The last stop is a visit to one of the most remarkable monasteries in the Aegean, before upping anchor and heading west to Folegandros.

programme.title: Croatia - Sibenik / Zadar
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Wonders Of... S1 - "Croatia - Sibenik / Zadar"
programme.desc: It’s time for donkey races, and some of the most prized National Parks in Croatia, which Ashley will explore by boat! Damatia’s northern coast is deeply rooted with a history built upon this ancient coastal town.

programme.title: Croatia - Dubrovnik
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Wonders Of... S1 - "Croatia - Dubrovnik"
programme.desc: Undoubtedly this region’s architecture comprised of several periods is some of the finest in Europe. Yacht lovers can’t resist and Ashley finds the hidden secrets in the surrounding area from water polo games to horse back rides on the cliffs.

programme.title: Croatia - Slavonia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Wonders Of... S1 - "Croatia - Slavonia"
programme.desc: Continental Croatia’s abundance of land plays a key role for the country and Ashley experiences this while off roading through the plethora of vineyards and open space. Take a ride with Ashley as she rides the Lipizzaner horse breed from Croatia.

programme.title: St Lucia V Uga Bay Passekudah (Sri Lanka)

programme.desc: Dave has a difficult choice of who wins this episode as both Gill and Richard are in their own tropical paradise islands. Gill in the Caribbean island of St Lucia and Richard in Sri Lanka. Each boasting miles of soft golden sands and warm seawaters.

programme.desc: Kristina is back with Sean and hosted at the Hide Safari Camp in Hwange National Park at their driest period. At night, they discover an unexpected leopard kill and spend time with a hungry pride as they study the menu.

programme.title: Quantum Leaps in Rishikesh
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Road to Dharma S1 - "Quantum Leaps in Rishikesh"
programme.desc: The team, led by Anand, prepare for their motorcycle adventure to the four sacred peaks. The first practice ride is in the birthplace of yoga, but monsoons are destroying the environment, Fred seems a liability and Ryans seizures could be an issue.

programme.title: End of Stories - A Trechorous Night
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Road to Dharma S1 - "End of Stories - A Trechorous Night"
programme.desc: Jen and Jeff’s dream is to save their marriage on this journey, but it’s clear they are in different mindsets from the beginning. We are reminded that Anand had a prophecy of death and his teachers and life adventures helped guide him to freedom.

programme.title: Death of Ego at Kedarnath
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Road to Dharma S1 - "Death of Ego at Kedarnath"
programme.desc: Our first glimpse of the first peak, Kedarnath, the temple of death. Anand reminds us that “What needs to die is part of the ego, fears, and comforts.” Ken thinks people are riding recklessly, Mario takes a spill, injuring his passenger Aizhan.

programme.title: The Southern Tip of Africa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Southern Tip of Africa"
programme.desc: At the southernmost point in Africa, Xander meets up with an old friend to explore the unique landscape of a seaside town and enjoy the many amenities offered.

programme.title: Riding Waves in Stilbaai
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Riding Waves in Stilbaai"
programme.desc: In Stilbaai, Xander and his crew partake in a peaceful shammanic practice before embarking on an intimidating adventure. Back in Canada, Adam learns a lesson about moderation.

programme.title: From Mosselbay to Pinnacle Point
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "From Mosselbay to Pinnacle Point"
programme.desc: As Xander travels from Mosselbay to Pinnacle Point, he and his team encounter a beautiful ziplining course, the best golfing in all of South Africa, and an all inclusive spa day.

programme.title: Lake Titicaca, Peru
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Lake Titicaca, Peru"
programme.desc: The brothers hitch-hike from the ancient Inca capitol of Cuzco, down the spine of the Andes Mountains to Lake Titicaca. They suffer acute mountain sickness, get high on coca leaves and meet some locals as they battle their way across the Andes.

programme.title: Luxor, Egypt
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Luxor, Egypt"
programme.desc: The brothers chosen form of transport in Egypt is a Felucca Boat…the ancient trading vessel of transport. They travel north along the Nile, from the oasis town of Aswan to the ancient city of Luxor, before finding a massive sand dune to slide down.

programme.title: Abisko, Swedish Lapland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Abisko, Swedish Lapland"
programme.desc: Lapland is a frozen, winterland of reindeer, Sami people and saunas. The brothers start in Stockholm and fly 200 kilometers straight north above the Arctic Circle. Their chosen mode of transport for this journey is a reindeer sleigh.

programme.title: New Orleans
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Epic Exploring S2 - "New Orleans"
programme.desc: Cody is with Lexi Limitless in the ‘Big Easy’ to explore New Orleans, visiting an abandoned Charity Hospital before meeting Brutus, the giant alligator.

programme.title: Yerevan
programme.desc: Josh goes local exploring in Armenia and its capital Yerevan, visiting some amazing abandoned Soviet buildings, a knitting factory and a luxurious hotel.

programme.title: Gary, Indiana
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Epic Exploring S2 - "Gary, Indiana"
programme.desc: Josh is back in Gary, Indiana, for a local exploring adventure. With friends, he visits a former bank, the memorial auditorium and Union Train Station.

programme.title: Day 6
programme.desc: After exploring Peru, Jalou has to get over her fear when she goes white water kayaking. In Thailand, Kevin is feeling the pressure.

programme.title: Day 7
programme.desc: After a week, Kevin and Jalou find themselves in the same country again: Canada. They travel from Vancouver to Whistler for the final challenge.

programme.title: Gisborne
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Gisborne"
programme.desc: Piri dives for Kina in Gisborne, and faces his fear of stingrays. Plus, he goes on a voyage on waka Tairawhiti, then visits Te Poho o Rawiri Marae.

programme.title: Manawatu / Whanganui
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Manawatu / Whanganui"
programme.desc: Piri goes in search of the illusive Samba deer near Marton. Plus a journey up the Whanganui River sees him chasing wild pigs.

programme.title: Whangarei
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Whangarei"
programme.desc: Piri tries his hand at snapper fishing from a kayak, goes scallop diving and attempts to out run a National Waka Ama champion.

programme.title: Bay of Plenty / Rotorua
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Bay of Plenty / Rotorua"
programme.desc: Piri drifts around Lake Rotorua with Inia Maxwell trout fishing. And meets up with seven’s player, Joe Webber, to go long lining for snapper.

programme.title: Trust Me!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Trust Me!"
programme.desc: Jason has attempted to climb the Grand Teton, located in Wyoming, three times before the couples adventure out west. Will the fourth time be a charm, or will lifes unplanned moments present even greater challenges than Jason anticipated?

programme.title: Hells Revenge
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Hells Revenge"
programme.desc: After climbing the Grand Teton, the couple head to Utah where a change of plans has them trading in their climbing shoes for an ATV. They take on Hells Revenge, a 4x4 trail only recommended for extremely experienced drivers...which they are not.

programme.title: Deserts and Mountain Lions. Oh My!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Deserts and Mountain Lions. Oh My!"
programme.desc: Hiking and canyoneering are a nice break from strenuous mountaineering, but its hard to relax when a lack of water and mountain lions are part of the equation. Tayler and Jason both need a break...but is the break they need actually from each other?

programme.title: The Competition
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Zambezi Crescent S1 - "The Competition"
programme.desc: Bruce visits Victoria Falls Safari Lodge, to check out the competition and what is on their menu. The Lodge chef shows him how to make their signature Mopane worm dish. At the house, they have a new unwanted visitor, a Mozambican Spitting Cobra.

programme.title: The Elephant In The Room
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Zambezi Crescent S1 - "The Elephant In The Room"
programme.desc: Lyndal and Amanda are at a local market buying some wooden tables for the lodge as well as a few wood statues. Lyndal takes a quiet time out and goes to visit the Victoria Falls. Amanda, Bruce and Mark head into town for a farewell dinner for Bruce.

programme.title: Gisborne
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Gisborne"
programme.desc: Piri dives for Kina in Gisborne, and faces his fear of stingrays. Plus, he goes on a voyage on waka Tairawhiti, then visits Te Poho o Rawiri Marae.

programme.title: Manawatu / Whanganui
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Manawatu / Whanganui"
programme.desc: Piri goes in search of the illusive Samba deer near Marton. Plus a journey up the Whanganui River sees him chasing wild pigs.

programme.title: Whangarei
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Whangarei"
programme.desc: Piri tries his hand at snapper fishing from a kayak, goes scallop diving and attempts to out run a National Waka Ama champion.

programme.title: Bay of Plenty / Rotorua
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Bay of Plenty / Rotorua"
programme.desc: Piri drifts around Lake Rotorua with Inia Maxwell trout fishing. And meets up with seven’s player, Joe Webber, to go long lining for snapper.

programme.title: Botswana
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 A Simple Path S1 - "Botswana"
programme.desc: Gaborone, Botswana is the turf of The Knuckelheads and unlikely skate spots, True-D fashion, traditional feasts, garage beats, inspiring street art and a fashion shoot in an abandoned building.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Tiimi loytaa kauden parhaan jadelohkareen, mutta on vaarassa heikentaa sen arvoa, kun he yrittavat leikata kaikki halkeamat pois.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian poika Justin osoittaa, etta han osaa loytaa jadea, kun taas Scrappy Larry, Robin ja Josh kamppailevat hinaamaan rikkinaisen autonsa Wolverinelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Huonot tulokset pakottavat Robinin ja Justinin viimeiseen yritykseen etsia jadekivia pelastaakseen kauden, kun taas Scrappy Larry kiirehtii muuntamaan dieselilla toimivan sailion.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian hanke majoittaa tyoryhma Jade Cityyn vaarantuu, kun saostussailio vuotaa juomaveteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kylman saan saapuessa aikaisin ja velkojen kasaantuessa miehisto tyontaa, vetaa ja raahaa mammuttimaisen ja mahdollisesti kauden pelastavan lohkareen leirille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun vuoden lupaavinta lohkaretta tyostetaan Wolverinella, Josh ja R2 kolaroivat rekka-autonsa, ja Claudia tiimineen jaavat ymmalleen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kilpailu on kaynnissa, jotta Wolverinen leirista paastaan pois ennen kuin kaikki jaa lumen alle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia joutuu ajamaan kiviautoa, kun hanen miehistonsa kamppailee kivista polkua ylos Wolverinen vuorenhuipulla sijaitsevaan leiriin.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada ihmisia ja varusteita syrjaiseen leiriinsa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia ja Robin yrittavat tehda vaikutuksen uusiin liikekumppaneihinsa, mutta ensimmaiset paivat uudella alueellaan Bullion Creekissa ovat turhauttavia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: 20 tonnia painavan lohkareen kuljettaminen kaivoksesta lahtevalla petollisella tiella osoittautuu liian raskaaksi heidan vanhalle kuorma-autolleen Six packille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: 20 tonnia painavan lohkareen kuljettaminen kaivokselta lahtevalla petollisella tiella osoittautuu liian raskaaksi heidan vanhalle kuorma-autolleen Six packille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Elokuun hurjan lumimyrskyn takia Claudian ja Robinin on pakko jaada 2 Mileen, kun taas Gary ja Garon yrittavat pelastaa tilanteen ajamalla myrskyn lapi ja tuomalla heille tarvikkeita.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Robin tekee vaikean paatoksen rakkaan kaivosautonsa Six packin suhteen toisen kalliiksi tulleen rikkoutumisen jalkeen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Talven lahestyessa Claudia ajaa uupuneen miehistonsa murtumispisteeseen, mika saa kiihkon leimahtamaan ja pakottaa Claudian viimein hyvaksymaan tappionsa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Uusi kaivoskausi on taynna ikavia yllatyksia, mutta epatodennakoinen tapahtuma pelastaa tilanteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh on kyllastynyt tyoskentelemaan isalleen, joten han perustaa oman kuorma-autoyrityksensa uudella rekalla.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Armeijan kuorma-auto hajoaa julmalla tiella kaivokselle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Gary ja poikansa pelastavat vanhan armeijan kuorma-auton, mutta sen ajaminen kaivokselle on raakaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Garon ja Josh menettavat Six packin hallinnan mutaisilla teilla.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Justin lentaa paikalle uuden vaijerisahan kanssa, mutta menettaa malttinsa yrittaessaan asentaa sita.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto kohtaa loputtomasti ongelmia yrittaessaan leikata palan 18 metrin pituisesta linssista.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia tuo paikalle ison porauskaluston, ja hanella on vain nelja paivaa aikaa loytaa paras jadepaikka, mutta han ja Robin eivat osaa paattaa, mista etsia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehet ottavat yhteen, kun he loppukauden kiireet pakottavat heidat tyoskentelemaan kahdessa kaivoksessa yhta aikaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto irrottaa jadelohkareita J-linssista, mutta iso ongelma tiella uhkaa kaikkea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun Claudia ja Robini etsivat jadea poraamalla tuloksetta, edes yhtion geologit eivat paase yksimielisyyteen suunnitelmasta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada raskaan kaluston vuorelle ennen kuin tulvivat joet katkaisevat paasyn kaivosalueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Ilmassa on jannitetta, kun miehisto yrittaa saada raskasta kalustoa mutaiselle, lohkareiden peittamalle 120 kilometrin pituiselle polulle perustaakseen uuden jadekaivoksen vuorenhuipulle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto yrittaa saada koneensa kulkemaan vyoryvien jokien yli perustaakseen uuden jadekaivoksensa vuorenhuipulle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Alan on vakuuttunut siita, etta Dynastyn alueella veden tayttaman kuopan alla on jadea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Robin yrittaa uhmata fysiikan lakeja saadakseen massiivisen uuden kasarmin Wolverinen alueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jade Cityn porukkaa koettelee huono onni, ja jokainen keksii ainutlaatuisia ratkaisuja huonon onnen karkottamiseksi.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaikki innostuvat, kun he vihdoin alkavat kaivaa esiin lupaavia vihreita lohkareita, joiden miehisto uskoo olevan miljoonien arvoisia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun ulkomaiset sijoittajat piipahtavat yllattaen tarkistamaan Wolverinen kaivosalueen toita, ja Alan yrittaa rauhoittaa tilannetta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun Wolverinen kaivoksella vihdoin loydetaan lupaavia lohkareita, miehisto huomaa, etta he ovat saattaneet menna tonttinsa rajojen ulkopuolelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitys kasvaa, kun kaivoskauden loppu lahestyy, ja Jade Cityn miehisto haluaa loytaa kallisarvoisen lohkareen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jade Cityn kaivostyolaiset yrittavat loytaa rikkauksia - tarpeeksi suuren jadelohkareen, joka tekee vaikutuksen sijoittajiin - ennen kauden paattymista.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian ja Robinin testaamattomat koneet alkavat hajota raaalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivosalueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto yrittaa ylittaa tulvivia jokia matkalla kaivokselle koneet mukanaan, mutta Josh jaa jalkeen ongelmallisen kaivinkoneen takia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh jaa jumiin pitkalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivokselle, kun pultit irtoavat kaivinkoneesta eika han voi kutsua apua.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaivoskausi alkaa, ja vaikka jadea ei nay, rekkaonnettomuus tuo Jade Citylle onnea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Guysta tulee Wolverinen johtaja, ja uuden tyontekijan palkkaaminen uhkaa suistaa hanen tehtavansa loytaa kauden ensimmainen jadelohkare.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Juuri kun Wolverinen miehisto tehostaa turvallisuusmenetelmiaan, uusi tyontekija Jay romahtaa, mika paljastaa heidan hatavalmiutensa sarot.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh kayttaa uutta kaivinkonetta, kun taas arvottomien kivien kasa saa Claudian harkitsemaan uutta strategiaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Alan tuo Jade Cityyn ostajaryhman, mika saa Claudian tiimin paniikkiin ja etsimaan kauden ensimmaiset myytavat jadelohkareet.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun miehisto rampii mudassa etsiessaan miljoonan dollarin arvoista lohkaretta, Josh riskeeraa puolen miljoonan dollarin arvoisen kaluston yrittaessaan vetaa rekkaansa pois vajoamasta.

programme.desc: A transient man tries to resist the officers in booking then serenades them with a song. A difficult inmate blames his behavior on various medical conditions, and a woman claims to be Jesus Christ.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A strip search reveals a male inmate in womens lingerie. A couple of puppy thieves get amorous in the bathroom, and a pregnant woman is arrested for solicitation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Code Blue alarms sound as inmates start fighting inside the men’s jail. An irate man with a huge beard refuses to remove bands inside his facial hair. A man with deep stab wounds stumbles into jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers fear a man may attempt to hang himself and decide to intervene. A heavily injured man ends up in jail after taking cocaine and acid. Irascibility shadows a man with low blood sugar.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers conduct a strip search after an inmate is accused of carrying contraband. A repeat offender dances for deputies and fellow inmates. High on meth, a man acts erratically during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A couple is taken into custody for lewd and indecent exposure. An intoxicated woman believes that she is being treated unfairly, and a man with an existing wrap sheet is busted.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Las Vegas Motor Mouth
programme.desc: A belligerent man with a grudge is placed in a restraint chair. An intoxicated woman receives a love note from an inmate on worker status.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man brought in for trespassing becomes violent. A sex worker admits she۪s witholding her pediculosis condition from clients. A woman explains her tattoos are a reminder of the women she loved.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman tries to conceal illegal substances in her bra. Bandmates are charged for tresspassing, and two inmates are separated and placed in restraints after losing control.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman refuses to wear jail-issued clothing. A man tells his tearful tale to officers, and a chatty inebriated woman is placed in isolation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An agitated man is overly concerned about his 30K watch. cries when he has blood drawn. An inebriated woman threatens her arresting officers with bodily harm, and a woman has no recollection of her arrest.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated man thinks the doctors are CIA agents. A homeless karate practitioners actions land him in an isolated cell, and a Canadian man with no pants wants to arm wrestle.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Guards uncover grooming aids stashed in an unlikely spot while combing through a womans things. An incarcerated tourist threatens to bring in Johnny Cochran for his defense, and a drunk driver awakens to find X-rated artwork drawn on his body.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A couple is taken into custody for lewd and indecent exposure. An intoxicated woman believes that she is being treated unfairly, and a man with an existing wrap sheet is busted.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Toilet Paper Love Song
programme.desc: A man attempts to eat marijuana in jail. The Special Detention Unit investigates forbidden letters hidden amongst inmates. A bloody, vicious brawl escalates between an imprisoned duo.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Fight For Your Right
programme.desc: A woman is placed into a restraint chair during intake. Punches are thrown and questions are asked after a fight occurs. After dodging a bar tab, a woman is also accused of spiting and biting.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A trustee finds himself in hot water after officers discover his contraband stash. A disgruntled oil worker doesn’t think the charge fits the crime after stealing two hedge trimmers. Conflicting accounts arise when an officer and a stylish inmate butt heads in booking. A woman learns to put herself first after failed attempts to help her boyfriend’s addiction land her in prison.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman stalking David Copperfield is arrested. An inebriated inmate voices her displeasure with the guards, and a man nabbed for driving under the influence of prescription drugs howls for his dog.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman arrested 45 times gives advice to recently released drug users. Two Australian brothers can’t understand why playing a game of “footie” in a hotel hallway would land them in jail. A drunken nightclub security guard wrecks his scooter.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Two men are found fighting on security cameras. Meanwhile, an impromptu tattoo jail parlor is discovered and shut down. Later, a Russian man and his mysterious friend are excited to be in a U.S. jail.

programme.title: Kostaja haudan takaa
programme.desc: Jimmylla on pakkomielle saada yhteys kuolleeseen aitiinsa mustan magian kautta ja han on pelottavan lahella onnistua. Mutta kun hanen uusi ystavansa Amir yrittaa saada hanet tekemaan vaikutuksen koulun kuumimpiin tyttoihin yksinkertaisella rituaalilla, jatkat vapauttavat pahan voiman, joka voi herattaa kuolleet ja tehda aidista zombien.

programme.title: Results
programme.desc: PT-valmentajat (Cobie Smulders ja Guy Pearce) saavat tehtavakseen saada uusrikas ja hyvin motivoitumaton asiakas (Kevin Corrigan) kuntoon. Pian tassa fiksussa ja hauskassa rakkautta ja ruumiinkuntoa kasittelevassa komediassa naiden kolmen elama ammatti- ja yksityiselama sotkeutuu umpisolmuun.

programme.title: Hamekytta - Pojasta Polvi Paranee
programme.desc: Todistettuaan murhan FBI-agentti Malcolm Turner (Martin Lawrence) ja hanen poikapuolensa (Brandon T. Jackson) joutuvat vetamaan valeasut niskaansa ja ryhtymaan tutkimuksiin – ainoastaan tytoille tarkoitetussa taidekoulussa. Entistakin enemman hauskuutta!

programme.title: Balls Out: Gary the Tennis Coach
programme.desc: Yhdysvaltalaisen opinahjon sahlari vahtimestari ryhtyy koulun hairikkonuorten tennisvalmentajaksi. Tavoitteena on voittaa Nebraskan osavaltion tennismestaruus.

programme.title: The Happytime Murders
programme.desc: Melissa McCarthyn tahdittama raavittoman hilliton komedia Elokuva sijoittuu Los Angelesin laitamille, jossa nuket ja ihmiset elavat rinta rinnan. Kaksi erimielista etsivaa, toinen ihminen, toinen nukke, joutuvat tyoskentelemaan yhdessa selvittaakseen kuka murhaa julmasti suositun The Happytime Gang -nukkeshow’n entisia tahtia.

programme.title: Big Mommas House
programme.desc: Karannutta vankia jahtaava agentti Malcolm Turner (Martin Lawrence) lahtee suorittamaan peitetehtavaa ja pukeutuu maarailevaksi ja isokokoiseksi mummoksi, joka mottaa yhta kovaa kuin komentaakin.

programme.title: Break Point
programme.desc: Veljekset Jimmy ja Darren ovat vieraantuneet toisistaan. Darren on rahapulassa ja Jimmy haluaa tehda paluun tennismaailman huipulle. Siispa he paattavat lyottaytya yhteen, perustaa uudelleen nuoruutensa nelinpeliparin ja pyrkia Grand Slam -turnaukseen karsintojen kautta. Kumpikaan ei ole entisessa vedossaan, mutta erikoisten ystaviensa ja rohkaisevan, vaikkakin kyynisen isansa avulla nama nahjusmaiset sankarit saattavat oppia voittamaan parhaimmatkin vastustajansa. Rooleissa muun muassa koomikot Jeremy Sisto, Adam Devine ja Oscar®-palkittu J.K. Simmons.

programme.title: I Heart Huckabees
programme.desc: Albert Markovski, Open Spaces -yhdistyksen puheenjohtaja, on kokenut hammentavan sarjan sattumia, joiden tarkoitus askarruttaa hanta. Kahden eksistentiaalisen yksityisetsivan Bernard ja Vivian Jaffen avulla Albert tarkastelee elamaansa, ihmissuhteitaan ja konfliktiaan Brad Standiin, urallaan etenevan suositun tavarataloketjun Huckabeesin toimitusjohtajaan.

programme.title: Trinity ratsastaa jalleen
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kierteleva Trinity on palannut! Talla kertaa lannen nopein Trinity ja hanen velipuolensa, rautanyrkkinen Bambino lyottaytyvat yhteen kunnioittaakseen isansa viimeista toivetta. Kuolinvuoteellaan isa oli toivonut pojistaan tulevan kunniallisia, tyonsa vakavasti ottavia lainsuojattomia, joiden paista virkavalta voisi kitsastelematta luvata muhkean palkkion. Veljekset kuitenkin huomaavat, etta isan toiveen toteuttaminen on helpommin sanottu kuin tehty. Hakeutumalla innokkaasti vaikeuksiin ja tappeluihin kaikkialla minne paatyvatkaan, Trinity ja Bambino toivovat nostavansa summaa etsintakuulutuksissaan...

programme.title: The King of Comedy
programme.desc: Uransa kanssa kamppaileva koomikko uhkapelaa epavarman tulevaisuutensa tehdessaan hullun suunnitelman saada lunnaiden avulla tiensa televisioon kidnappaamalla suositun keskusteluohjelman isannan.

programme.title: 7 Days to Vegas
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva tarina Hollywoodin isokenkaisista, jotka lyovat vetoa mista vain. Duke on parhaat paivansa nahnyt entinen nayttelija, joka asuu yha Los Angelesissa ja jarjestaa laittomia pokeripeleja erikoisille tyypeille. Eraana paivana peliin liittyy ohjaaja Sebastian, josta tulee pian porukan paras pelaaja. Han on tyypillinen Hollywoodin mantti elokuvaohjaaja, joka tuntee rikasta ja pelihaluista vakea. Duke tekee yhteistyota Sebastianin kanssa ansaitakseen yha enemman rahaa. Sitten alkaakin vedonlyonti siita, voiko mies kavella Las Vegasiin viikossa.

programme.title: The Rules of Attraction
programme.desc: Jessica Biel, James Van Der Beek ja Ian Somerhalder tuovat elamaa ja naurua tahan rehelliseen, nokkelaan tarinaan yliopiston sosiaalisista ja seksuaalisista suhteista.

programme.title: Unelmien Naapuri
programme.desc: Teravapiirtokuvalla ja bonusmateriaaleilla varustettu Emile Hirschin, Elisha Cuthbertin ja Timothy Olyphantin tahdittama riehakas komedia on kuumempi kuin koskaan! High Schoolista juuri valmistuva luokan priimus, Matthew Kidman haluaa saada koulun paatokseen ilman teinihorhoilyjen aiheuttamia ongelmia. Valitettavasti, ongelma muuttaa naapuriin, eika Matthew pysty vastustamaan kiusausta.

programme.title: Thanks for Sharing
programme.desc: Paallepain ymparistokonsultti Adamilla, yksityisyrittaja Mikella ja ensiapulaakari Neililla ei ole mitaan yhteista, mutta he kaikki ovat mukana 12 askeleen ohjelmassa kohti vapautta riippuvuuksistaan. Adam ei uskalla heittaytya uuteen rakkauteen, Mike yrittaa raivokkaasti kontrolloida perhettaan eika Danny suostu myontamaan ongelmiaan, mutta haasteet ja pienet askeleet yhdistaa miehet perheeksi, joka kannustaa, raivostuttaa ja kiittaa toisiaan matkalla uuteen elamaan.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: The Happytime Murders
programme.desc: Melissa McCarthyn tahdittama raavittoman hilliton komedia Elokuva sijoittuu Los Angelesin laitamille, jossa nuket ja ihmiset elavat rinta rinnan. Kaksi erimielista etsivaa, toinen ihminen, toinen nukke, joutuvat tyoskentelemaan yhdessa selvittaakseen kuka murhaa julmasti suositun The Happytime Gang -nukkeshow’n entisia tahtia.

programme.title: 10 Items or Less
programme.desc: Oscar ja Golden Globe palkittu Morgan Freeman esittaa elokuvatahtea, joka suunnittelee valkokankaalle paluuta neljan vuoden poissaolon jalkeen. Harkitessaan roolia supermarketin paallikkona, han kay pienessa latino-marketissa Los Angelesin laitamilla. Siella han tapaa kipakan kassaneidin, Scarletin (Paz Vega, Spanglish – kaannoskukkasia, Puhu hanelle). Huomatessaan olevansa kaukana kotoaan, ilman puhelinta taikka ajoneuvoa, elokuvatahti hyvaksyy Scarletin tarjouksen kyydista takaisin ”sivilisaatioon”. Matkan varrella tama ulkoisesti niin erilainen pari loytaa yhteisen savelen, joka pysyvasti muuttaa heidan suhtautumistaan elamaan.

programme.title: Meet Bill
programme.desc: Bill on oikea tohvelisankari! Han tyoskentelee kellon ympari appiukkonsa pankissa ja vaimo kayttaa hanta torkeasti hyvakseen eika halua selitella "ystavyyttaan" lipevan televisiojulkkiksen Chipin kanssa. Sitten Bill tapaa Lucyn, sievan alusvaatekaupan myyjan, ja elama alkaa vihdoin maistua paremmalta. Bill ja Lucy ryhtyvat yhdessa kohentamaan Billin heikkoa itseluottamusta!

programme.title: Epic Movie
programme.desc: Tarina keskittyy neljaan ei-niin-nuoreen orpoon: yhden heista on kasvattanut Louvren kuraattori; toinen on pakolainen meksikolaisesta vapaapainista; kolmas askettainen hanen lentokoneessaan olleiden kaarmeiden uhri; ja neljas "normaali" asukas mutantti "X" -yhteisosta. Onneton kvartetti vierailee suklaatehtaalla, jossa he tormaavat lumottuun vaatekaappiin, joka kuljettaa heidat Gnarnian maahan (hiljaisella ”G”: lla). Siella he kohtaavat prameilevan merirosvokapteenin ja vilpittomat taikuuden opiskelijat – ja yhdistavat voimansa muun muassa viisaan, mutta kiimaisen leijonan kanssa voittaakseen Gnarnian ”Pahan Valkoisen Nartun”.

programme.title: Henrys Crime
programme.desc: Rikollisen hauskassa komediassa tahaton ryostoapuri Henry (Keanu Reeves) paatyy vankilaan suojellessaan todellisia syyllisia. Ulos paastyaan Henry paattaa tarttua toimeen ja tehda rikoksen, josta hanet on jo kertaalleen tuomittu. Apurikseen teatraaliseen pankkikeikkaan mies palkkaa entisen sellitoverinsa Maxin (James Caan). Mutta paasy pankin ja pienen teatterin yhdistavaan tunneliin vaatii kaivamisen lisaksi myos nayttelijanlahjoja.

programme.title: Three Day Millionaire
programme.desc: Pohjois-Englannin Grimsbyhyn sijoittuva riehakas komedia sateen piiskaamien satamien nuorista kalastajista, jotka joutuvat tekemaan elamansa ryoston pelastaakseen kotikaupunkinsa. Unohtakaa Ocean’s Eleven, silla tassa tulee Grimsby’s Four.

programme.title: Hamekytta 2
programme.desc: Hamekytan villissa jatko-osassa Martin Lawrence ja Nia Long palaavatviihdyttamaan koko perhetta. Kansakunnan turvallisuus on uhattuna ja FBI-agenttiMalcolm Turner in on jalleen kerran...

programme.title: Kuuhullut (Moonstruck)
programme.desc: Tassa klassisessa romanttisessa komediassa Brooklynin leski (Cher) on valmis menemaan uudelleen naimisiin. Talla kertaa han aikoo tehda sen oikein, vaikka joutuisikin sanomaan ”kylla” miehelle, jota han ei oikeasti rakasta. Mutta kun han rakastuu sulhasensa veljeen (Nicolas Cage), seuraa romanttinen mutka, joka on arvoinen suurimpia koomisia oopperoita! Olympia Dukakis on myos mukana.

programme.title: To Rome With Love
programme.desc: To Rome With Love on yhteen maailman hurmaavimmista kaupungeista sijoittuva kaleidoskooppinen komedia, jota tahdittavat mm. Alec Baldwin ja Penelope Cruz seka elokuvan ohjaaja Woody Allen. Tutustumme mm. Roomassa lomailevaan,tunnettuun amerikkalaiseen arkkitehtiin, jonka reissu muuttuu aikamatkaksi hanen omaan nuoruuteensa seka keskiluokkaiseen ja perin tavalliseen paikalliseen perheenisaan, josta yhtakkia tuleekin superjulkkis. Ikuisen kaupungin kapeilla kujilla nuoret rakastavaiset Antonio ja Milly joutuvat tahoillaan kummallisten ja romanttisten kohtaamisten kieputukseen.

programme.title: Nurse Betty
programme.desc: Betty katsoo uskollisesti lempisaippuasarjaansa “Syy rakastaa". Tormattyaan kahteen ammattitappajaan katsoessaan yhta sarjan jaksoa Betty muuttuu “Nurse Bettyksi" ja lahtee etsimaan sydamensa valittua, tohtori David Ravellia. Betty hakee unelmiensa prinssia hurjalla retkella halki maan, mutta ehtiiko han loytaa miehen ennen kuin tappajat loytavat hanet?

programme.title: Unelmien Naapuri
programme.desc: Teravapiirtokuvalla ja bonusmateriaaleilla varustettu Emile Hirschin, Elisha Cuthbertin ja Timothy Olyphantin tahdittama riehakas komedia on kuumempi kuin koskaan! High Schoolista juuri valmistuva luokan priimus, Matthew Kidman haluaa saada koulun paatokseen ilman teinihorhoilyjen aiheuttamia ongelmia. Valitettavasti, ongelma muuttaa naapuriin, eika Matthew pysty vastustamaan kiusausta.

programme.title: 68 Kill
programme.desc: Palkitun Trent Haagan ohjaama rakkaustarina feminiinisyydesta, maskuliinisuudesta ja 68 000 dollarin varkaudesta. Chip on simppeli kaveri, jolla on upea tyttoystava nimelta Liza. Liza tosin hankkii heidan elantonsa namusedaltaan, mutta toisaalta jokaisessa parisuhteessa on omat erikoisuutensa. Kun Liza ehdottaa, etta he veisivat limaiselta hyvantekijaltaan ison tukun rahaa, Chip nakee naisessa puolen, josta ei ole tiennyt mitaan… tai jonka olemassaoloa ei ole suostunut myontamaan. Nyt Chipilla on ase kasissaan, tytto perakopissaan ja alle 24 tuntia aikaa selvita melkoisesta sotkusta.

programme.title: Nimeni on Trinity - paholaisen oikea kasi
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kiertava Trinity paatyy polyiseen pikkukaupunkiin, jossa hanta odottaa todellinen yllatys. Hanen lainsuojaton velipuolensa Bambino on kaupungin sheriffi! Tosin Bambino on ottanut pestin vastaan vain, koska on jalleen lakia paossa ja tarvitsee valehenkilollisyytta piiloutuakseen... Kaupungin mahtavimmalla miehella, majuri Harrimanilla on saalimattomia suunnitelmia valtansa ja maa-alueittensa kasvattamiseksi, mutta laheisessa laaksossa asuva mormoniyhdyskunta on suunnitelmien tiella. Harriman miehineen aikoo vaikka vakipakolla ajaa mormonit alueelta... Mutta yhdyskunnan kanssa ystavystynyt Trinity sotkee mielellaan Harrimanin kuviot.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Off the Rails
programme.desc: Kolme viisikymppista naista haluaa toistaa nuoruutensa Interrail-seikkailut Euroopassa sen jalkeen kun heidan laheinen ystavansa kuolee ja jattaa heille junaliput seka viimeisen toivomuksen: heidan pitaa ottaa naisen tytar mukaan. Talla kertaa matkustelu ympari Eurooppaa osoittautuu vaikeaksi heille, kun kadonneet passit, junalakot ja odottamattomat romanttiset suhteet sekoittavat heidan ystavyyssuhteensa. Kysymys kuuluukin: ehtivatko he ajoissa kunnioittamaan ystavansa muistoa?

programme.title: Painted Desert
programme.desc: A mightly melodrama of red-blooded action, William Boyd stars in the Pre-Code western talkie - The Painted Desert (1931). The first sound film for Hollywood heavyweight Clark Gable, The Painted Desert finds Boyd and Gable at odds over the affections of a cowboys beautiful daughter (Helen Twelvetrees).

programme.title: Hoppy Serves a Writ
programme.desc: Sheriff Hopalong Cassidy triumphs again in this lighthearted western romp from Harry Sherman Productions. Good ol Hoppy (William Boyd) has to leave his beloved Texas to track down some bad guys in Oklahoma. You can bet that the action and suspense will follow Hopalong wherever he goes. Also, look for a number of familiar faces in the ast, including TVs future Superman George Reeves, notorious Hollywood heavy Victor Jory, and in his first credited role, Robert Mitchum! In fact, Mitchum would appear in more of Hoppys adventures before branching out on his own and becoming one of Hollywoods greatest stars. Also featuring Jan Christy, Forbes Murray, Byron Foulger, Earle Hodgins, and Roy...

programme.title: The Drifter
programme.desc: He only wants to return home to his cabin in the woods, but the man known as The Drifter finds himself involved with a murder! Director William A. OConnor, whose career included everything from drug scare movies to the early films of John Wayne, gives us a dramatic and savage tale of family secrets. With excellent performances by William Farnum and Noah Beery, The Drifter is an early talkie that still pulsates with the angst and melodrama of the silent era...

programme.title: Fighting Fury
programme.desc: A THRILLING TALE OF REVENGE AND REDEMPTION! Based on the story Triple Cross for Danger by the widely lauded Western author Walter J. Coburn, Fighting Fury is a thrilling take on the Western revenge drama. Portraying both a father and his son, star of silent and sound cowboy adventure films, Jack Hoxie (Trouble Busters, Law and Lawless) exudes the classic American rustic charm that still defines the genre. The film spins the yarn of Clay Hill Jr. (Hoxie), a Spanish-American boy raised by a Mexican servant who vows bloody vengeance on three malicious ranchers after they murder his parents and turn his life upside down. Featuring fine supporting performances from genre heavies Helen Holmes,...

programme.title: Gunsmoke Ranch
programme.desc: Flagg is relocating flood victims to Gunsmoke Ranch. The Three Mesquiteers know Flagg to be a crook and try to warn them. They ignore the warning and improve the land only to find that it has been condemned for a new dam.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: Ablaze with guns and guts and glory! Randolph Scott headlines as a star studded cast in this yarn about battling homesteaders. Director Edwin L. Marin (Tall in the Saddle) spins this dramatic post-Civil War tale that takes place in the legendary cow town of Abilene, Kansas, coaxing fine performances from the likes of Ann Dvorak, Edgar Buchanan, Thonda Fleming, and Lloyd Bridges. Saddle up and hang on!

programme.title: The Dude Ranger
programme.desc: Its nothing but action and thrills when an Easterner inherits a cattle ranch and discovers that thousands of cattle have been stolen. Secretly, he signs on as a hired hand at his own ranch to uncover the thief. Once he realizes whats going on, the city boy becomes a hard-riding, avenging son of a six- shooter! Directed by Edward F. Cline from a story by Zane Grey, the film stars George OBrien, Irene Hervey, and LeRoy Mason.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are ordered to Wisconsin to investigate an Indian agents claim that a lumber company is forcing the Chippewa Indians off their reservation in order to harvest pristine stands of pine trees. The G-Mens investigation is hindered by the distrust of the Chippewas as well as the lumbermen. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, Pat and Stoney are ordered to California to investigate reports of an anthrax epidemic and get involved in murder and a feud between neighboring ranchers. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Bank robbers stay the night at Shady Rest hoping to intercept a bank shipment on the Cannonball.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Sherman Marks. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe is pelted with eggs after his team, the Hooterville Hornets, lose a game. Worse, Bedloe is back in town, which is never a good sign. It turns out Bedloe is planning a suroprise inspection with help frmo the railroad. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho get swindled by a fake cattle buyer. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A rancher is found murdered after he threatens to disinherit his niece. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detectives Matt and Frankie work to save a young man from a hangmans noose in New Mexico.Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle, along with Miachael Hall, Mitchell Kowall, and Jean Inness. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954.Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White.Series won an Emmy in 1955. (This episode features the beloved character actor Jack Elam as Black Jack Ketchum.)

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Matt and Frankie investigate a cattle dispute in Wyoming. When evidence starts to add up, it leads them to Matts old friend Tom Horn.Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Also sarring Louis Jean Heydt, Harry Woods, Michael Whalen, Stanley Andrews, and Walter Coy. Directed by William Witney. Produced by B movie veteran Edward White. Episode first aired in 1954.Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery. In this episode, a con involving the Haunted Hills draws Judge Roys attention. Letty is among those who undergo hypnosis to recall long past events.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Judge Declares a Holiday
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the judge meets up with a con man who comes to towns, arranges horse races then skips town with the receipts and all the money that was bet. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Tensions rise as a range war over water seems inevitable. A masked man dressed as Robin Hood tries to help the homesteaders by knocking down the ranchers fences. Things seem to be going well until a similarly dressed imposter robs the Diablo bank.Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was niominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: A member of Teddy Roosevelts Roughriders returns to Diablo to take the valuable land he had been promised. When he arrives, he discovers that the land is part of an Indian reservation. Things quickly turn from bad to worse when a corrupt land agent frames the man for murdering a brave with the hope of inciting an Indian war, which he will use for his own desires for the valuable land. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A doll seems to cast a spell on Little Snowbird (Rochelle Goldstein). Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in December, 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Since the arrival of a Lt. Smith, members of the Iroquois tribe keep turning up dead. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper.Episode originally aired December 25, 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben helps three deserters, escaped from an Army stockade. Learning what they had to deal with, Ben promises to share the truth with his friend who is in charge of the fort.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Wildfire: The Story of a Horse
programme.desc: Fanning (John Miljan) has his men rustle horses and then blame it on a wild horse named Wildfire. Happy and Alkali arrive and immediately get into trouble with Fanning and his men. When Alkali is shot, Happy catches the outlaws but the Judge not only releases them, he discharges the Sheriff and tries to arrest Happy for rustling! Starring Bob Steele and Sterling Holloway, directed by Robert Emmett Tansey. 1945 (Color).

programme.title: Boots and Saddles
programme.desc: When a young Englishman inherits a ranch, none other than Gene Autry takes up the challenge of turning the Brit into a real westerner. He convinces the Brit to use the ranch to raise horses, but things quickly grow complicated. Look for the usual cast of characters from Republic Pictures, including Smiley Burnette (as the irresistible Frog Millhouse!). Songs include Take Me Back To My Boots and Saddle, and Ridin the Range.

programme.title: Heart of the Golden West
programme.desc: Roy Rogers, Gabby Hayes, and Smiley Burnette team up to protect the ranchers of Cherokee City from the false charges of illegal cattle trafficking. It may seem like the odds are against Roy, but just watch as he changes the course of the law with his flaming bullets, and, of course, a few songs. For trivia buffs: Smiley Burnette joined Roy because Gene Autry, the actor for whom he usually served as a sidekick, had joined the service!

programme.title: Cattle Queen of Montana
programme.desc: Sierra Nevada Jones, a feisty young woman, attempts to stake her claim in the cattle business despite threats from greedy land grabbers and their hired killers.

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: Baseball superstar Gehrig is one of several ranchers being coerced by a bunch of bandits. His sister and her lawyer/lover organize the ranchers. Directed by Ray Taylor; starring Smith Ballew, Gehrig, Evelyn Knapp. Talk about stunt casting! Gehrig was a New York Yankees star who was nearing the end of his career, but one of the biggest sports stars in the country. In the movie he plays a variation of himself, as Lou Gehrig, a retired baseball player who takes up ranching. Lou expects to relax on his ranch but quickly joins other ranchers in a fight to protect their properties.

programme.title: The Trail Beyond
programme.desc: Rod Drew (John Wayne) is in search of a missing miner and his daughter in this Lone Star Picture. Along the way, Drew rescues his pal Wabbi (Noah Beery Jr.) from card cheats who have framed him for murder. Youll find plenty of action and suspense in this vintage horse opera, originally distributed by the kings of the B western, Monogram Pictures!

programme.title: American Empire
programme.desc: This epic of Americas westward march stars Leo Carrillo and Preston Foster in a tale of men building a cattle empire, only to battle rustlers, the weather, and each other! The romantic adventure from director William C. McGann (In Old California, Alcatraz Island) features a strong leading performance by Oscar nominated RKO star Richard Dix (Cimarron, The Ghost Ship) plus cinematography by six-time Oscar nominee Russell Harlan (To Kill a Mockingbird, Rio Bravo).

programme.title: Riders of the Deadline
programme.desc: The 50th of 66 Hopalong Cassidy films finds Hoppy in a vengeful mood. When his good friend Tim Mason is unjustly sent to jail and then killed when trying to escape, Hoppys bitterness gets him drummed out of the Texas Rangers. With the help of his pals California Carson and Jimmy Rogers, he sets out to expose the real culprits and clear Tims name. The usual cast is here, including William Boyd as Hoppy, plus Andy Clyde, Jimmy Rogers, and in one of his earliest roles, Robert Mitchum.

programme.title: Raiders of Red Gap
programme.desc: Bobs Playin A Mystery Hand... Hes Marked For Death By Killer Bullets As Gunfire Echoes Over The Plains! After one of his ranch hands is killed when a gang attacks his ranch, Jim Roberts joins forces with his neighbor in an effort to fight off the Bennett Cattle Co., a company looking to rob them of their land. Things get increasingly dangerous as the company hires Butch Crane, a professional killer, to stop them. Directed by Sam Newfield (Racing Luck (1935), Go-Get-Em, Haines (1936)), Raiders of Red Gap stars Robert Livingston (The Three Mesquiteers (1936), Larceny on the Air (1937)) as Rocky (Lone Rider) Cameron and Al St. John (Billy the Kid Trapped (1942), Border Feud (1947)) as...

programme.title: The Fighting Redhead
programme.desc: When a rustler named Faro kills one of his own henchmen and blames it on Sheila OConner, Red and Little Beaver set out to clear Sheila and to find evidence against Faro and his gang.

programme.title: The Gunman from Bodie
programme.desc: The Rough Riders, a popular group that thrilled audiences in the early 1940s, are after a gang of rustlers in this B-western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Starring Buck Jones, Tim McCoy, and Raymond Hatton, this movie features everything from lawmen going undercover to the Rough Riders looking after an orphaned baby! Also, be on the lookout for the beautiful Christine McIntyre, who would go on to appear in several of the Three Stooges shorts for Colombia Pictures.

programme.title: The Red Rope
programme.desc: Hired killers and Old West outlaws stand front and center in this riveting tale from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Bob Steele, one of the busiest stars in movie history (everything from the silent era to Republic Pictures to working with Clint Eastwood in Hang Em High) is here as Tom Shaw, the target of a bad mans desperation and hate. Steele appeared in more than 240 movies and television shows, but was never more impressive than in The Red Rope!

programme.title: Springtime in the Sierras
programme.desc: Ads for this Roy Rogers classic roared HEAD FOR THE MUSICAL HILLS...ROY IS GUNNIN FOR THRILLS! And thrills are what youll get when you watch this fun, action packed B-Western from Republic Pictures. Theres some great comic relief from Andy Devine and Chester Conklin, two of Hollywoods all-time greats. This old-fashioned shoot-em-up was directed by William Witney, who would go on to direct many of televisions top western sagas, including Bonanza, Wagon Train, and The Wild, Wild West.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are ordered to San Pablo, Mexico, to find out whats behind the trouble an American tungsten mine is having. When they arrive, they discover the mine has been closed, the wells are all poisoned and the town is in the grip of a malaria epidemic. To make matters worse, the lawmen have been followed by four gunslingers determined to give the American troubleshooters all the trouble they can handle - and more. Russell Hayden stars.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, Pat and Stoney tangle with a gang of robbers who have hijacked an Army payroll. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. Originally aired on NBC.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Kate hires Herby to work as an assistant manager at the hotel, causing Uncle Joe to fear for his position. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe tries to advertise Shady Rest as a hotel for honeymooners.But is Hooterville really the best place for a honeymoon? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho are falsely accused of robbing a stagecoach. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Two bandits impersonate Cisco and Pancho, sending the two to prison for robbery and murder. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark goes undercover working at a gambling den. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Directed by William Witney. Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Episode first aired in 1954.Series won an Emmy in 1955. Also starring Dick SImmons, Claire Carleton, Mauritz Hugo, Howard Wright, and Douglas Evans.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Frankie is shot during a robbery. Her life becomes in danger when her doctor is kidnapped by the murderous outlaw Clay Allison.Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, Jack Kelly, Paul Farber, Frank Fenton, and Fred Sherman.Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954. Produced by B movie veteran Edward White. Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, an outlaw gang plans to take over the town by getting Judge Bean to resign over false charges of misconduct. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this epsiode, Storts and Hurley are holding hostage a doll that brings good luck to a Mexican village. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Diablo is in danger when a gang of hired killers comes to town. Lofty finds himself conflicted as he is reluctant to take on the gang once he discovers the leader rescued him back in their days in the U.S. Cavalry. With the state senator possibly the target of the gang, the townspeople call for Lofty to resign amid his reluctance. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primtetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Dave Morgan, an honest lawyer, faces off with Carter Holmes, a crooked politician, in a fiery election campaign. Things take a turn for the worse when Holmes attempts to have his opponent killed. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye learns that his brother has joined the British army and is now a redcoat. However, when he is murdered by a treacherous Indian companion, Hawkeye seeks revenge. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook come across a group of settlers trapped in the Hurons territory.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben and Adam are in jail, about to be hung for a crime they didnt commit. Joe and Hoss must find out why the witnesses to the alleged crime have lied about what happened before the execution takes place. They receive help from a vagrant named Lassiter who is looking for the men who committed a lynching in Kansas years ago.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bells of San Angelo
programme.desc: Roy Rogers and Dale Evans team up in this tale of silver mines, kidnappings, and secret passages. Roy plays a border guard who has to rescue Dale from the clutches of underhanded miner Rex Gridley (John McGuire). How does he do it? With help from Trigger, of course! With a cast that inclues Andy Devine as Sheriff Cookie Bullfincer, director William Witney gives us an enjoyable drama from the golden era of Republic Pictures!

programme.title: Colorado Sundown
programme.desc: Murder among ranchers is the subject of this Republic Pictures drama. Starring such names as Rex Allen, Slim Pickins, and Chester Clute, this feature was directed by William Whitney. For Trivia Buffs: At one time Whitney was known as the youngest director in Hollywood, having been hired by the newly formed Republic Pictures at the tender age of 21.

programme.title: Captain Apache (Edited Version)
programme.desc: After Harry T. Collier, a beloved commissioner of Indian Affairs, is murdered in late March during the1880s, Captain Apache, an Indian graduate of West Point, is assigned by the army to investigate the crime. Suspecting that O.J., the sheriff of a town bordering the reservation may be involved in the killing, Apache travels there and finds the sheriff dining with his mistress Maude at the Paradise Saloon. Before Apache can question him, however, O.J. abruptly departs and rides out of town with Apache in pursuit. When Apache apprehends him, O.J. swears that he did not kill Collier and relates that the agents dying words were April Morning. Meanwhile, Griffin, a wealthy landowner and six of...

programme.title: The Hanged Man
programme.desc: After a condemned gunfighter (Steve Forrest) survives his own hanging, he helps a young widow stop a pitiless land baron from taking her ranch. This television feature boasts a strong cast of recognizable characters, including Will Geer, Sharon Acker, Dean Jagger, BarBara Luna, and Cameron Mitchell. Director Michael Caffey would go on to work on such hit shows as Barnaby Jones and MacGyver. Also, look for John Mitchum, younger brother of Robert, in a small role. This movie originally aired on ABC-TV and was considered the pilot for a possible series. Writer/producer Andrew Fenady was behind several opular TV shows such as Branded and The Rebel, as well as the 1970 John Wayne feature, Chisum.

programme.title: Winds of the Wasteland
programme.desc: John Wayne stars in this Republic Pictures western about the final days of the Pony Express. Former rider John Blair (Wayne) enters a coach race to win a $25,000 government mail contract, but there are dozens of obstacles in his path. The rest of the cast includes Lane Chandler and Phyllis Fraser, plus Lew Kelly (Lady of Burlesque) doing a great comic turn as Rocky OBrien, the eccentric, self-proclaimed mayor of a deserted mining town.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks
programme.desc: Dad Longworth robs a Mexican bank, takes the loot, and leaves his partner Rio to be captured. However, Rio escapes capture and searches for Dad in California.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E01 Angel Stadium - Anaheim, CA

programme.title: Motorsport Images: An Enduring Legacy
programme.desc: 26 million images. 100 years of racing. This is the story of Motorsport Images, the premiere photographic agency and archive covering motorsport and motoring. It is unique in that it provides photography of all major current motorsport events, from Formula One Grand Prix racing to national level racing, as well as archive images documenting the history of the sport dating back to 1895.

programme.title: Life in Pictures: Mark Webber
programme.desc: Nine-time grand prix winner Mark Webber spent 12 years in Formula 1, most of them in the teeth of adversity: from wrestling with sub-optimal machinery at Minardi and Jaguar to providing adult supervision at a young Red Bull Racing, and a not always happy partnership with Sebastian Vettel. We take you through Webber’s early career and path to F1, from his arrival in the UK and Formula Ford in 1996, to joining up with Benetton and Flavio Briatore in 2001 and his transition to Jaguar and eventually Red Bull Racing. All photos used are taken from Motorsport Images, the largest collection of motorsport pictures in the world. (Warning, video contains some explicit language)

programme.title: Tour Auto 2025
programme.desc: The Tour Auto 2025 came to an end after five days of emotion, performance and conviviality on France’s most beautiful roads. From Paris to Nice, this 34th edition brought together over 240 historic vehicles, offering a unique spectacle mixing motor sport, heritage and tradition. Setting off from the Château de Vaux-le-Vicomte in Paris on Tuesday April 8, the participants crossed exceptional landscapes and competed in timed events on circuits and closed roads. Thousands of spectators flocked to each stage, confirming the continuing enthusiasm for the event and its automotive heritage. From Paris to Nice, via Alsace and the Massif Central, each circuit and stopover town gave the...

programme.title: Jenson Button Revisits His Biggest Racing Moments - F1, WEC, NASCAR and more
programme.desc: Jenson Button, current Hertz Team JOTA WEC driver and former F1 World Champion shares never-before-heard details on his wild 2009 title run with Brawn, his final F1 race in Monaco while subbing in for Fernando Alonso, the terrifying truth about his malfunctioning helmet in 2004, and more.

programme.title: 2024-2025 ALMS: Round 1 - 4 Hours of Sepang
programme.desc: The first race from Sepang on Saturday 7 December saw plenty of action. Created by the Automobile Club de l’Ouest (ACO), the Asian Le Mans Series symbolises the Spirit of Le Mans, holding the same shared passion for creating world class endurance racing in Asia! The Asian Le Mans Series is growing year on year and is attracting some of the world’s most successful endurance racing teams, as well as fostering new and emerging talent from the region.

programme.title: F1 Rubber Stamps GM’s F1 Entry
programme.desc: So, after several years of preparations, negotiations, public arguments, and even the US Department of Justice getting involved, Cadillac has finally been formally announced as Formula 1’s 11th team for the 2026 season! Today’s formal announcement confirms the handshake agreement that the sport had with General Motors last November. After a revised bid led by Dan Towriss of the TWG Group (Formerly Andretti) was accepted. The Silverstone-based project now has the green light to prepare for its first race in just 12 months as a customer team with Ferrari power units until General Motors builds its own version for 2028. Motorsport.Com’s Editor in Chief, Ben Hunt, reacts to this breaking...

programme.title: Gearing Up 2025 - Episode 7: Rally Jameel and Monster Jam
programme.desc: Welcome to the seventh episode of Gearing Up for 2025! It’s the TV series that takes you around the globe, following the hottest action from some of the world’s most unique competitions. High skills, passion for technology, impatience for innovation, and pure love for adrenaline, are combined at their best. So, start your engines, tighten your seat belts, and get ready to feel the G-force with some serious action! Gearing Up is back with another thrilling episode that takes you on an exhilarating journey around the globe, showcasing the most unique and intense competitions the world has to offer. In this episode, we dive deep into the importance of the roadbook, a vital tool for...

programme.title: Track Masters

programme.title: BMW 503
programme.desc: The noble four-seater 503 convertible was one of BMWs most exclusive models in the 1950s; many international sports and movie stars and other wealthy customers were fond of this sporty luxury vehicle.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: MotorStories

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: German entrepreneur Tillmann Miritz loves vintage cars and has one dream: A trip through the USA with his Mercedes Cabriolet 280 SE 3.5. But before he can make his dream come true, he needs to get his car across the French Riviera.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Tillmann starts his dream journey in New York, the city that never sleeps; with his Mercedes 280 SE convertible he visits the legendary classic car dealer Eliot Cuker who made his fortune with his passion for old cars.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: A ride in the Mercedes AMG SLS GT on the airfield and in a Porsche 911 Turbo S on the racetrack; Audi R8s innovative light engineering.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Jaguar is back in the world of sports cars with the F-Type, looking good and showing against the BMW Z4.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Corvette, the Ford Mustang GT and the Chevrolet Camaro are the embodiment of the American sportscar.

programme.title: Lamborghini Huracan by O.CT
programme.desc: A lot of power thanks to a compressor; this optimized O.CT Lamborghini Huracán delivers over 800 horse power to get the blood flowing.

programme.desc: Action Concepts most popular and most spectacular body stunts. Despite inevitable wounds, the legendary stunt crew enjoys the job.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Highlights of this seasons car stunts.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The Pikes Peak Hill Climb of 1987: A different type of race in the mountains of Colorado, USA.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: Since 1934, the Grand Prix has been the most exciting and fascinating world championship in the world. With its state-of-the-art vehicles, with horsepower from the biggest brands, it never fails to wow its viewers.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The International Championship for Manufacturers was a rally series which ran from 1970 - 1972.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: An iconic racing car and one of only 29 ever built! We accompanied the Mercedes 300 SL lightweight on its premiere drive at the Mille Miglia.

programme.title: Tuning

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Racing driver Patrick Simon visits Aston Martin. The manufacturer introduces The Aston Martin V12 Zagato at the Nurburgring.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Since 1967, Las Vegas has hosted one of the largest Car and Tuning shows in the world, the SEMA show. In the United States, car freedom is still important and at this show one can find extremes.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The tuner from Waiblingen in Swabia, Germany, has over 30 years experience in tuning Mercedes Benz cars.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: An event for automotive and motor sports enthusiasts where the most extreme vehicles can be seen.
