programme.desc: Tuned and customized vehicles are scored based on speed, style and sound; among the competitors are a Nova SS, a special Honda Acord and a car full of crystals.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: France has a long tradition in the automobile industry and the current models of domestic manufacturers do not have to hide from their international competition. The best example is the Peugeot 508, the brands new flagship.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: After the diesel affair, Volkswagen must regain the trust of its customers. The manufacturer launches many new models on the market. Before the official world premieres, Volkswagen gives journalists the opportunity to gain their first impressions.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: The Ford Mustang: US legend, aggressive looks and wonderful V8 sound? Not quite, because in this episode two bestsellers with cheat packs under the hood compete against each other: BMW 430i against Ford Mustang 2.3 EcoBoost.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: The Stinger is Kias most visually dynamic model yet and it also comes with a 147 kW diesel engine. But can the South Korean sports coupe convince in the test? Subaru is more consistent than Porsche as they work exclusively with Boxer.

programme.title: Spotted
programme.desc: In the United States and Europe alike, people like to show off their fast and exciting sports cars; presenting five convertibles for hot summer days.

programme.title: Spotted
programme.desc: One of the most exclusive cars in the world is the Pagani Huayra; its counterpart is the Rimac Concept One, the worlds fastest electric car with a top speed of 355 km/h; the Lamborghini Huracan O.CT and Arden Jaguar F-Type promise raw power.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The largest car exhibition in the world. More than 900 exhibitors present their latest models.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Testing what Corvettes, Porsches and Ferraris really have under the hood after SKN Tuning.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Racing driver Patrick Simon visits Aston Martin. The manufacturer introduces The Aston Martin V12 Zagato at the Nurburgring.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Since 1967, Las Vegas has hosted one of the largest Car and Tuning shows in the world, the SEMA show. In the United States, car freedom is still important and at this show one can find extremes.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The tuner from Waiblingen in Swabia, Germany, has over 30 years experience in tuning Mercedes Benz cars.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: An event for automotive and motor sports enthusiasts where the most extreme vehicles can be seen.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: A spring ride around Lake Starnberg in the Ferrari 458 Italia, a test drive of BMWs 6 series convertible at Table Mountain in South Africa, and a look at the Chevrolet Orlando family van.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Testing the Audi R8 GT, a model that the car manufacturer built only 333 units of, in everyday situations. In addition, taking a look at the Mazda MX5 roadster and Mercedes-AMG GT3.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: The Audi A6 2.0 TDI.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Testing the Wiesmann MF5.

programme.title: Nurburgring 24 Hours
programme.desc: Nurburgring 24 Hours

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: The Mercedes-Benz SL 65 AMG is the ultimate German muscle car in a tailor-made suit. Also, a look at the Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG, a car that was once the Formula 1 safety car, and BMWs 6 series models.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The three super cars from this episode promise more power and more elegance. Thanks to tuning company Kelleners Sport, the new BMW 640i Gran Coupe offers even more bite. Thanks to its beautiful equipment and additional legroom, the Maserati Quattroporte GTS encourages to travelling. Thanks to all-wheel drive, the Porsche 911 Carrera 4S offers more fun and more safety on critical terrain.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Test days at the legendary race track in France before the 90th Le Mans Race.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: At the 2013 Frankfurt Motor Show Porsche introduced the new 911 range. It includes the new Porsche 911 Turbo, which is the most powerful Porsche model yet. For 50 years Porsche has been making car drivers around the world very happy with its sports cars. In celebration of the anniversary Supercars takes a closer look at the past, present and future models of the Porsche 911.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: At the Dakar Rally, one of the best rally drivers in the world is the protagonist.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Alois Ruf, is the founder of a small, but well-known car manufacturing company in Bavaria; the company specializes in building their own vision of street legal super sports cars on the foundation of Porsche bodies.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Hans Herrmann is strongly associated with the Mercedes racing team of the post-war era. He participated in 261 races and was on top of the podium 79 times.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: A portrait of the motor racing driver.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: American SUVs are large, have powerful engines and offer plenty of space.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Everything that has wheels can be tuned, SUVs are no exception either. The big vehicles are already impressive from the get go, but there is always more: powerful wheels, crazy colors and performance data similar to those of super sports cars.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Usually you wouldnt see small cars like the Audi A1, Volkswagen Golf, and Mini on an all-wheel magazine. But when the A becomes an S and the Golf gets an R, the small cars turn into strong all-wheel beasts. Thats reason enough to test them.

programme.title: Tourist Trophy
programme.desc: Riders race through this legendary 37-mile course reaching speeds of over 200 miles per hour in a stunning display of skill and bravery in what has been deemed the most dangerous race in the world.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: BMW, one of the most successful automobile groups in the world, promises the joy of driving.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The Porsche 550 Spyder is small, flat and fast. It wrote history, even though only 140 of them were produced.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The motor sport history of Ford.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: BMW is one of the most successful automotive companies in the world. From the beginning, racing is one of the pillars for this success.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The golden years of racing for Porsche.

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker is both a popular holiday spot in Austria and also a place with a special tradition; in early September, the region hosts thousands of bikers attending European Bike Week.

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Biker Lifestyle

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker in Carinthia is a popular holiday paradise in southern Austria and a place with a special tradition. In early September, the region is the travel destination for thousands of bikers.

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker in Carinthia hosts the annual European Bike Week.

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker is both a popular holiday spot in Austria and also a place with a special tradition. In early September, the region hosts thousands of bikers attending European Bike Week.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: MotorStories

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: German entrepreneur Tillmann Miritz loves vintage cars and has one dream: A trip through the USA with his Mercedes Cabriolet 280 SE 3.5. But before he can make his dream come true, he needs to get his car across the French Riviera.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Tillmann starts his dream journey in New York, the city that never sleeps; with his Mercedes 280 SE convertible he visits the legendary classic car dealer Eliot Cuker who made his fortune with his passion for old cars.

programme.title: Offroad and Fun
programme.desc: Belgian Rally Championship and more.

programme.title: Big TV
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to buy the biggest TV in the world only to find that it has a price-tag to match.

programme.title: Keyboard Capers
programme.desc: Determined to play the piano, Mr Bean finds a tune in his heart and sausages for fingers.

programme.title: A Running Battle
programme.desc: Mr Bean runs rings around the town.

programme.title: Egg and Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is storked by an unwelcome visitor.

programme.title: Hopping Mad!
programme.desc: Mr Bean finds that tons of toads weigh loads and loads.

programme.title: A Grand Invitation
programme.desc: Mr Bean is all at sea with the landed gentry.

programme.title: A Royal Makeover
programme.desc: Mr Bean redecorates his room, making it fit for a Queen.

programme.title: SuperMarrow
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets green eyes and green fingers.

programme.title: Bean in Love
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes smitten with a beautiful singer.

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Mr Bean meets a soul mate.

programme.title: Home Movie
programme.desc: Mr. Bean attempts to make his own home movie – a horror thriller with Mrs. Wicket as the star!

programme.title: Fish Sitting
programme.desc: Mr. Bean has to look after Mrs. Wickets goldfish.

programme.title: The Cruise
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime.

programme.title: Coconut Shy
programme.desc: Mr. Bean has to buy a cup for Teddy, but he has no money.

programme.title: Green Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Beans electricity is cut off so he decides to build a wind turbine.

programme.title: Cash Machine
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to buy a cupcake, but his wallet is empty, so he has to visit a cash dispenser.

programme.title: Litterbugs
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town.

programme.title: Rat Trap
programme.desc: Mr. Bean has to deal with an unwanted house guest but the stubborn rat refuses to leave.

programme.title: Valentines Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean tries to be romantic, but his idea of what that means is different to Irmas.

programme.title: All You Can Eat
programme.desc: Irma is coming for dinner, but Mr. Bean has forgotten about it and so doesnt have anything to cook.

programme.title: Flat Pack
programme.desc: Mr. Beans bookcase collapses, so he buys a new one in the hardware store.

programme.title: Holiday For Teddy
programme.desc: Mr. Bean takes Teddy on holiday to the seaside.

programme.title: The Newspaper
programme.desc: Every time Bean goes to collect the newspaper from the letterbox, it disappears.

programme.title: Viral Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to read his book but gets interrupted by too much noise.

programme.title: Super Sky
programme.desc: Fascinated by the super spy show, Mr. Bean decides to become a super spy himself. When he becomes suspicious of the Bruisers planning something, he starts to follow them. Later, he notices that the Bruisers are putting an old lady into a van.

programme.title: Scout Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes a Scoutmaster for the day.

programme.title: Back To School
programme.desc: When theres no milk for his tea and for Teddy, Mr. Bean goes to buy some.

programme.title: Lord Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is in the library to draw the family tree of kings.

programme.title: Car Wars
programme.desc: The mystery driver of the Reliant Supervan becomes obsessed with revenge.

programme.title: Wedding Day
programme.desc: A wedding car crashes, resulting in Bean coming to the rescue and offering the bride a lift.

programme.title: Bean Phone
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants a smartphone but does not have enough money to buy one.

programme.title: Hotel Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean has some unexpected guests who think he runs a hotel!

programme.title: Jurassic Bean
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur.

programme.title: Caring Bean
programme.desc: When Mrs. Wicket is disabled by Mr. Beans toy car, he takes care of her.

programme.title: Opera Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Beans car has broken down and he is late meeting Irma at the opera.

programme.title: Taxi Bean
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one.

programme.title: Muscle Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean needs to impress Irma, who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman.

programme.title: A New Friend
programme.desc: A small bird wants to befriend Mr. Bean, but its squawking sound annoys Mrs. Wicket.

programme.title: The Lift
programme.desc: Mr. Bean goes on a lift to the top floor of a toy shop, but Teddy gets stuck in the doors and jams the lift.

programme.title: Dig This
programme.desc: It is a nice sunny day and Mr. Bean and Mrs. Wicket are relaxing in the garden.

programme.title: Bean Hypnotised
programme.desc: Mr. Bean attends a hypnotism show where he unwittingly volunteers to be hypnotized.

programme.title: Car Wash
programme.desc: After a stubborn bird deliberately defecates his Mini, Mr. Bean washes it.

programme.title: Where Did You Get That Cat?
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket has a new hat that looks like Scrapper.

programme.title: Valuable Lessons
programme.desc: Two burglars hatch up an evil plan in which one of them disguises himself as a gentleman.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: On Halloween night, Mr. Bean prepares to give the children some tricks and treats they wont forget.

programme.title: Bean Painting
programme.desc: Mr. Bean paints a picture of Teddy, but accidentally splashes some green paint on the wall.

programme.title: Wrestle Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to read a book but he is disturbed by the noise of Mrs. Wicket and her friend.

programme.title: Rare Bird
programme.desc: Mr. Bean loves bird spotting and is desperate to tick off the last elusive bird in his book.

programme.title: Beans Safari
programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey.

programme.title: A Round of Golf
programme.desc: Mr. Bean fancies a game of golf.

programme.title: Superhero Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes a superhero in an attempt to stop a cunning thief.

programme.title: What A Load Of Rubbish
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is a bit too enthusiastic while cleaning his flat and Teddy ends up on his way to the dump.

programme.title: The Robot
programme.desc: Mr. Bean buys a robot to clean his flat, but it ends up creating destruction across London.

programme.title: Ice Cream
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants an ice cream cone from the ice cream van.

programme.title: Birthday Party
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is feeling down when everyone forgot his birthday.

programme.title: In The Garden
programme.desc: Mr. Bean tries to cut the grass in the garden but finds it impossible.

programme.title: A Magic Day Out
programme.desc: Mr. Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside.

programme.title: Ball Pool
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to play inside the local play area, but he is not allowed to enter.

programme.title: Pizza Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean orders a takeaway pizza, but when it arrives, he feels let down by the size of it.

programme.title: The Photograph
programme.desc: The airport personnel refuses to let Mr. Bean take a flight due to his passport having no photo.

programme.title: Dancing Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean needs to learn to dance to impress his girlfriend Irma.

programme.title: Bean Shopping
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is locked in a department store overnight having the time of his life.

programme.title: Game Over
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wicket’s nephew.

programme.title: Special Delivery
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair.

programme.title: A Dogs Life
programme.desc: Mr Bean dog-sits for Irma and while in the park comes across a professional dog-walker.

programme.title: The Big Stink
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor.

programme.title: Birthday Bother
programme.desc: It’s Irma’s birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two –one nice, one silly.

programme.title: Bed Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he can’t.

programme.title: Spa Day
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat.

programme.title: Charity Bean
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan.

programme.title: Bean Encore
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert.

programme.title: Mobile Home
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind.

programme.title: Haunted House
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills.

programme.title: Eau De Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wicket’s new, expensive perfume on the floor.

programme.title: Running On Empty
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol.

programme.title: Ekún Ìyàwo
programme.desc: Film Lab Shorts. Omolewa rebels against local customs to follow her heart and marry the love of her life, but local customs insist otherwise, at a crossroad, she takes a stand.

programme.title: Tangled
programme.desc: May gets a job as the house-help to a difficult man, Ramsey, and her working situation gets even worse when Ramseys girlfriend believes there is something more than a work relationship between them.

programme.title: Enough
programme.desc: A married man with an overbearing attitude desperately wants a male child from his wife after having five daughters and his wife is tired of his excesses.

programme.title: Lockdown
programme.desc: When the federal government imposes a lockdown to control a global pandemic, corona virus plaguing the world, two couples, who have been married for years and thought they knew each other, find that spending so much time together in the confined space of their home may not be a good thing. Hidden secrets will be uncovered, and weaknesses will be known. How will they cope and whose secret is worse?

programme.title: Boomerang
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Rival twin sisters compete against each other for recognition because one of them has always feel left out and segregated by friends and their family and now she must fight to prove a point that she is important.

programme.title: Burden
programme.desc: Stella suffers a devastating loss when her husband leaves her suddenly. She slowly finds happiness when she falls for the doctor that treats her, but things get complicated when her husband comes back to fight for their marriage.

programme.title: Hurdles
programme.desc: An arrogant, fastidious and yet successful young lady eventually meets her match. To her dismay, he is unnerved by her attitude, flouts her rules and refuses to bend to her will, causing him to get under her skin.

programme.title: Recall
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Dave develops amnesia after getting into a car accident with his wife, Cindy. He does not remember his wife at all and only recalls his time with his ex-girlfriend, Stella. As Cindy battles to get Dave to recognise her again, Stella manipulates Dave and worms her way back into his life.

programme.title: Indecent Affair
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When a womans controlling husband convinces her to pose as his cousin at a work event so his philandering boss can seduce her, the consequences are not only dire, but they also impose on everyone a journey of self discovery.

programme.title: Sisi Eko - Ep 8
programme.desc: Eko is beautiful and knows it, so it is no surprise that she gets most of the male attention. Finding Mr Right, however, is proving to be complicated, as Mr Right must meet her 6-Cardinal Rules. The romantic comedy series touches on important issues such as mental health, anxiety, and self-doubt.

programme.title: Sisi Eko - Ep 9
programme.desc: Eko is beautiful and knows it, so it is no surprise that she gets most of the male attention. Finding Mr Right, however, is proving to be complicated, as Mr Right must meet her 6-Cardinal Rules. programme.title: Ekún Ìyàwo
programme.desc: Film Lab Shorts. Omolewa rebels against local customs to follow her heart and marry the love of her life, but local customs insist otherwise, at a crossroad, she takes a stand.

programme.title: AMC Red Carpet - Dead Tide
programme.desc: AMC Red Carpet brings you exclusive red carpet interviews with Nollywood stars at the premieres of top Nollywood movies and other industry events such as award ceremonies.

programme.title: Obsession
programme.desc: Jealousy rears its ugly head and puts a couples relationship in jeopardy when they invite guests to stay over in their home.

programme.title: Samantha
programme.desc: An extranged couple decide to get together, along with their new partners, to discuss custody and well-being of the estranged couples daughter, samantha. Things start to go awry as old wounds are reopened and old feelings, good and bad start to resurface.

programme.title: Sisi Eko - Ep 10
programme.desc: Eko is beautiful and knows it, so it is no surprise that she gets most of the male attention. Finding Mr Right, however, is proving to be complicated, as Mr Right must meet her 6-Cardinal Rules. The romantic comedy series touches on important issues such as mental health, anxiety, and self-doubt.

programme.title: Recall
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Dave develops amnesia after getting into a car accident with his wife, Cindy. He does not remember his wife at all and only recalls his time with his ex-girlfriend, Stella. As Cindy battles to get Dave to recognise her again, Stella manipulates Dave and worms her way back into his life.

programme.title: Burning Pain
programme.desc: After his wife becomes sick and unable to move properly, Michael takes on the extra responsibility of caring for her. Is he doing this out of the goodness of his heart or is there something nefarious going on behind close doors?

programme.title: Freda
programme.desc: Tobi is completely in love with his fiercely very rich and successful girlfriend, Freda. He does everything to make her happy but she doesnt seem satisfied with anything he does. When she says yes after his public marriage proposal, he believes everything in their life is perfect, but things start to spiral out of control.

programme.title: Daybreak
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A typical heartbreaker and playboy wakes up to find out that his manhood has disappeared. He consults a prophet and finds out the curse has been put on him by one of the women he has angered and he has 24 hours to seek forgiveness from the one who has cursed him. The problem is, he doesnt know who the culprit is amongst all the women he has angered.

programme.title: Indecent Affair
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When a womans controlling husband convinces her to pose as his cousin at a work event so his philandering boss can seduce her, the consequences are not only dire, but they also impose on everyone a journey of self discovery.

programme.title: Destined
programme.desc: Roberts takes June and her mother into his household when he meets them in dire need. Their relationhsip becomes complicated when Junes mother dies, leaving Roberts feeling responsible for her.

programme.title: Violet
programme.desc: Temi is on the verge of tying the knot with his long time girlfriend Renny, but inexplicably changes his mind when he meets a blind lady named Violet.

programme.title: Uche Who Works In Lekki
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Uche Who Works In Lekki is a black comedy about an ad agency exec who makes a grave mistake by overpromising a payment to a hard-to-get Afrobeat star without the knowledge of his agency and must do everything possible to rectify it before his boss finds out.

programme.title: Maid In A Mansion
programme.desc: A woman is accused of her husband’s death due to their tumultuous relationship, but all is not as it seems within the household.

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk S6 - Erica Nlewedim
programme.desc: Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and shakers in the buzzing industry. We are putting you in the know with all things in African and Nollywood cinema actors, actresses, directors, producers, classic cinema and soon to be blockbuster hits its all here on AMC Movie Talk.

programme.title: Entanglement
programme.desc: After years of being broke and looking for a job, a man has a chance encounter that lands him a well-paying job, but this threatens to jeopardise his relationship with his girlfriend who has been by his side through thick and thin.

programme.title: Shaffys Sister
programme.desc: Shaffy’s sister, Daisy struggles to interact with her family and find her place in the society after spending years in prison.

programme.title: Satisfy Me
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Satisfy Me follows the life of a lady in her late thirties who wants to settle down by any means, which leads her into marrying a man with narcissistic personality disorder. She loses herself trying to boost his ego, not realising he is mentally unstable until it becomes too late.

programme.title: Boomerang
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Rival twin sisters compete against each other for recognition because one of them has always feel left out and segregated by friends and their family and now she must fight to prove a point that she is important.

programme.title: Burden
programme.desc: Stella suffers a devastating loss when her husband leaves her suddenly. She slowly finds happiness when she falls for the doctor that treats her, but things get complicated when her husband comes back to fight for their marriage.

programme.title: Lindell - Suruvaippa - Osa 2
programme.desc: Nelja pikkutyttoa valokuvassa. Kaksikymmenta vuotta myohemmin yksi heista loytyy surmattuna. Toinen on kadonnut jaljettomiin. Cato Isaksen on valmiina ratkaisemaan uusia rikosarvoituksia. Menneisyys saavuttaa Lise Sommerin. Paras ystavatar Esther Synnøve Lønn on loytynyt surmattuna ja kurkku auki viillettyna. Joitakin paivia myohemmin myos Estherin poika katoaa. Kun poliisi alkaa rapsuttaa julkisivua, kay ilmi, etta myos eras Lisen ja Esther Synnøven lapsuudenystava on kateissa. Ystavattarien valinen suhde katkee synkkia salaisuuksia. Mita oikeastaan tapahtui tyttojen ollessa pienia?

programme.title: Lindell - Suruvaippa - Osa 1
programme.desc: Nelja pikkutyttoa valokuvassa. Kaksikymmenta vuotta myohemmin yksi heista loytyy surmattuna. Toinen on kadonnut jaljettomiin. Cato Isaksen on valmiina ratkaisemaan uusia rikosarvoituksia. Menneisyys saavuttaa Lise Sommerin. Paras ystavatar Esther Synnøve Lønn on loytynyt surmattuna ja kurkku auki viillettyna. Joitakin paivia myohemmin myos Estherin poika katoaa. Kun poliisi alkaa rapsuttaa julkisivua, kay ilmi, etta myos eras Lisen ja Esther Synnøven lapsuudenystava on kateissa. Ystavattarien valinen suhde katkee synkkia salaisuuksia. Mita oikeastaan tapahtui tyttojen ollessa pienia?

programme.title: Pida huivista kiinni, Tatjana
programme.desc: Koskenkorvaa litkiva automekaanikko Reino (Matti Pellonpaa) ja kahvista riippuvainen perakamarin poika Valto (Mato Valtonen) lahtevat viettamaan viikonloppua ja kohtaavat matkalla virolaisen Tatjanan (Kati Outinen) ja venalaisen Klavdian (Kirsi Tykkylainen).

programme.title: Liza Marklund: Nobelin Testamentti
programme.desc: Tukholman Nobel-juhliin livahtaa nainen, joka ampuu israelilaisen nobelistin ja Nobel-komitean puheenjohtajan keskella tanssilattiaa. Rikostoimittaja Annika Bengtzon joutuu tahtomattaan keskelle draamaa - ei toimittajan vaan todistajan roolissa. Maailman lehdisto leimaa teon Lahi-idan terrorismiksi, mutta Annikalla on erilainen teoria. Jaljet johtavat juonittelun ja valtapelin synkkaan maailmaan, syvalle Nobeleiden kaikkein pyhimpaan. Totuus voi olla hengenvaarallinen.

programme.title: Varjoja paratiisissa
programme.desc: Varjoja paratiisissa kertoo roskakuskin ja supermarketin kassan rakkaustarinan. Se kertoo ihmisista kadun varjoisalla puolella, mutta myos itsekunnioituksesta ja rakkauden valttamattomyydesta.

programme.title: Rosso
programme.desc: Roadmovieta ja rikosdraamaa taidokkaasti yhdisteleva Rosso on kertomus sisilialaisesta palkkamurhaajasta Giancarlo Rossosta, joka on tullut Suomeen etsimaan seuraavaa kohdettaan, joka sattuu olemaan hanen rakastettunsa Marja. Odottamattomasti Rosso saa jaljitysapua Marjan veljelta Martilta, vaikkei heilla ole edes yhteista kielta. Matkalle mahtuu niin romuttamokeikka kuin pari ryostoakin..

programme.title: Liza Marklund: Paikka Auringossa
programme.desc: Pimeys on laskeutunut Costa del Solin ylle, kun ruotsalainen lapsiperhe loytyy kotoaan kaasuun tukehtuneena. Annika Bengtzon lahetetaan Marbellaan tutkimaan tapausta, mutta samaan aikaan han kay ex-miehensa Tomasin kanssa oikeustaistelua lapsistaan. Espanjassa jaljet johtavat Annikan idyllisen yhteison kaantopuolelle - kokaiinin, rahanpesun ja raakojen kostotoimien maailmaan. Liza Marklundin romaaneja rikostoimittaja Annika Bengtzonista on myyty yli 10 miljoonaa kappaletta ympari maailmaa. Dekkarikuningattaren kuudesta romaanista on nyt tehty elokuva, ja "Paikka auringossa" on sarjan tiivistunnelmainen paatoselokuva.

programme.title: Ykkoset Ja Nollat - Osa 1
programme.desc: Kriitikoiden ylistama brutaali gangsteridraama Johan Renckilta! FBI ja Interpol saavat vihia suuresta luottokorttisotkusta, ja narkkari Sebbe napataan kiinni epailtyna. Poliisin aloittaessa kuulustelun he saavat kuulla uskomattoman tarinan Goteborgin alamaailmasta. Ruotsalaiset ja venalaiset gangsterit, marokkolaiset hakkerit, korruptoituneet poliitikot ja ahneet virkamiehet - kaikki haluavat ansaita isot rahat, kukaan ei halua olla rakkikoira.

programme.title: Juha
programme.desc: Juha (Sakari Kuosmanen, Kauas pilvet karkaavat) ja Marja (Kati Outinen, Sauna) elavat yhdessa onnellisina ja viattomina kuin lapset kunnes kaarme luikertelee paratiisiin Shemeikan (Andre Wilms, Boheemielamaa) hahmossa. Juha perustuu Juhani Ahon kuuluisaan romaaniin. Se on myos 1900-luvun viimeinen mykkaelokuva. Musiikin elokuvaan on saveltanyt Anssi Tikanmaki.

programme.title: Valehtelija
programme.desc: Valehtelija on kuvaus nuoresta huulenheittajasta, joka ei koskaan puhu totta. Aki Kaurismaen esittama nuori mies kuljeskelee pitkin Helsingin katuja ja koittaa lainata rahaa tutuilta ja tuntemattomilta, milloin millakin verukkeella. Valehtelija on Mika Kaurismaen esikoiselokuva seka diplomityo Munchenin elokuvakoulusta.

programme.title: Arvottomat
programme.desc: Mika Kaurismaen ensimmainen pitka elokuva. Kasikirjoituksen han teki yhdessa veljensa Akin kanssa. Arvottomat on ajaton kuvaus siita kuinka Pikkurikollinen Manne, maalaispoika Harri ja kaunis Veera ajavat Volgalla lapi katoavien suomalaismaisemien, poliisien ja gangsterien roikkuessa herkeamatta kintereilla.. Vauhdikasta matkaa siivittavat mm. Juicen ja Rauli Baddingin ikivihreat kappaleet.

programme.title: Hamlet liikemaailmassa
programme.desc: Maailmankirjallisuuden tunnetuin sukudraama on siiretty nykysuomen liike-elaman vallan linnakkeisiin, keskelle Helsingin rock´n rollin tahdissa sykkivaa betoniviidakkoa.

programme.title: Pida huivista kiinni, Tatjana
programme.desc: Koskenkorvaa litkiva automekaanikko Reino (Matti Pellonpaa) ja kahvista riippuvainen perakamarin poika Valto (Mato Valtonen) lahtevat viettamaan viikonloppua ja kohtaavat matkalla virolaisen Tatjanan (Kati Outinen) ja venalaisen Klavdian (Kirsi Tykkylainen).

programme.title: Blodsbroder
programme.desc: Suoritettuaan pitkan vankilarangaistuksensa Jon on paattanyt aloittaa alusta. Han haluaa opiskella ja elaa ilman huumeita, vakivaltaa ja rikoksia. Lojaalisuus pikkuveljea kohtaan vie hanet kuitenkin pikkuhiljaa takaisin rikollisuuden pariin. Han kohtaa myos suuren rakkautensa Marlenan.

programme.title: Nicks Film Lightning Over Water
programme.desc: Wim Wendersin ohjaama dokumenttielokuva on syvaluotaava ja koskettava elokuva amerikkalaisen kulttiohjaajan, Nuori kapinallinen -elokuvasta parhaiten tunnetun Nicholas Rayn viimeisista paivista. “Tiesin, etta han halusi tehda tyota, kuolla tyonsa aareen”, Wim Wenders sanoo elokuvassa. YhteistyossaWendersin ja kuvausryhman kanssa Ray tekee kuolemastaan yhteisen projektin ja taideteoksen. Parantumattoman syovan hitaasti riuduttama Ray ei halua laitostua saattokodissa.

programme.title: Lindell: Unenvartija - Osa 1
programme.desc: Unenvartija on sietamattoman jannittava rikostarina, jossa psykologiset pohjasavyt kuljettavat tapahtumia eteenpain, kunnes kaikki paattyy dramaattiseen kilpajuoksuun haikailemattoman murhaajan kanssa. Kuka on tirkistelija, joka seisoo ikkunassa ja tarkkailee vastapaisen asunnon nuoria naisia? Liittyyko han jotenkin 19-vuotiaan Therese Geberin murhaan, ja onko han sama kuin mies, joka tunkeutuu yolla naisten asuntoon? Rikoskomisario Cato Isaksen saa uuden jutun ratkaistavakseen.

programme.title: Bleeder
programme.desc: Louise (Rikke Louise Andersson) rakastaa Leoa (Kim Bodnia) ehdoitta ja on ratketa riemusta kuullessaan odottavansa Leolle lasta. Leo ei ilahdu uutisesta, vaan kokee raskauden tuhoisana esteena tulevaisuudelleen. Paiva paivalta hanen ahdistuksensa kasvaa purkautuen lopulta silmittomana vakivaltana. Louisen veli ei jaa toimettomana katsomaan tilannetta, vaan han paattaa puuttua tapahtumien kulkuun omalla tavallaan. Rakkautta ja anarkiaa -ohjelmistoa

programme.title: Calamari Union
programme.desc: Calamari Union on kaikkien aikojen kulttiklassikko, joka kertoo seitsemantoista Frankin ja yhden Pekan matkasta Kallion varjoisilta kujilta kohti Eiran raikkaita tuulia, joista he ovat kuulleet isovanhempiensa kertovan. Epatoivoinen matka kaupungin betoniviidakon halki on taynna vaaroja ja houkutuksia joista alati vaanivat seireenit eivat ole vahaisin, eivatka kaikki matkaan lahteneet mitenkaan voi paasta perille. Jos yksikaanï...

programme.title: Ariel
programme.desc: Ariel kertoo Taistosta (Turo Pajala, Hamlet liikemaailmassa), pohjoissuomalaisesta kaivosmiehesta. Kun kaivos suljetaan, Taisto kaantaa Cadillacin keulan kohti etelaa. Helsingissa Taisto asuu Pelastusarmeijan yomajassa, etsii tyota ja rakastuu uutteraan yksinhuoltajaaitiin. Sitten kohtalo puuttuu peliin. Arielin paaosaa esittava Turo Pajala sai roolistaan Moskovan elokuvajuhlilla parhaan miesnayttelijan palkinnon. Elokuva voitti myos FIPRESCIN palkinnon. Yhdysvalloissa elokuvakriitikot valitsivat Arielin vuoden 1990 parhaaksi ulkomaiseksi elokuvaksi.

programme.title: 6 Juni
programme.desc: Samira on kaunis 24-vuotias nainen. Hanen perheensa on luvannut hanet vaimoksi miehelle, jota han ei rakasta. Jos Samira ei suostu avioliittoon, hanta uhkaa kunniamurha. Hasse on keski-ikainen mies, joka karsii tuomiota rattijuopumuksesta. Han haaveilee rauhallisesta elamasta vaimonsa ja poikansa kanssa – raittiina. Gertrud on ollut leski jo yhdeksan vuotta. Naapurin Bertil aikoo vihdoinkin voittaa Gertrudin sydamen itselleen ja haudata aviomiehen lopullisesti. Fredrikin tyttoystava on raskaana ja aikoo tehda abortin. 16-vuotias Frederik ei pysty hyvaksymaan tyton paatosta vaan karkaa kotoaan.

programme.title: Arvottomat
programme.desc: Mika Kaurismaen ensimmainen pitka elokuva. Kasikirjoituksen han teki yhdessa veljensa Akin kanssa. Arvottomat on ajaton kuvaus siita kuinka Pikkurikollinen Manne, maalaispoika Harri ja kaunis Veera ajavat Volgalla lapi katoavien suomalaismaisemien, poliisien ja gangsterien roikkuessa herkeamatta kintereilla.. Vauhdikasta matkaa siivittavat mm. Juicen ja Rauli Baddingin ikivihreat kappaleet.

programme.title: Leningrad Cowboys Meet Moses
programme.desc: Leningrad Cowboys Go American itsenainen jatko-osa kertoo Meksikon takamaille juuttuneen orkesterin kunniattomasta mutta varikkaasta matkasta takaisin Siperian laajoille aroille tuomisinaan vain ylpeytensa seka Vapauden patsaalta niistetty nena.

programme.title: Kauas pilvet karkaavat
programme.desc: Kauas pilvet karkaavat kertoo helsinkilaispariskunnasta. Raitiovaununkuljettaja ja perinteikkaan ravintola Dubrovnikin hovimestari menettavat tyonsa, mutta eivat toivoaan Aki Kaurismaen (Le Havre) Suomi-trilogian ensimmaisessa osassa.

programme.title: Odd Man Rush
programme.desc: Odd Man Rush perustuu Bill Keenanin humoristiseen muistelmateokseen, josta tuli jymymenestys. Harvardin latkajoukkueen Bobby Sanders siirtyy pelaamaan Ruotsin alemmille sarjatasoille diilissa, johon liittyy mm. laadukas pesukone. Ruotsissa romanttinen suhde paikalliseen tyttoon pakottaa miehen pohtimaan tarkemmin seka elamaa yleensa etta lapsuuden haavetta NHL:ssa pelaamisesta.

programme.title: Amazon
programme.desc: Suomalainen mies Kari (Kari Vaananen) paattaa vaimonsa kuoltua muuttaa Brasiliaan kahden tyttarensa kanssa. Han tapaa pian ramapaisen amerikkalaisen lentajan ja seikkailja Danin (Robert Davi: Die Hard, 007 - Lupa tappaa), joka kertoo Karille suunnitelmastaan kaivaa kultaa Amazonin viidakosta. Mutta Kari tormaa myos kauniiseen Paolaan (Rae Dawn Chong: Commando, Haivahdys purppuraa), jolta han oppii paremmin Amazonin tilanteesta ja sen uhkakuvista.

programme.title: Mies vailla menneisyytta
programme.desc: Mies vailla menneisyytta kertoo muistinsa menettavasta miehesta, joka aloittaa elamansa alusta yhteiskunnan koyhimpien keskella. Mies vailla menneisyytta sai Cannesin elokuvajuhlien Grand Prix -palkinnon ja Kati Outinen (Tulitikkutehtaan tytto ja Le Havre) palkittiin roolisuorituksestaan parhaan naisnayttelijan palkinnolla. Elokuvan miespaaosassa nahdaan Markku Peltola (Jadesoturi ja Kauas pilvet karkaavat).

programme.title: Laitakaupungin valot
programme.desc: Laitakaupungin valot kertoo yovartijana tyoskentelevasta Koistisesta, joka joutuu petoksen uhriksi. Laitakaupungin valot oli mukana vuoden 2006 Cannesin elokuvajuhlien kansainvalisessa kilpasarjassa. Elokuva palkittiin parhaan elokuvan Jussi-palkinnolla vuonna 2007. Lisaksi Timo Salminen voitti Jussin parhaasta kuvauksesta ja Markku Patila parhaasta lavastuksesta.

programme.title: Liza Marklund: Punainen Susi
programme.desc: Ruotsalainen iltapaivalehti Kvallspressen on maarannyt rikostoimittaja Annika Bengtzonin tutkimaan monimutkaista murhajuttua. Uhri on toimittajakollega, ja tapauksen ainoa silminnakija on 15-vuotias poika. Bengtzonin tutkimukset saavat yllattavan kaanteen, kun han paasee 40 vuotta vanhan salamurhatapauksen jaljille. Salamurhan vuosipaivan lahestyessa uhreja syntyy lisaa ja Bengtzon soluttautuu yha syvemmalle vallan syovereihin.

programme.title: Paperitahti
programme.desc: Paperitahti pohjautuu tositapahtumiin. On valokuvamalli, hanen kolme miestaan, leveaa elamaa, hyvaksikayttoa, ja julkista ryopytysta.. Anna (Pirkko Hamalainen) on ex-missi, nykyinen huippumalli, jonka elama ajautuu syoksykierteeseen miesten takia. Anna joutuu vahitellen seka hamaraperaisen liikemiehen, Ulfin (Hannu Lauri), etta alkoholisoituneen ja vakivaltaisen valokuvaajan, Iljan (Kari Vaananen), hyvaksikayton kohteeksi. Ainoaksi oikeaksi ystavaksi paljastuu elamaan rohkeasti suhtautuva Taukka (Matti Rasila). Anna paattaa koettaa paeta elamansa pahoja asioita, mutta se vaatii rohkeita paatoksia ja valmiutta maksamaan niiden hinta.

programme.title: Jarnganget
programme.desc: Nelja ystavaa ovat jokavuotisella melontareissullaan Kalix joella. Matkalla he kohtaavat sisarukset Marien ja Susannen. Yhteistuumin he paattavat pystyttaa leirin joenrannalle ja viettaa yon juhlien. Aamulla kun he heraavat nuorempi sisko Susanne on kadonnut jaljettomiin. Nayttaa silta, etta Kalix joella on hyvin synkka salaisuus kannettavanaan..

programme.title: Bleeder
programme.desc: Louise (Rikke Louise Andersson) rakastaa Leoa (Kim Bodnia) ehdoitta ja on ratketa riemusta kuullessaan odottavansa Leolle lasta. Leo ei ilahdu uutisesta, vaan kokee raskauden tuhoisana esteena tulevaisuudelleen. Paiva paivalta hanen ahdistuksensa kasvaa purkautuen lopulta silmittomana vakivaltana. Louisen veli ei jaa toimettomana katsomaan tilannetta, vaan han paattaa puuttua tapahtumien kulkuun omalla tavallaan. Rakkautta ja anarkiaa -ohjelmistoa

programme.title: Blodsbroder
programme.desc: Suoritettuaan pitkan vankilarangaistuksensa Jon on paattanyt aloittaa alusta. Han haluaa opiskella ja elaa ilman huumeita, vakivaltaa ja rikoksia. Lojaalisuus pikkuveljea kohtaan vie hanet kuitenkin pikkuhiljaa takaisin rikollisuuden pariin. Han kohtaa myos suuren rakkautensa Marlenan.

programme.title: Ykkoset Ja Nollat - Osa 1
programme.desc: Kriitikoiden ylistama brutaali gangsteridraama Johan Renckilta! FBI ja Interpol saavat vihia suuresta luottokorttisotkusta, ja narkkari Sebbe napataan kiinni epailtyna. Poliisin aloittaessa kuulustelun he saavat kuulla uskomattoman tarinan Goteborgin alamaailmasta. Ruotsalaiset ja venalaiset gangsterit, marokkolaiset hakkerit, korruptoituneet poliitikot ja ahneet virkamiehet - kaikki haluavat ansaita isot rahat, kukaan ei halua olla rakkikoira.

programme.title: Sip Into Something Sexier
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Signature cocktails at Jay Z’s legendary 40/40 Club stir up ideas for runway worthy cocktail dresses

programme.title: Keepin It Classy
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Designers create high impact fashion from materials found in an elementary classroom.

programme.title: Partners in Crime
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Designers pair up to create modern looks inspired by Lifetime’s 1930s mini-series Bonnie and Clyde.

programme.title: Marge Madness
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Marge Simpson turns to the All Stars to design a date night dress for an evening out with Homer.

programme.title: As Sewn on TV
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Remaining designers visit the headquarters of QVC where they are asked to design a red carpet dress.

programme.title: #Ninas Trending
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Designers team up with influential fashion bloggers to identify a new trend for 2014.

programme.title: Fashion Cents
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: The All Stars work with design house Milly to create ready-to-wear looks to be sold for charity.

programme.title: Are UN Or Are You Out
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Season finale. Designers present collections inspired by their own heritage at a VIP runway show.

programme.title: Reunion Special
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Alyssa Milano reunites all 11 designers to rehash the season in this Reunion Special.

programme.title: Road to the Runway
programme.desc: Tim Gunn introduces the eighteen new designers on the premiere of Project Runway Season 13.

programme.title: The Judges Decide
programme.desc: 18 new designers meet as they arrive in NYC and face one final audition in front of the judges.

programme.title: Unconventional Movie Nite!
programme.desc: Designers are taken to a movie theatre where they work in teams… with unconventional materials!

programme.title: Welcome To The Future
programme.desc: The designers make a look that could be worn twenty years in the future in Marie Claire magazine.

programme.title: A Suitable Twist
programme.desc: The designers take a men’s suit, and transform it into a high fashion women’s look.

programme.title: The Klum of Doom
programme.desc: Heidi asks the designers to create a red carpet look that she could wear to the Creative Arts Emmys.

programme.title: Rock The Wedding
programme.desc: Designers work in pairs to create looks that could be worn for a “nontraditional wedding.”

programme.title: Priceless Runway
programme.desc: With the help of Chopard, the designers create an extravagant eveningwear piece inspired by jewelry.

programme.title: The Rainway
programme.desc: Inspired by Samsungs Curved TV, designers create avant-garde pieces that look good at every angle.

programme.title: American Girl Doll
programme.desc: The designers create a modern look for a girl, inspired by the “Beforever” American Doll collection.

programme.title: Muse On The Street
programme.desc: The designers are asked to find a stranger on the street to act as their muse/model for a makeover.

programme.title: Highest Bidder
programme.desc: The designers are taken to a warehouse and bid on storage units in order to obtain their materials.

programme.title: Fashion Week: Whos In and Whos Out
programme.desc: Designers are asked to create a “Street Chic” look inspired by a trip around NYC, courtesy of Lexus.

programme.title: Finale Part 1
programme.desc: The final four designers are surprised with a trip to Rome, courtesy of Best Western.

programme.title: Finale Part 2
programme.desc: For the designers, the opportunity to show at New York Fashion Week has finally arrived.

programme.title: Reunion Special
programme.desc: All of the designers reunite one last time to discuss their experiences on Project Runway together.

programme.title: Made in Manhattan
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Designers create collections inspired by NYCs uptown or downtown scene. Ivanka Trump guests.

programme.title: The Art of Construction
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: A construction site forces designers to create feminine fashion from masculine materials.

programme.title: Something Wicked This Way Comes
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: With the Broadway musical Wicked, the All Stars face off to design couture inspired fashion.

programme.title: Wear Your Heart On Your Sleeve
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Nina Garcia returns to judge colorful party dresses inspired by designers personal relationships.

programme.title: Designing for the Duchess
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: The designers meet British royalty in London, England as inspiration for winter wear.

programme.title: Luck Be A Lady
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: The stakes are high as the All Stars designers roll dice on the runway for a fashion gamble.

programme.title: Mix and Match.com
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Love is in the air as the All Stars design looks for Match.com singles on first dates.

programme.title: Making a Splash
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Designers must collect their fabric from under the wate to make Elegant resort wear swimsuits.

programme.title: Sketching with Sharks
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Underwater marine life provides inspiration for avant-garde fashion.

programme.title: Versatile Tops and Bottoms
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Alyssa and the judges take over Times Square to school the designers in the business of fashion.

programme.title: Always the Bridesmaid
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Marchesas showroom inspires bridesmaid dresses for a real wedding ceremony.

programme.title: Some Like It Hot Dog
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Marilyn Monroes timeless beauty inspires dazzling red carpet gowns.

programme.title: 4 Seasons in One Finale
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: The All Stars finalists design collections representing all 4 seasons of the year. Season finale.

programme.title: Reunion Special
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Alyssa Milano reunites all 14 designers to debate the fashion, fights, and turmoil from this season.

programme.title: Road to the Runway
programme.desc: In this seasons casting special, 16 new designers will be introduced with a behind-the-scenes look.

programme.title: Mad Dash Mayhem
programme.desc: Sixteen new designers meet Tim and Heidi at Madison Square Garden for their first challenge.

programme.title: Its All In The Cards
programme.desc: Each designer must create a wearable look using greeting cards as their main textile.

programme.title: Shut Up and Sew
programme.desc: In the first Team Challenge, the designers are paired up for a day on a Celebrity Cruise ship.

programme.title: Fashion Flip
programme.desc: Designers put a modern and unique twist on a classic design. Kiernan Shipka joins as a guest judge.

programme.title: Gunn and Heid
programme.desc: The designers split into two teams and battle for their fabrics in a fierce paintball competition.

programme.title: Lace To The Finish
programme.desc: In an episode full of surprises, Heidi challenges the designers to create lingerie for her line.

programme.title: Haute Tech Couture
programme.desc: Designers dumpster dive for recycled electronics to merge the worlds of fashion and technology.

programme.title: Broadway Or Bust
programme.desc: Broadway serves as inspiration as designers create looks based on the musical Finding Neverland.

programme.title: Broadway Or Bust
programme.desc: Broadway serves as inspiration as designers create looks based on the musical Finding Neverland.

programme.title: Make It Sell
programme.desc: The designers must create ready-to-wear looks to be reproduced and sold online.

programme.title: Crews All In
programme.desc: The designers must makeover real women from our own Project Runway crew!

programme.title: The Runways in 3D!
programme.desc: The future is now as the designers use 3D printing technology to create avant-garde fashion!

programme.title: Roll Out The Red Carpet
programme.desc: Tthe designers travel to the glamour capital of the world, Los Angeles, to create red carpet looks.

programme.title: Finale Part 1

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Its the last chance for teams to secure a spot before the final. In savage and tactical 1v1 matches, teams battle for a place in the top 16. New robots join the fray, hoping for a last-minute victory to advance to the championship.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: One competitor draws first blood only seconds into the first round. After suffering severe damage at the hands of another competitor, one robots chance at the finals may be lost.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The last chance for combatants to fight for a place in the Grand Final. With the newcomers outnumbering the veterans, will the first timers make up for their lack of experience?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: This episode, a new Robot Wars champion will emerge! Sparks and scraps are sure to fly in this explosive series finale. Winners will have to make it through the four-way melees and head-to-head battles to be able to prove themselves in the final.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Newcomers, veterans and a recent President enter the fray in this first Heat of the series. Competitors are eliminated left, right and centre and only the strongest will survive to compete in the finals.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A veteran only heat features the current reigning Champions, Carbide. Will Carbide’s streak be brought to an end by the other robots, more experienced and eager than ever?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Even the judges aren’t safe as two robots collide, sending shrapnel through the bullet-resistant shields around the arena. Two very different styles of robot meet in the finals.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: One newcomer stares down seven veterans, will their induction into the arena be successful, or will their inexperience find them in the pit? One robot will have a second chance to qualify in the Redemption Round.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The final heat features only veterans, here for an opportunity to make up for their mistakes in the previous tournaments. Only one competitor will make it into the Grand Finals, and the others must suffer defeat, again.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: After lengthy repairs and inspirational pep talks, the qualifiers prepare to fight for the title. A 10-way Robot Rumble will give the victor a spot in the Grand Finals, alongside the heat winners.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The first ever Robot Wars heat begins. Six brave teams enter the arena for the first time as the four House Robots are unleashed to do what they were made for, turning competitors into twisted and scorched lumps.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Heat B features six contestants, all battling for a spot in the series finals. To make it through, they must prove their mettle in the Gauntlet, Trial (British Bulldog) and battle it out in the Arena.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Six more contestants enter the arena. This week the arena transforms into a Robot football pitch and Sergeant Bash meets his match. Which contestant will score a place in the finals?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Lightweight special; the six contestants this week make up for what they lack in size, with agility. Can they weave their way through the house robots in the gauntlet? Or will they knock each other off-course in this week’s trial, stock car racing?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Six contestants enter the arena, but how many will leave? As the robots navigate their way through this week’s trial, the Labyrinth, who knows what lies around each corner? Victory or elimination?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: No cues necessary as six new contestants play robot snooker in this week’s trial. The victors of this heat will be joining the other winners in the Grand Final. Who will be crowned champion of Robot Wars: The First Wars?

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Robot fightings newest competition begins! In the first heat, meet new robots and some familiar faces as teams get a feel for the arena and size up their competition. Filmed in Grantham in front of a live audience, robots battle for survival in the Robots Live Arena.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Heat 2 of the UKs most brutal robot combat competition takes the action to Crawley in the south of England. Winners and losers from Heat 1 face fresh opponents, fighting to secure a win and guarantee their place in the finals.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Its the last chance for teams to secure a spot before the final. In savage and tactical 1v1 matches, teams battle for a place in the top 16. New robots join the fray, hoping for a last-minute victory to advance to the championship.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: The most battle-hardened combat robots in the UK compete in the MechMania Grand Final. After three grueling heats, only the toughest survive. The tournament is now a single-elimination, 1v1, sudden-death formatuntil one team emerges as the victorious champion.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 The Fourth Wars - Heat A
programme.desc: The wars begin yet again, competitors can only qualify by destroying or outsmarting their opponents, and doing their best to stay out of the house robots way. Sumo and Pinball Warrior will test the robots grit and accuracy.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 The Fourth Wars - Heat B
programme.desc: Six competitors, including World Champion Razer battle it out for a shot at the Fourth Wars title. Irreparable damage could mean the permanent end of one of the veteran competitors in the semi-finals.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 The Fourth Wars - Heat C
programme.desc: A competitor faces issues before the battle even begins in this week’s eliminators and the house robots stand by, ready to strike the final blow. The clock proves to be the enemy in this week’s Pinball Warrior, and the competitors prepare to stand their ground in Sumo Bash.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 The Fourth Wars - Heat D
programme.desc: Veterans and Newcomers once again face the eliminators and Dead Metal tries to make a friend. A house robot gets flipped, causing the others to go on a rampage. A uniquely designed robot takes on Pinball Warrior and two more competitors stare down Shunt in Sumo Bash.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 The Fourth Wars - Heat E
programme.desc: A single strike spells trouble for a robot in the eliminators. A fleeting alliance forms as competitor and house robot team up to make an offering to the pit. This week’s Pinball Warrior has high-hopes for a standout performance.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 The Fourth Wars - Heat F
programme.desc: A robot with a unique strategy takes part in this week’s heat. Is it a recipe for success, or a fancy gimmick? The house robot’s manners are at an all-time low as they continue to attack after cease is called.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 The Fourth Wars - Heat G
programme.desc: The robots take the term “facing off” literally this week as they rip each other apart. Will Shunt manage to shake off the competitors in this week’s Sumo Bash.

programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 The Fourth Wars - Heat J

programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 The Fourth Wars - Heat L

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 The Fourth Wars - Celebrity Robot Wars
programme.desc: Celebrities take to the arena, teaming up with veterans from the series and their robots. The celebrities must control the robots for at least 60 seconds before the professionals can take over.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 The Fourth Wars - Tag Team Terror
programme.desc: Four teams take part in the tag team terror tournament. Two teams comprised of two robots enter the arena at once. Only one robot is allowed to battle, only being able to switch with their team-mate by entering their team’s coloured zone.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E15 The Fourth Wars - Northern Annihilator
programme.desc: Northerners compete in an annihilator. In the first round, all six robots would fight each other until one of them was eliminated. The process continued until only two robots remained, with the subsequent winner becoming the annihilator champion.

programme.title: Robot Wars

programme.desc: The South’s turn for the annihilator. Same rules, different robots.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E17 The Fourth Wars - War of Independence
programme.desc: The UK and USA battle it out to prove which country has the better robots. Each country has four robots representing and fighting for them. A straight knockout competition will determine a victor.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E18 The Fourth Wars - Heat M

programme.sub-title: S04 : E19 The Fourth Wars - Heat N
programme.desc: Renowned robot Firestorm 2 takes on Pinball Warrior this week and the heats are nearing their end. The house robots show no mercy against a flipped robot.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Ultimate Collection: House Robots
programme.desc: An extensive and informative dive behind-the-scenes on the House Robots. Get inside information from designer Chris Reynolds, on what goes into creating these killing machines.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Follow Team Chaoss journey. From humble beginnings to how they ended up building one of the most feared Robots ever to compete.

programme.title: Some Girls
programme.desc: Juuri ennen haitaan menestyva kirjailija (Adam Brody) matkustelee ympari maata tapaamassa entisia tyttoystaviaan (Jennifer Morrison, Mía Maestro, Emily Watson, Zoe Kazan ja Kristen Bell) hyvittaakseen tekemansa vaaryydet.

programme.title: Touched With Fire
programme.desc: Kun kaksi bipolaarista runoilijaa, joiden taide saa voimansa mielialojen aarimmaisesta heittelysta, tapaa kuntoutuskodissa, heidan kemiansa kohtaavat valittomasti ajaen molemmat uusiin, maanisiin korkeuksiin. He seuraavat mielenterveyden rajat rikkovaa intohimoaan nousten synkkyyden alhoista huimaaville nakoalapaikoille. Lopulta heidan on valittava mielenterveyden ja rakkauden valilla.

programme.title: The Way You Look Tonight
programme.desc: Peter lahestyy kolmeakymmenta, mutta on edelleen eksyksissa ja janoaa rakkautta loputtomien ja tuloksettomien nettideittien avulla. Yhtena aamuna Peter heraa ja huomaa deittiseuransa jattaneen hanet sankyyn yksin. Peter yrittaa jattaa kaiken taakseen ja hakee taas uusia deitteja samalta sivustolta. Jokainen tapaaminen avaa aivan uuden kokemusmaailman. Se saa hanet kyseenalaistamaan kaiken, mika liittyy luonnonvoimiin, vetovoimaan ja aitoon rakkauteen. Suuri kysymys jaa vaille vastausta; voiko Peter rakastua oikeasti ja loytaa aidon rakkauden?

programme.title: We Too Together
programme.desc: Rob on tullut kotiin sodasta ja hanta vaivaa traumaperainen stressihairio. Vahitellen han saa otteen menneisyytensa hallinnasta, Joulunpyhina han tutustuu Gabrielaan ja menettaa talle sydamensa. Elamanmuutos on valtava ja elama saa taas merkityksen.

programme.title: Stay Cool
programme.desc: Menestyskirjailija Henry McCarthy palaa kotikaupunkiinsa aloittaakseen tyot opettajana. Samalla han joutuu kohtaamaan nuoruudenrakkautensa Scarletin ja hatistelemaan kimpustaan uuteen opettajaansa palavasti rakastunutta teinityttoa Shastaa.

programme.title: Then Came You
programme.desc: Yksinainen leski suunnittelee maailmanymparimatkaa aviomiehensa tuhkien kanssa kaydakseen paikoissa, joihin he ihastuivat katsomissaan elokuvissa. Matkan ensimmainen etappi muuttaa hanen elamansa iaksi.

programme.title: Cairo Time
programme.desc: Naistenlehden paatoimittaja Juliette matkaa romanttiseen Kairoon tarkoituksenaan viettaa antoisa loma aviomiehensa kanssa. YK:ssa toimivan puolison lomille paasy kuitenkin viivastyy ja miehen hyva ystava Tareq saa pitaa seuraa kauniille Juliettelle. Kaupungin ja komean oppaan lumo saavat naisen tunteet sekaisin ja han huomaa rakastuvansa uuteen paikalliseen tuttavuuteen.

programme.title: The Greatest
programme.desc: Allen ja Grace Brewerin vanhin poika on kuollut auto-onnettomuudessa. Yhtakkiaovikello soi, ja oven takana on Rose. Han vaittaa tunteneensa pojan ja kantavansahanen lastaan. Tieto saa perheen etaantymaan toisistaan. Voiko kauheista onnettomuuksista seurata kuitenkin jotain hyvaa?

programme.title: Broken English
programme.desc: Nora Wilder on epatoivoinen. Hanen lahipiirissaan kaikki ovat naimisissa tai ainakin heilla on lapsia. Nora on kolmikymppinen, hanella on tylsa tyo ja aiti, joka muistuttaa Noraa jatkuvasti siita, etta tama on epaonnistunut. Surkeuden kruunaa ystavattaren taydellinen liitto. Lukuisten epaonnistuneiden treffien jalkeen Nora tapaa ranskalaisen Julienin.

programme.title: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: Grace (Selena Gomez) on tavallinen tytto, josta tulee vahingossa prinsessa, kun perheen kesamatka Pariisiin muuttuu elaman laajuiseksi fantasiaksi. Grace, joka elaa kuin kuninkaallinen kahden parhaan ystavansa kanssa, huomaa, kuka han todella on – omaksumalla toisen henkilon identiteetin.

programme.title: Bad Cupid
programme.desc: Archie ottaa tosissaan tehtavansa: huolehtia, etta aito rakkaus voittaa aina. Hanen toimintatapansa eivat kuitenkaan ole aina aivan tavanomaiset. Kaikki Archien tielle osuvat saavat varoa, silla han ei kaihda keinoja paatettyaan jotain.

programme.title: The Dreamers
programme.desc: Kolme elokuvantuntijaa, amerikkalainen vaihto-opiskelija Matthew seka kaksoset Theo ja Isabelle ovat tulleet laheisiksi yhteisen kiinnostuksen kohteensa vuoksi. Theon ja Isabellen epatavallinen intiimi yhteys kiehtoo Matthew’ta. Kun kaksosten vanhemmat lahtevat kuukaudeksi matkoille, Matthew saa kutsun asumaan heidan luokseen, ja he eksyvat elokuvafantasian maailmaan. The Dreamers on Oscar-palkitun Bernardo Bertoluccin romanttinen draamaelokuva, jonka paaosissa ovat Michael Pitt, Louis Garrel ja Eva Green.

programme.title: Kirjava huntu (The Painted Veil)
programme.desc: Laakari Walter Fane ja hanen vaimonsa Kitty ovat komennuksella Shanghaissa, jossa Walter on toissa paikallisessa sairaalassa. Walterin vaativa tyo vie kaiken liikenevan ajan ja yksinainen Kitty ajautuu englantilaisen diplomaatin Charles Townsendin syleilyyn. Kun Walter saa tietaa vaimonsa uskottomuudesta, han janoaa kostoa. Walter hyvaksyy vaarallisen tyon kiinalaisessa pikkukylassa, jossa riehuu kuolettava koleraepidemia. Kittylla ei ole muuta mahdollisuutta kuin seurata miestaan maaseudulle kauas kaikesta.

programme.title: 200 Cigarettes
programme.desc: On uudenvuodenaatto New Yorkissa vuonna 1981. Monica aikoo pitaa juhlat, mutta kello yhdeksaan mennessa kukaan ilmestynyt paikalle. Hanen vieraansa ovat tulossa, mutta he eivat pida kiiretta. Kevinilla ei ole halua juhlia uutta vuotta, koska hanet on vastikaan jatetty. Val ja Stephie eksyvat ja paatyvat klubille. Bridget ja Caitlyn yrittavat paasta eroon Bridgetin poikaystavasta Ericista. Kaikki he etsivat seksia, rakkautta tai molempia.

programme.title: Wicker Park
programme.desc: Matthew och Lisa ar oskiljaktiga. Deras passionerade karlek går inte att ta miste på. Men så plotsligt forsvinner hon- lamnar honom utan ett ord- och Matthews varld rasar samman. Nu, två år senare, har Matthew borjat komma over den varsta saknaden. Men nar han plotsligt får vad han tror ar en skymt av henne i folkvimlet ar det som att han blivit traffad av blixten- han måste få se henne. Efter ett intensivt letande hittar han henne. Tror han. For nar smartan och begaret blir for stort kan den forvranga dina sinnesbilder.

programme.title: Modern Persuasion
programme.desc: Moderni versio Jane Austenin ”Viisasteleva sydan” -romaanista. Wren Cosgrove on onnellinen sinkku, joka myontaa avoimesti olevansa tyonarkomaani. Uransa huipulla han huomaa paatyvansa joka ilta kotiin kissansa luokse. Kun Owen Jasper (”se mies, joka paasi karkuun”) palkkaa Wrenin firman, vanhat tunteet heraavat ja Wren saa uuden tilaisuuden tosirakkauteen.

programme.title: Lumoava Kirous
programme.desc: 17-vuotias Ethan unelmoi elamasta kaukana maaseudun pikkukylasta - kunnes han tapaa uuden tyton Lenan. He ovat kuin luodut toisilleen, ja vetovoimaa on vaikeaa vastustaa. Lenalla on kuitenkin synkka salaisuus. Han kuuluu noitien sukuun, ja pian kohtalo ratkaisee, vetaako suvun pimea puoli Lenan mukaansa. Silloin kuolevat rakkaus ja mies, jota Lena rakastaa!

programme.title: Touched With Fire
programme.desc: Kun kaksi bipolaarista runoilijaa, joiden taide saa voimansa mielialojen aarimmaisesta heittelysta, tapaa kuntoutuskodissa, heidan kemiansa kohtaavat valittomasti ajaen molemmat uusiin, maanisiin korkeuksiin. He seuraavat mielenterveyden rajat rikkovaa intohimoaan nousten synkkyyden alhoista huimaaville nakoalapaikoille. Lopulta heidan on valittava mielenterveyden ja rakkauden valilla.

programme.title: I Love You Phillip Morris
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva komedia mallikansalaisesta Steven Russellista (JIM CARREY), jonka radikaalilla elamanmuutoksella on hintansa. Patologisen valehtelijan munaukset vievat miehen suoraan kaapista hakkiin, kun han jaa luksuselamansa rahoittamiseen kehitetyista superhuijauksista kiinni rysan paalta. Vankilassa Stevenin yllattaa kuitenkin takaapain rynniva rakkaus, jota huijarin taipumukset ja poliisien pamput kuitenkin vaikeuttavat. Stevenilla on kuitenkin sairaita suunnitelmia rakastuneen parin saattamiseksi jalleen yhteen...

programme.title: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: Grace (Selena Gomez) on tavallinen tytto, josta tulee vahingossa prinsessa, kun perheen kesamatka Pariisiin muuttuu elaman laajuiseksi fantasiaksi. Grace, joka elaa kuin kuninkaallinen kahden parhaan ystavansa kanssa, huomaa, kuka han todella on – omaksumalla toisen henkilon identiteetin.

programme.title: Equals
programme.desc: Utopistisessa maailmassa, missa vakivalta ja rikollisuus on kitketty poistamalla ihmisten tunteet geneettisesti, eletaan Nian ja Silasin tavoin rauhallista ja yksitoikkoista elamaa. Tyopaikallaan tiedotusmateriaalien tuotantolaitoksessa he vaihtavat tyotoverien kesken ainoastaan kohteliaisuuksia. Elama on yksinkertaista kunnes huhu tartunnasta, jonka seurauksena ihminen nayttaa tunteensa, leviaa. Sairastuneet lahetetaan pois, eika heita nahda enaa koskaan. Silas epailee kantavansa tartuntaa, ja asian vahvistuttua hanesta tulee hylkio. Silti han tuntee vetoa Niaan, joka on myos saanut tartunnan, mutta onnistuu salaamaan oireensa.

programme.title: Jack and Jill Vs. The World
programme.desc: Jack on rutiineihin kangistunut mainosalan ammattilainen ja omaa New Yorkin juppien arvot. Eraana paivana han kuitenkin tormaa Jilliin, naiiviin nuoreen naiseen, joka on ihastuttava naky suurkaupungin ymparistossa. Jack tekee vaikutuksen Jilliin tarjotessaan hanelle toita seka huonetta asunnostaan. Hanen ystavallisyytensa koskettaa Jillia ja he ajautuvatkin nopeasti romanttisen suhteeseen, joka perustuu listaan saannoista joita Jill vaatii noudatettavan. Jillin eloisuus kaantaa Jackin maailman ylosalaisin, mutta hanta vaivaa uuden rakkautensa taustoja koskevien aiheiden valttely. Kaikki ei ole sita milta nayttaa ja Jillilla on salaisuus, joka saattaa muuttaa kaiken...

programme.title: Broken English
programme.desc: Nora Wilder on epatoivoinen. Hanen lahipiirissaan kaikki ovat naimisissa tai ainakin heilla on lapsia. Nora on kolmikymppinen, hanella on tylsa tyo ja aiti, joka muistuttaa Noraa jatkuvasti siita, etta tama on epaonnistunut. Surkeuden kruunaa ystavattaren taydellinen liitto. Lukuisten epaonnistuneiden treffien jalkeen Nora tapaa ranskalaisen Julienin.

programme.title: Very Good Girls
programme.desc: New Yorkista kotoisin olevat Lily ja Gerry ovat parhaita ystavia, joilla on koko elama edessaan. He viettavat yhdessa viimeista kesaansa ennen yliopistoa ja paattavat menettaa neitsyytensa taman elamansa kesan aikana. Ikuinen ystavyys joutuu kuitenkin koetukselle, kun kumpikin tytoista ihastuu samaan komeaan taiteilijaan. Viattomattomuuden aika paattyy monella tapaa.

programme.title: Kirjava huntu (The Painted Veil)
programme.desc: Laakari Walter Fane ja hanen vaimonsa Kitty ovat komennuksella Shanghaissa, jossa Walter on toissa paikallisessa sairaalassa. Walterin vaativa tyo vie kaiken liikenevan ajan ja yksinainen Kitty ajautuu englantilaisen diplomaatin Charles Townsendin syleilyyn. Kun Walter saa tietaa vaimonsa uskottomuudesta, han janoaa kostoa. Walter hyvaksyy vaarallisen tyon kiinalaisessa pikkukylassa, jossa riehuu kuolettava koleraepidemia. Kittylla ei ole muuta mahdollisuutta kuin seurata miestaan maaseudulle kauas kaikesta.

programme.title: The Dreamers
programme.desc: Kolme elokuvantuntijaa, amerikkalainen vaihto-opiskelija Matthew seka kaksoset Theo ja Isabelle ovat tulleet laheisiksi yhteisen kiinnostuksen kohteensa vuoksi. Theon ja Isabellen epatavallinen intiimi yhteys kiehtoo Matthew’ta. Kun kaksosten vanhemmat lahtevat kuukaudeksi matkoille, Matthew saa kutsun asumaan heidan luokseen, ja he eksyvat elokuvafantasian maailmaan. The Dreamers on Oscar-palkitun Bernardo Bertoluccin romanttinen draamaelokuva, jonka paaosissa ovat Michael Pitt, Louis Garrel ja Eva Green.

programme.title: Lamant double
programme.desc: Chloella on ihana terapeuttimies Louis, mutta myos kipera ongelma. Miehen identtinen kaksoisveli Paul on kiinnostunut Chloesta seka eroottisesti etta psykoanalyysin kohteena. Miellyttava empaatikko Louis ja jaatava manipuloija Paul eivat ole koskaan samassa paikassa, mutta jo seksikohtausten lihallisuus vakuuttaa katsojalle, ettei dilemma ole vain Chloen paassa.

programme.title: You and Me
programme.desc: Nuori kuuro nainen tapaa vastikaan sokeutuneen miehen, ja tasta kohtaamisesta saa alkunsa hauska ja koskettava rakkaustarina elaman suurista haasteista ja ilon hetkista.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: The first in the season will see Catherine Bennett and her youngest daughter Sarah Jane keen to downsize from their huge 13-bedroomed house in Mullingar. Theyre planning to move down the road, where they also own a 3-bed bungalow thats been uninhabited for the last nine years.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot faces a unique challenge in Clane, Co. Kildare.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Architect Dermot Bannon helps Senator Katherine Zappone and Dr Ann Louise Gilligan renovate a dilapidated hunting lodge in Brittas, Dublin.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Desperate for more space, a couple with two young daughters, who have long since outgrown their tiny cottage in Killawalla outside Westport, engage Dermot to help.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot revamps a Rathfarnham four-bed to suit the changing needs of its occupants Peter, Lisa and their twins Grace and Louise (9) live in a four-bed house in Rathfarnham, Dublin 14.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: A young couple with three children seek Dermots help in revamping their small three bedroomed bungalow in Ballinteer Ailish and Patrick Bates are a young couple running out of space - fast!

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot knows exactly how to solve the problem but it means destroying a lot of the work the couple have already done.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Childhood sweethearts are up against the clock to revamp their 70s bungalow in Enniskerry before their first baby arrives.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot needs to create "a bungalow downstairs" incorporating a bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, living and dining room.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is normally confident about presenting a plan. But with a couple as design-literate as Greg and Siobhan, the stakes are that bit higher.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Rathcoole with Mary Moore, the design solution Dermot offers Mary is one of the most unusual and interesting he has ever conceived.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Architect Dermot Bannon sets out to transform peoples living spaces. Before moving in to their 1940s ex-council house in Co Kilkenny, the Kirwans added a basic extension.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot wants to turn the house completely on its head, putting the bedrooms to the front and extending the back to include a kitchen, living and dining that leads into the garden.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Templetuohy, Co. Tipperary with Joanne and Sean Cleere who believe they need a substantial extension but Dermot doesnt actually concur.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Room to Improve starts with Margaret and Jodie Burke who plan to renovate the family home in Foxrock.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Pádraig Whooley and Lorraine Dufficey spent 265 thousand euros on their remote cottage at Rossmore in West Cork, they knew that - while the hilltop location was ideal - the house was far from it.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Laytown, co.Meath, with a budget of 60,000 euros, Dermots worry "is even if you took away the shoddy workmanship youd spend the 60k, this is a really difficult one..."

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Dalkey, with a budget of 180,000 euros, he must come up with an innovative design to match their exacting requirements within the confines of an incredibly tight site.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Clontarf, with Denise and Ben who desperately want a second bathroom for their family home, but their budget is limited.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Tullow, with Tom and Lisa who want to renovate their 19th century farmhouse.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Yvonne and John live in a housing estate in Dundalk with their two children. Four years ago, they decided to buy their next-door neighbours house.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Jim and Siobhan Doyle live in a beautiful old house over looking Dublin Bay in Sutton. See Dermot Bannon transform the rambling old house into a beautiful new space.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: The series begins in Cork City with our youngest and most ambitious couple yet, Meadhbh and Niall, both 27-years-old.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: After 10 successful years living in Boston, Elaine Mitchell made the decision to come back to the old sod with her earnings.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: No close neighbours, beautiful views of the Wicklow Mountains, a large vegetable patch, 10 hens, four ducks, two geese, four beehives, two dogs and three cats.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Marcus and Margaret are about to extend a two-bed cottage in Dundrum and share it with Marcuss beloved Aunt May.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: The number one criteria when buying a house is location and our fifth programme of the series is set in one of the most sought after costal parts of the country, Dalkey.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: John Rochford from Dublin and Lee Benn, originally from Limerick, have bought a house in their dream location - South Dublins seaside suburbia, Blackrock.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot Bannon helps a family to transform their 70s bungalow outside Tipperary into a modern family home.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: This week Dermot goes to Cork to work with a family spanning three generations - who all have different ideas on how to improve their home.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot Bannon tries to turn a dilapidated, woodworm infested 1930s cottage into a starter home for a Finglas family.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: This week Dermot tackles a large Victorian terraced house in the highly sought-after Dublin suburb of Donnybrook.

programme.title: Morning Sun on Yosemite Falls

programme.title: Gisborne and Lake Twizel: New Zealand
programme.desc: Taking in Gisbornes tranquil cliff-lined coastlines, driftwood, and rushing waves; going lakeside in the Twizel region to explore snow-covered mountain ranges and the calm surface of the lake waters.
